anya-e0812n:24: Te me jayanti guravo guravo guṇehi.
anya-e0812n:29: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0812n:30_4: kimettha lakkhaṇakaraṇena adiṭṭhalakkhaṇāpi dissanti bandhantāti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi
anya-e0812n:30_5: te ghuṇakkharappakāsā tabbidūnaṃ payogānusārino vā siyuṃ, pubbe katasatthaparicayā
anya-e0812n:30_6: vā siyunti viññeyyaṃ. Vāṇī mayhaṃ manaṃ pīṇayatanti sambandho. Vāṇīti vā sarassatyaparanāmadheyyā
anya-e0812n:30_7: kāci devatā, sā sabbāvadātā yathicchitatthasādhanapuṇḍarīkagabbhe nisīdatīti lokavādo.
anya-e0812n:30_9: tatoyevāyaṃ devatā ruppate. Tattha sarassatiyā yathā’sattā jātāya manosampīṇananti
anya-e0812n:30_10: loko, saddhammadevatāya tu manopīṇanaṃ, tassā sabbavajjarahitāyaccantanimmalāya nirantaratthanekatāṇappavattiyā
anya-e0812n:30_11: manaso sampīṇanaṃ. Tena ca passaddhi, tāya pana sukhaṃ, tenāpi samādhi, samādhisambhavena
anya-e0812n:31_0: Kiṃvisiṭṭhoccāha “muninde”ccādi. Ubho loke munāti jānātīti muni, indati paramissariyaṃ
anya-e0812n:31_1: pavatteti sabbatthāti indo, muni ca so indo ca, munīnaṃ indoti vā munindo, sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0812n:31_2: Tatoyaṃ tassa nimittakasaññā. Vijjamānesupi pariyāyasaddesvaññesu kavikāmitassatthassekantavācakatteno’
anya-e0812n:31_3: cityasamposakoyaṃ munindasaddo, tathā hi yo ubhayalokajānanena munīnaṃ paramissariyapuggalānampi
anya-e0812n:31_4: paramissariyaṃ vatteti, so paraṃ pīṇeti hetubhāvena’tre’tyu’citameva, tathā padantarānampi
anya-e0812n:31_5: ocityaṃ poseti. Tathā hi tādisassa vadanāravindodare sambhavā sundarī, tatoyeva paṭisaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n:31_6: tasmā ca mano pīṇetīti. Tassa vadanaṃ, tamiva munindavadanaṃ, ambhojaṃ. Tameva vā
anya-e0812n:31_7: lakkhisaṃyogitādisadhammena’mbhojaṃ, padumaṃ. Tassa gabbho. Tattha sambhavena pavattiyā,
anya-e0812n:31_8: uppattiyā vā sundarī niravajjā devatā. Vācā pana dosalesenāpa’samphuṭṭhāva niravajjā,
anya-e0812n:31_9: tathā ca vakkhati “guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttā” subodhālaṅkāra 14 gāthā iccādi. Tatovāyaṃ
anya-e0812n:31_10: saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ sattānaṃ paṭibhānādiguṇavisesāvahattamattena paṭisaraṇabhūtā devatā.
anya-e0812n:31_12: Sabhāvanapuṃsakattā cettha na liṅgaparivattanaṃ. Mayhanti ekavacanenattano nirabhimānata’māneti
anya-e0812n:31_14: cāyaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā sabbattha siriṃ poseti. Tathā ca vakkhati “vaṅkavuttīsu poseti,
anya-e0812n:31_15: sileso tu siriṃ para”nti subodhālaṅkāra 172 gāthā. Ayamettha saṅkhepena nayena atthavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0812n:31_16: Vitthāranayena pana nānappakārenattho saṃvaṇṇetuṃ sakkā. Tathā sati ganthagāravopi
anya-e0812n:32_2: pariyattimūlakattā yena kenaci pariyāyena tassā pariyattiyā atthāvabodhena “appeva
anya-e0812n:32_3: nāma sādhujanaṃ paritoseyya”miti tadadhigamopāyabhūtamidaṃ pakaraṇamārabhanto ganthārambhe
anya-e0812n:32_5: visesato abhimataganthassānantarāyena parisamattiyā ca kāraṇamiti iṭṭhadevatānussaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n:32_7: ca dassento “munindavadanambhoja…pe… parissamo”ti gāthattayamāha. Ettha paṭhamagāthāya
anya-e0812n:32_9: nisedhitā, tatiyagāthāya abhidhānādikaṃ dassitaṃ. Tathā hi lokuttaradhammanissitapariyattisaṅkhātasabbaññubhāratiyā
anya-e0812n:32_10: manosampīṇanāsīsanāpadesena attano nissesadhammaratane pasādo pakāsito. So pana dhammappasādo
anya-e0812n:32_11: tadavinābhāvato buddhasaṅghesupi siddhoti ratanattayavisayaṃ paṇāmaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā
anya-e0812n:32_12: dasseti. So hi atthato paṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā. Ettha phalaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0812n:33_0: Puna santesu rāmasammādyalaṅkāresu piṭṭhapisanaṃ viya hotīdaṃ alaṅkārakaraṇanti vadantā
anya-e0812n:33_1: viruddhavādino rāmasammādīnamatthibhāvaṃ ubbhāvetvā abhyupagametvā (ka.) te suddhamāgadhikā
anya-e0812n:33_2: na vaḷañjentīti iminā paṭisiddhā. Nirākaraṇaphalañhi ganthassa niddosabhāvova. Apica
anya-e0812n:34: Satthappayojanānaṃ sādhyasādhanalakkhaṇo sambandho pana sambandhassa nissayabhūtasatthappayojanānaṃ dassaneneva tannissitattā sayampi vutto hoti. Vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0812n:37_0: Tassattho– sambandhanissayā sambandhassa ādhārabhūtā satthaṃ, payojanañca ubho vuttā,
anya-e0812n:37_1: taṃvuttiyāyeva tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ kathaneneva tannissito te nissāya pavatto sopi sambandho vutto bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:38_0: Ettha abhidhānakathanaṃ vohārasukhatthaṃ, abhidheyyādikathanaṃ pana tehi yuttānaṃyeva
anya-e0812n:41_3: padaccayo, siyā vākyaṃ sakārako”ti abhidhānappadīpikā 106 gāthā vuttalakkhaṇamajjhapatitavākyasamudāyopetaṃ
anya-e0812n:41_5: ato paraṃ vuttalakkhaṇasatthato aññaṃ anadhigataṃ nādhippetanti. Idaṃ panettha gāthānaṃ nikkhepappayojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:42_0: Loke padumagabbhe vasantiyā sabbaṅgadhavalāya yathicchitatthasādhikāya sarassatīnāmikāya
anya-e0812n:42_1: devatāya “vāṇī”ti vohārato iminā atthena yojetvā abhinnapadasilesālaṅkāravasena vuttattā
anya-e0812n:42_2: padattho evaṃ veditabbo – munindassa sobhāsugandhādiguṇayogato mukhasadisassa, no
anya-e0812n:42_3: ce mukhasaṅkhātaambhojassa gabbhe udare sambhavena pavattiyā uppattiyā vā sundarī
anya-e0812n:42_4: niddosā, sobhanā vā pāṇinaṃ saraṇaṃ atoyeva ahitāpanayanahitāvahatthena sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0812n:42_5: paṭissaraṇabhūtā vāṇī yathāvuttaguṇopetā sarassatīdevatā, no ce sabbaññubhāratīti
anya-e0812n:42_6: vuttasaddhammaratanaṃ mayhaṃ manaṃ ganthaviracane byāvaṭassa me cittaṃ pīṇayataṃ
anya-e0812n:43_0: Ubhayalokajānanato muni ca so indabhāvapavattanato indo ceti kammadhārayena vā, agāriyamunianagāriyamunisekhamuniasekhamunīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:43_1: catunnaṃ pañcamo hutvā indoti chaṭṭhītappurisena vā munindo. Devatāpakkhe vadanamiva
anya-e0812n:43_2: vadananti ambhoje, saddhammapakkhe ambhojamiva ambhojanti vadane ca upacārena gahite
anya-e0812n:43_3: kammadhārayo. Munindassa vadanambhojamiti ca, tassa gabbhoti ca, tasmiṃ sambhavoti
anya-e0812n:43_4: ca, tena sundarīti ca vākyaṃ. Vāṇiyā visesanattepi ekantanapuṃsakattā saraṇasaddassa
anya-e0812n:43_5: na liṅgaparivattanabhāvo. Pāṇinanti rassattaṃ, dīghassa byabhicārattā. Mayhanti ekavacanena
anya-e0812n:43_6: attano sādhuguṇodayakāraṇaṃ niratimānataṃ dīpeti. Santesupi aññesu jinapariyāyesu
anya-e0812n:43_8: ocityaṃ posetīti payutto. Tathā hi tādisassa mukhaṃ ambhojatulyaṃ, tasmiṃ mukhodare
anya-e0812n:43_9: sambhavā sundarī, tatoyeva pāṇinaṃ saraṇaṃ. Tasmāyeva manosampīṇane paṭuttaṃ subyattamiti
anya-e0812n:43_10: ocityaṃ hoti. Loke patthaṭamidamocityamādaraṇīyaṃ hoti. Tasmiñhi uttamakavayoyeva
anya-e0812n:49: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0812n:50_4: rāmasammādayo vā taṃsambandhato. Bhavati hi taṃsambandhato tabbohāro yathā kiñcipi
anya-e0812n:50_6: ganthavisesā vā. Santo sobhanā. Dvepi purā pubbakāle bhavā purātanā, porāṇikā. Ubhopi
anya-e0812n:50_7: santi. Yajjapi saṃvijjanti. Tathāpi tūti nipātasamudāyoyaṃ visesābhidhānārambhe.
anya-e0812n:50_8: Evaṃ santepīti attho. Suddhamāgadhikāti magadhesu bhavā, tattha viditā vā magadhā,
anya-e0812n:50_9: saddā. Te etesaṃ santi, tesu vā niyuttāti māgadhikā. Suddhā ca sakkaṭādibhāsitakālusiyābhāvena
anya-e0812n:50_10: visuddhā, asammissā vā aparicitattā te māgadhikā cāti suddhamāgadhikā, yatipotā.
anya-e0812n:50_11: Te yathāvutte alaṅkāre ābharaṇavisese na vaḷañjenti, pasādhanavisese nānubhavanti.
anya-e0812n:50_12: Ganthavisese pana uggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena attano suddhamāgadhikattā, rāmasammādīnañca
anya-e0812n:50_13: sakkaṭādibhāvatoti ayamettha saddattho. Bhāvatthalesopettha paripūrati, tathāvidhapatītiyogato.
anya-e0812n:50_14: Suddhamāgadhikā attano parisuddhabhāvena pubbe sobhanāpi te alaṅkārā idāni malaggahitabhāvappattā
anya-e0812n:50_15: “kiṃ tehi malaggahitehi amhādisānaṃ suddhasattāna”nti na vaḷañjentīti.
anya-e0812n:56_0: 2. Santo viññūhi pasatthattā sobhanā purātanā pubbakālasambhūtā rāmasammādyalaṅkārā
anya-e0812n:56_1: rāmasammādīhi ācariyehi viracitattā, tesaṃ taṃsambandhato tabbohārasadisanāmattā
anya-e0812n:56_2: vā rāmasammādayo nāma alaṅkārā kismiñci vejjasatthe “bimbisāro”ti vohāro viya. Alaṅkārā
anya-e0812n:56_3: bhūsāvisesā, alaṅkārattapaṭipādanato alaṅkāranāmikā ganthavisesā vā santi kiñcāpi
anya-e0812n:56_4: vijjanti, tathāpi tu evaṃ santepi suddhamāgadhikā sakkaṭapākatādīsu aññabhāsāsu paricayābhāvato
anya-e0812n:56_5: kevalamāgadhikā te rāmasammādike alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti pasādhanavasena, uggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0812n:56_6: na sevanti. Magadhesu bhavā, tesu vā viditā magadhā, saddā. Te etesaṃ atthi, tesu
anya-e0812n:56_7: niyuttāti vā māgadhikā. Suddhasaddo magadhavisesano, māgadhikavisesano vā hoti. Saddānaṃ
anya-e0812n:56_8: tādisapatītivisesayogato bhāvatthalesopi idha dippati. Tathā hi suddhamāgadhikā attano
anya-e0812n:56_9: suddhattā tesaṃ vinyāsena sobhanatte satipi bhāsāya purātanattā aparisuddhoti avamaññamānā
anya-e0812n:56_10: na vaḷañjentīti. Vatticchitassatthassa upatthambhakabhūto bhāvatthalesopi mahākavīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:61_0: Tassattho – mahākavīnaṃ pūjitakavīnaṃ vāṇīsu vacanavisesesu patīyamānaṃ gammamānaṃ
anya-e0812n:61_1: yaṃ kiñci vatthu yo koci atthaleso attheva atthi eva, taṃ vatthu aṅganāsu vanitāsu
anya-e0812n:61_3: viya pasiddhāvayavātirittaṃ pakāsasaddāvayavato adhikaṃ hutvā ābhāti dippatīti.
anya-e0812n:66_0: 3. Teneccādi. Yena te alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti, tena kāraṇena alaṅkāravajjite ābharaṇehi,
anya-e0812n:66_1: ganthavisesehi vā rahite, alaṅkārā vā yathāvuttavajjitā yehi te, ete yatipote esaṃ
anya-e0812n:66_3: ca anucchavikena alaṅkārena ābharaṇena, alaṅkārasatthena vā toseyyaṃ apināma yathicchitapasādhanavasena,
anya-e0812n:66_4: savanadhāraṇādivasena vā vaḷañjanena santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ appeva nāma yannūnāti eso
anya-e0812n:67_0: Alaṅkaronti attabhāvamanenāti alaṅkāro, ābharaṇaṃ hārakeyūrādi. Alaṅkaronti bandhasarīramanenāti
anya-e0812n:67_1: alaṅkārotiminā pana alaṅkārasaddena pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā, sabhāvavutyādayo ca
anya-e0812n:67_2: atthālaṅkārā nānappakārā saṅgahitā, yehi saddatthasaṅkhātaṃ bandhasarīraṃ sobhate,
anya-e0812n:67_3: yathā hi purisasarīre hārakeyūrādyalaṅkāro nyasyate, yena sobhate, tathā bandhasarīrepi
anya-e0812n:67_4: saddālaṅkārā, atthālaṅkārā ca nikkhipīyanti, yato sobhate. Teneva vakkhati “taṃ tu
anya-e0812n:68_0: Alaṅkāravidhānabhāvena tu bandhasarīrampi tadatthiyā alaṅkāro, tathā tappaṭipādakaṃ
anya-e0812n:68_2: hi “ganthopi kavivācāna-malaṅkārappakāsako” subodhālaṅkāra 12 gāthā ccādi. Atra uccate –
anya-e0812n:71_0: Anenassābhidheyyādīni vuccanti. Abhidhīyate iti abhidheyyaṃ, samuditena satthena
anya-e0812n:71_1: vacanīyattho. So ca sarīrālaṅkāravibhāgakappanāya tesaṃ paṭipādanaṃ. Subodhālaṅkārena
anya-e0812n:71_2: hi te paṭipādīyanti. Yena ca yo paṭipādīyati, tassāyamattho bhavatīti abhidheyyasatthopi.
anya-e0812n:71_3: Dassitameva tu sarīrālaṅkārasaṅkharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ, taṃ nissāya subodhālaṅkārappavattito.
anya-e0812n:71_4: Yassa hi yamuddissa pavatti hoti, taṃ tassa payojanaṃ, taṃ pana kavittakittipasiddhādilakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n:74: Abhidheyyādikathanañca taṃsamaṅgisseva ca vīmaṃsāvisesasamaṅgīnamupādīyamānattā, aññādisassa pana ummattakavacanādino viya heyyattā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0812n:78_0: 3. Yena te te alaṅkārena vaḷañjenti, tena kāraṇena alaṅkāravajjite ābharaṇavisesehi,
anya-e0812n:78_1: ganthavisesehi vā vajjite, te virahite yehi ete suddhamāgadhike esaṃ suddhamāgadhikānaṃ
anya-e0812n:78_3: vā anukūlena alaṅkārena ābharaṇavisesena, ganthavisesena vā toseyyaṃ alaṅkāravaḷañjāpanena,
anya-e0812n:78_4: ganthavisese ganthavisaye (ka.) uggahaṇadhāraṇādikārāpanena vā santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ
anya-e0812n:78_5: apināma yaṃnūna sundaramiti, eso parissamo ayaṃ mama alaṅkārapakaraṇappayogo. Apināmāti
anya-e0812n:79_0: Alaṅkārehi vajjitā, alaṅkārā vajjitā yehi vāti ca. Rūpassa anu anurūpaṃ, rūpaṃ anugataṃ
anya-e0812n:79_1: anurūpaṃ vā, tena anurūpena. Alaṅkaronti attabhāvamaneneti alaṅkāro, hārakeyūrādi
anya-e0812n:79_2: ābharaṇapakkhe, ganthapakkhe tu alaṅkaronti bandhasarīramaneneti alaṅkāro. Iminā
anya-e0812n:79_3: mukhyabhāvena pasādādisaddālaṅkārā ca sabhāvavutyādiatthālaṅkārā ca pavuccanti. Amukhyato
anya-e0812n:79_5: viya alaṅkārapakāsakaṃ “sammā bujjhanti dvippakārā alaṅkārā anene”ti iminā atthena
anya-e0812n:82: Ettha sāmatthiyaṃ nāma tadādhāratappaṭipādakattavohārato tadādheyyatappaṭipādanīyaṃ na bhavati ce, aññaṃ kiṃ bhavatīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇamevāti.
anya-e0812n:87: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi gurūnī’ha garūniha (ka.);
anya-e0812n:89: 4-5. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārambhapaṭikkhepakajanapaṭibāhanapubbakamabhidheyyādikaṃ dassetvā idāni satthatova sabbattha guṇadosavivecanaṃ. Atoyeva vuccati –
anya-e0812n:91: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n:92: Tasmā guṇadosavibhāgavicāraṇaṃ nāma tabbidūnaṃyeva, nāsatthaññūnaṃ purisapasūnaṃ. Tathā cāha –
anya-e0812n:95_0: Yenevaṃ, tenettha guṇadosadassane pasannānekasatthacakkhuyevādhigato, nañño tabbiparītotyanvayabyatirekavasena
anya-e0812n:95_1: dassento “yesa”ntiādigāthādvayamāha. Tattha yesanti aniyamuddeso, yehīti attho. Yehi
anya-e0812n:95_2: na sañcitā na rāsikatā, nānāsantānavuttinīpi ekattanayena ekasmiṃ santāne na vāsitā
anya-e0812n:95_3: naparibhāvitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kā sā? Paññā heyyopādeyyavivekarūpā. Kīdisīti āha “anekasatthantarocitā”ti.
anya-e0812n:95_5: paricitā sāyaṃ paññā yesaṃ na sañcitāti pakataṃ. Eteti yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ niyamavacanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:95_6: Sammohabbhāhatāti yathāvuttāyātisayavatiyā paññāyābhāvato balappattena mohena abbhāhatā
anya-e0812n:95_7: visesena pahatā, evasadditā hontīti adhippāyo. Yato evaṃ, tasmāpi kiñcipi heyyopādeyyarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:95_9: sayālābhena nāvabujjhanti, na jānantītyattho. Yato ālasiyādidosalesapariggahopi satatācariyasevanavasena
anya-e0812n:100_0: Tato etādiso paññavāyevettha guṇadosavibhāgavivecane adhikārī, nañño tabbiparīto
anya-e0812n:100_1: purisapasūti ayametthādhippāyo. Ruḷho atthaviseso. Tenāha “kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā,
anya-e0812n:100_2: yesaṃ natthi gurūnihā”ti. Ihāti imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā
anya-e0812n:100_3: pādaparicariyā natthi, tehi janehi yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyarasānabhiññehi
anya-e0812n:100_4: kiṃ payojanaṃ, lesamattampi natthi, anadhigatāyevettha eteti adhippāyo. Idāni byatirekamukhena
anya-e0812n:100_5: āha “ye”tiādi. Ye pubbe katapuññatādisampattisampannā tappādarajehi tesaṃ gurūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:100_6: pādadhūlīhi okiṇṇā onaddhā gavacchitā, teva sādhū yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyena
anya-e0812n:100_8: honti, teyevettha guṇadosavivecane adhigatāti adhippāyo. Sā cāyaṃ gurupādasussūsā
anya-e0812n:100_9: visiṭṭhādarena karaṇīyāti vaṅkavuttiyā tadabhyāse sādhujane niyojeti.
anya-e0812n:101_0: 4-5. Ye sakalasatthaparicitaññāṇapāṭavā yadi dosamāropayanti, tesaṃ taddosanirākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:101_1: vinā padesāvabodhanamattena paṇḍitamānīnaṃ vacanassāgurukaraṇaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā dassento
anya-e0812n:101_2: ca taṃdvāreneva attano anaññasādhāraṇagurugāravataṃ sādhujanehi paramādarena sampādetabbamiti
anya-e0812n:101_4: anekesaṃ ganthānaṃ antare tatvatthasaṅkhātaabbhantare ucitā savanauggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0812n:101_5: paricitā paññā sutamayā paññā yesaṃ yehi na sañcitā, dvinnamekakkhaṇe pavattiyābhāvepi
anya-e0812n:101_7: avatthabāhullapavattito vā sañcitabbāpi na rāsikatā. Ete īdisapaññāpāṭavarahitā ime
anya-e0812n:101_8: sammohabbhāhatā paññāpāṭavābhāvato balappattena mohena visesena pahatā eva kiñcipi
anya-e0812n:101_9: heyyopādeyyaṃ nāvabujjhanti. Na eke aneketi ca, te ca te satthā ceti ca, tesamantaramiti
anya-e0812n:101_10: ca, tasmiṃ ucitāti ca sammohena abbhāhatāti ca viggaho. Tena vuttaṃ–
anya-e0812n:104_0: Tassattho – asatthaññū jano guṇadosaṃ kathaṃ vibhajate. Tathā hi rūpabhedopaladdhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n:104_1: nīlapītādirūpavisesāvabodhane andhassa adhikāro abhimukhakaraṇaṃ kiṃ hoti, na bhavatyeva,
anya-e0812n:106: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n:107_0: Tassattho – sabbattha guṇadosavivecanaṃ satthatoyeva hoti, satthaṃ vinā satthocitatādisapaññaṃ
anya-e0812n:107_1: vinā yaṃ karoti guṇāguṇavibhāgaṃ karoti, yaṃ karaṇaṃ atthi, atodhikaṃ sāhasaṃ kiṃ
anya-e0812n:108: Iha imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ akatapuññānaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:113_0: Niddiṭṭhaguṇopetānaṃ ācariyānaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā pādaparicariyā natthi, tehi kiṃ
anya-e0812n:113_1: payojanaṃ. Ye katapuññā janā tappādarajokiṇṇā tesaṃ gurūnaṃ pādarajehi gavacchitā,
anya-e0812n:113_2: teva sādhū janā eva vivekino kalyāṇamittagurupāsanāhi adhigatavisiṭṭhavivekabuddhino
anya-e0812n:113_3: bhavanti, te eva vivekaṃ jānantīti bhāvo. Sotumicchā sussūsā, taṃ nissāya kattabbapādaparicariyāpi
anya-e0812n:113_4: tadatthiyā sussūsā nāma hoti. Pādesu sussūsāti ca, tesaṃ pādāti ca, tesu rajānīti
anya-e0812n:113_5: ca, tehi okiṇṇāti ca viggaho. Sissānaṃ sakalābhibuddhiyā gurupaṭibaddhattā attano
anya-e0812n:124_3: vuttajātibhedabhinnaṃ pajjamayaṃ gajjamayaṃ pajjagajjamayaṃ campūnāmakañca, mahāvākyarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:124_4: mahākabbañca, taṃ pana mahākabbaṃ saggehi sagganāmakehi paricchedavisesehi bandhyate
anya-e0812n:124_5: karīyatīti saggabandhoti pavuccati. Tassa tu lakkhaṇaṃ “saggabandhassa mukhaṃ iṭṭhāsīsanaṃ
anya-e0812n:124_6: siyā paṇāmo vā bandhasambandhino kassaci atthassa niddeso vā”tiādinā anekadhā vaṇṇenti. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0812n:136: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n:137_1: vā. Catuvaggaphalāyattanti dhammādicatuvaggaphalāyattaṃ. Dhammo nāma abbhūdayanibbānahetuko.
anya-e0812n:137_2: Attho nāma vijjābhumyādīnaṃ yathāññāyamajjanaṃ, ajjitānañca rakkhaṇaṃ. Kāmo nāma
anya-e0812n:137_3: nirayo visayo payogo. Mokkho nāma sabbasaṃsāradukkhanivatti. Caturodāttanāyakanti
anya-e0812n:137_4: ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogena caturo kusalo cāgātisayādiyogena udātto udāro
anya-e0812n:137_5: nāyako vipakkho, paṭipakkho ca yattha, taṃ. Madhu nāma surā. Vippalambho viraho.
anya-e0812n:137_6: Manto nītivedīhi saha kārīyanicchayo. Dūto sandhānappavatto puriso. Payānaṃ saṅgāmādinimittagamanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:137_7: Āji sandhyābhāve viggaho. Asaṅkhattarasabhāvanirantaranti asaṃkhittā bahuttā rasā
anya-e0812n:137_8: siṅgāravīrādayo, bhāvā ratiussāhādayo, tehi nirantaraṃ patthaṭaṃ. Piyavuttasusandhibhīti
anya-e0812n:137_9: piyāni sutisubhagāni vuttāni indavajirādīni aññamaññasambandhasaṃsaggatāya sobhano
anya-e0812n:138: Punapi yathāvuttesu aṅgesu nagaravaṇṇanādīsu kiñca yathāsambhavaṃ madhupānādirahitampi taññūnaṃ mano rañjeti upādiyateva sabbhīti dassetumāha–
anya-e0812n:145: Tajjayā nāyakukkaṃsa-kathanañca sukheti no”ti kābyādāsa 1.21 22 gāthā āhu.
anya-e0812n:147_0: Nāṭakaṃ nāma bharatādināṭyasatthe nānappakāranirūpitarūpaṃ kappaṃ, taṃlakkhaṇekadesabhūtalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0812n:147_1: pakaraṇādīni nava rūpakāni. Nāṭikā ca etthevāvarumbhanti. Kabbañca nāṭakañca, tesu
anya-e0812n:147_2: nikkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ nettañca cittañca yehīti viggaho. Ke te? Kavino. Tattha nikkhittanettacittavacanena
anya-e0812n:147_4: nicchitassa bhāvanā, nirantarābhiyogo ca dassito. Kabbanāṭakavacanena sutaṃ, cintitaṃ,
anya-e0812n:147_5: bhāvitañca dassitaṃ. Sute dassite tannissayaṃ sutamayañāṇampi dassitameva siyāti.
anya-e0812n:147_7: kabbaracanāya sāmatthiyaṃ dasseti. Hoti hi tādisānaṃ taṃsutādi bandhanakāraṇaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:152_0: Yaṃkiñcīti attano cittāruḷhaṃ yaṃkiñci bandhajātaṃ. Iminā pana aniyamavacanena attano
anya-e0812n:152_1: tattha ādarābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Racayanti karonti. Etaṃ tehi racitaṃ bandhajātaṃ paraṃ
anya-e0812n:152_2: accantameva vimhayakaraṃ na hoti, tādisopāyasampattisampannassa upeyyasampattisabbhāvato
anya-e0812n:152_3: anacchariyamevāti adhippāyo. Tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu racanāvisesaekantopāyabhūtesu
anya-e0812n:152_4: avihitādarāapi sutādivasena akatādarāpi ye sappurisā paññavanto yena bandhavisesena
anya-e0812n:152_5: viññū guṇadosaviduno satthaññuno paṇḍitajane tosenti pīṇenti. Tosentiyeva hi te tādise
anya-e0812n:152_6: sābhāvikipaṭibhāvirahepi etādisesu atthesu sutacintābhāvanāvasena vāyamantā. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:157_0: Paṭibhāvanto heyyopādeyyaparicchedalakkhaṇapaññāya paññavanto nāma, teyeva sappurisā.
anya-e0812n:157_1: Savimhayo “kīdisāyaṃ, tādisopāyantararahitānampi etādiso bandho siyā”ti vimhayena
anya-e0812n:157_2: saha vattamānopi. Sova bandho tameva bandhanaṃ tādisopāyasampattivirahenopeyyasampattiyā
anya-e0812n:158_3: yaṃ kiñci attano abhimataṃ racayanti karonti, etaṃ bandhanaṃ paraṃ atisayena na vimhayakaraṃ
anya-e0812n:158_4: acchariyakaraṃ na hoti, nirantarābhiyogato siddhopāyamūlapaññāsampadāya upeyyabhūtaganthasaṅkharaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:158_5: bhavatyevāti adhippāyo. Kavino idaṃ kabbanti ca, naṭakassa idaṃ nāṭakaṃ, naccagītādi.
anya-e0812n:158_6: Idha pana tappaṭipādakakathāpakāsakagantho nāṭakaṃ nāma. Kabbañca nāṭakañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n:158_7: kabbanāṭakesu nikkhittaṃ nettacittaṃ yehīti ca viggaho. Ye janā tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu
anya-e0812n:158_8: avihitādarāpi savanadhāraṇādivasena akatasambhamā eva viññū yena gantharacanāvisesena
anya-e0812n:158_9: tosenti pīṇenti, teyeva paṭibhāvanto paṭibhānasaṅkhātapaññavanto bhavanti. Sova bandho
anya-e0812n:158_10: savimhayo aññesaṃ uppajjamānavimhayena sahito. Paṭibhā etesaṃ atthīti ca, saha vimhayena
anya-e0812n:158_11: vattatīti ca, avihito ādaro yehīti ca viggaho. Bāhirasatthābhiyogābhāvepi pubbavāsanābhāvepi
anya-e0812n:158_12: iha nirantarābhiyogaṃ karonto tādisasāmatthiyaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:163_0: Tassattho – yadi pubbavāsanāguṇānubandhī atītajātiyā paricayavāsanāguṇassa anubalappadānavasena
anya-e0812n:163_1: anubandho yassatthi, tādisaṃ abbhutaṃ paṭibhānaṃ na vijjatipi, tathāpi sutena savanena
anya-e0812n:163_2: ussahanena paguṇakaraṇādivācussahanena vā upāsitā katagurupāsanā vācā kamapi anuggahaṃ
anya-e0812n:163_3: kiñcipi paññāpāṭavaṃ dhuvaṃ ekantena karoti evāti.
anya-e0812n:164_0: Ettha kabbaṃ nāma muttakakulakādivākyavasena ca avayavasabhāvehi tesaṃyeva antaravākyāvayavasamūhehi
anya-e0812n:164_1: paripuṇṇaṃ vuttavisesehi pabhedagataṃ kevalaṃ pajjamayaṃ vā gajjamayaṃ vā campūtikhyātapajjagajjamayaṃ
anya-e0812n:164_2: vāti mahāvākyasabhāvena ca tiṭṭhati. Nāṭakaṃ nāma bharatādinaṭasatthagatanānappakāradassitasabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0812n:164_3: Kabbañca idheva dassitalakkhaṇato ekadesayuttappakaraṇādinavarūpakāni ca nāṭikā ca
anya-e0812n:176: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n:177_1: uccate. Assa lakkhaṇaṃ tu vuccateti sambandho kākakkhigoḷakanayena tammukhaṃ tassa
anya-e0812n:177_2: kabbassa ādi pana paṇāmo devatānamassanaṃ vā, vatthuniddeso –
anya-e0812n:182: Iccādibandhasambandhino kassaci vatthuno dassanaṃ, āsīsāpi “mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ mana” miccādiiṭṭhāsīsanaṃ vā bhavati.
anya-e0812n:183_2: vijjābhūmiādīnaṃ sañcayo, sañcitānaṃ rakkhā ca attho, apāyasaṃvattanikapañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n:183_3: kāmo, sabbadukkhā nivattihetu mokkho cāti catuvaggaphalādhīnaṃ caturodāttanāyakaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_4: ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogato caturo dakkho cāgātisayādiyogena udātto uḷāro
anya-e0812n:183_5: sapakkho, vipakkho vā nāyako yattha, taṃ yathāvuttaṃ puraṇṇavutuselindu-savitūdayavaṇṇanaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_6: puraṃ nagaraṃ, aṇṇavaṃ sāgaraṃ, utu hemantavasantādiutu, selaṃ pabbato, indusavitūdayo
anya-e0812n:183_7: candasūriyānaṃ udayo cāti imesaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yattha, taṃ. Savitāti ettha tupaccayanto.
anya-e0812n:183_9: taṃ vippalambhavivāhehi dārāviyogadārapariggahehi ca kumārodayavaḍḍhihi kumāruppattikumāravaḍḍhīhi
anya-e0812n:183_10: ca mantadūtappayānājināyakābhyūdayehi nītijānanapaññā manto, sandhānakārako dūto,
anya-e0812n:183_11: yuddhābhigamanaṃ payānaṃ, yuddhasaṅkhāto āji, sapakkhanāyakassa abhivaḍḍhisaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n:183_12: abhyūdayo cāti imehi alaṅkataṃ sajjitaṃ asaṃkhitta…pe… ntaraṃ asaṃkhittā vitthārā
anya-e0812n:183_13: rasā siṅgārādayo aṭṭha bhāvā ratiussāhādayo cāti imehi nirantaraṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ piyavuttasusandhibhi
anya-e0812n:183_14: sutisubhagehi indavajirādīhi vuttehi pubbāparasambandhaparicchedatāya sobhanā sandhi
anya-e0812n:183_15: yesaṃ saggānaṃ, tehi sabbattha sabbasmiṃ paricchede bhinnasaggantehi bhinnasaggā
anya-e0812n:183_16: pariyosānā yesaṃ, tehi nātivitthiṇṇasaggehi nātivitthārasaggasaṅkhātehi paricchedehi
anya-e0812n:183_17: upetaṃ yuttaṃ sādhvalaṅkati sobhanālaṅkāravantaṃ kabbaṃ lokarañjakaṃ taṃ samānaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_18: kappantaraṭṭhāyi kappanirantaraṭṭhāyi kappantare ṭhāyi vā jāyate. Ettha madhupānādirahitapuravaṇṇanādayopi
anya-e0812n:183_19: taññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti ce, taṃpyaduṭṭhaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:186_0: Tassattho – atra imesu kabbaṅgesu majjhe kehici aṅgehi kehici avayavehi nyūnamapi
anya-e0812n:186_1: ūnamapi, nisaddotratabbhāve. Kabbaṃ na dussati, taṃ pana adussanaṃ bandhaṅgasampadā
anya-e0812n:186_2: racitapuravaṇṇanādiaṅgasampadā taññū kabbaññū jane kāmaṃ icchānurūpaṃ ce ārādhayanti,
anya-e0812n:186_3: evaṃ sante bhavati. Punapi nāyakavaṇṇanāsu sapakkhanāyakaṃ vaṇṇetvā tena nirākaraṇabhāvampi.
anya-e0812n:186_4: No ce, paccatthikaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano nāyakena tassābhibhavanampi vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:192: Bandho ca nāma saddatthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0812n:194_0: 8. Evametehi sotujanasamussāhanaṃ dassetvā idāni kattumicchitabandhoti vuttaṃ bandhassa
anya-e0812n:194_1: lakkhaṇaṃ kattumārabhate “bandho cā”tiādi. Dosavajjitā dosehi saddanissitehi, atthanissitehi
anya-e0812n:194_2: ca virodhehi vajjitā pariccattā, te vā vajjitā yehi, saddatthā sahitā ekībhūtā. Vuttalakkhaṇā
anya-e0812n:194_3: yehi te pubbācariyehi sahitā vuccanti. Sahitānaṃ bhāvo sahadayahilādakāraṇaṃ sādhyaṃ
anya-e0812n:194_4: sāhiccaṃ. Iti dosavajjite sahite saddatthe pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā bandho nāma
anya-e0812n:194_6: yathā “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti. Casaddovattabbantarassa samuccayo, kiñcīti attho.
anya-e0812n:195_0: Tattha jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇo saddānamattho mukhyo catubbidho hoti. Mukhyassatthassa
anya-e0812n:195_1: catubbidhattā tividhesu saddesu tabbācako catubbidho hoti jātisaddo guṇasaddo kriyāsaddo
anya-e0812n:195_2: dabbasaddoti. Tividho hi saddo vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjakoti byāpārabhedena. Byāpāro
anya-e0812n:195_3: ca nāma saddassa’tthappatītikārittameva. So hi tividho mukhyo lakkhaṇo byañjanasabhāvo
anya-e0812n:195_4: ceti. Tattha jātyādinirantaratthavisayo saddabyāpāro mukhyo. Soyeva abhidhāti uccate.
anya-e0812n:195_5: Taṃbyāpāravā abyavahitajātyādisakehi tamatthaṃ mukhyabhāvena yo vadati goādiko, so
anya-e0812n:195_6: vācako. Saddantaratthavisayaniddiṭṭho saddabyāpāro lakkhaṇo. Sā duvidhā suddhā, upacāramissā
anya-e0812n:195_7: ceti. Tattha suddhā yathā “go muccatu, mañcā ugghosenti, gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso”ti. Ettha
anya-e0812n:195_8: gosaddena visesanaṃ gottasāmaññamevoccate, na tu gobyatti. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n:196: “Visesyaṃnābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n:197_0: Sāmaññassa byāpakattā, asarīrattā ca. Tattha bandhanamocanāni na sambhavantīti attano
anya-e0812n:197_1: nissayabhūtā gobyatti ākaḍḍhīyate, tathā mañcānamugghosanaṃ na sambhavatīti attano
anya-e0812n:197_2: ugghosanakriyāsiddhyatthaṃ mañcasamaṅgino purisā ākaḍḍhīyanti. Tathā gaṅgāsaddavāccassa
anya-e0812n:197_3: jalappavāhassa ghosappatyākaratā na sambhavatīti gaṅgāsaddo attanobhidheyyassodakappavāhassa
anya-e0812n:197_4: nikaṭaṃ taṭaṃ lakkheti. Upacārassānekappakārattā upacāramissā lakkhaṇāpyanekadhā
anya-e0812n:197_5: siyā. Yathā katthaci kāraṇe kārīyamupacariyate, yathā “āyu ghata”nti. Katthaci kāraṇakāriyānamabhedo
anya-e0812n:197_6: yathā “āyuyeveda”nti. Katthaci upamāne upameyyamupacarīyate, yathā “go bāhiko”ti.
anya-e0812n:197_7: Katthaci abhedo tesaṃ, yathā “goyevāya”nti. Katthaci tadādhāratāya tadatthatāya (ka.)
anya-e0812n:197_8: taṃbyapadeso, yathā “padīpaṭṭhā kapallikā padīpo”ti. Katthaci taṃkammasambandhā taṃbyapadeso,
anya-e0812n:197_9: yathā “avaḍḍhakīpi vaḍḍhakī aya”nti. Katthaci saṃsāmisambandhā, yathā “rājasambandhī
anya-e0812n:197_10: puriso rājāya”nti. Katthaci avayave samudāyabyapadeso, yathā “paṭekadese paṭasaddo” iccādi.
anya-e0812n:198_0: Lakkhaṇāya nissayo saddo lakkhaṇiko. Byañjanasabhāvo pana parapariyāyo saddassa tatiyo
anya-e0812n:198_1: byāpāro. Tassa nissayo saddo byañjanako. Iccetaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saddānaṃ vasena atthopi tividho
anya-e0812n:198_2: hoti vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyoti. Tattha byaṅgyoyevattho bandhasatthā vuccate. Teneva
anya-e0812n:198_3: padhānabyaṅgyo bandho uttamo, apadhānabyaṅgyo majjhimo, abyaṅgyo adhamo, byaṅgyena
anya-e0812n:198_4: vinā bandho nijjīvo siyāti pubbācariyānaṃ pavatti, sabhāvavutti bandhopi tu nijjīvoti
anya-e0812n:198_5: nāsaṅkanīyo. Yasmā kavīnaṃ lokavohārakosallaṃ sabhāvavuttiyeva gameti. Yo hi sakalalokaṭṭhitiṃ
anya-e0812n:198_6: na jānāti, so kaviyeva na hotīti.
anya-e0812n:199_1: Ettha vāṇīsaddassa saddhammasaṅkhāto attho vāccattho. Vāṇī nāma cetanā, tassaṃ yāva
anya-e0812n:199_2: devatatthaṃ nāropyate, tāva tappatī attano manosampīṇanaāsīsanā na saṃgacchatīti
anya-e0812n:199_3: vākyasāmatthiyāyeva vāṇiyaṃ sāyamocityabhedena devatāsaddassa āropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n:199_4: Tathā vadanasaddassāpi mukhaṃ vāccattho. Ambhojasaddassa samāropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n:199_5: Manosampīṇanassa tu aññathā anupapattiyā passaddhyādikkamena yathābhūtāvabodhasambhavā
anya-e0812n:199_7: hoteva, ayaṃ byaṅgyattho. Tabbācakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjakā hontīti evaṃ sabbattha
anya-e0812n:200_0: Tamevaṃ yathāvuttabandhasarīraṃ katividhamiccāha “pajje”ccādi. Ayaṃ yathāvutto bandho
anya-e0812n:200_1: bandhasarīraṃ tidhā bhave tippakārena siyā, nādhikaṃ nāpyūnaṃ. Kathaṃ? Pajjagajjavimissānaṃ
anya-e0812n:200_2: bhedena pajjasabhāvādīnaṃ visesena tidhā bhaveti pakataṃ. Tattha pajjaṃ nāma amhehiyeva
anya-e0812n:200_3: viracitavuttodayākhye chandasi nirūpitā vuttajātippabhedā catuppadikatthā nirūpito
anya-e0812n:200_4: muttakādipi vuttajātippakāroyeva. Tenevettha tesamadassanaṃ. Tesu ekagāthā niṭṭhitatthā
anya-e0812n:200_5: sappadhānā gāthantarānirapekkhā muttakaṃ, ekakriyādānena aññamaññasāpekkhā niṭṭhitatthā
anya-e0812n:200_6: paccekaṃ aniṭṭhitatthā gāthā kulakaṃ, nānābhittiyo bhinnakiriyo sappadhānā gāthā
anya-e0812n:200_7: koso viya ṭhapitā koso, ekabhittipadosādikaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ samudāyena pavattā bhinnakriyā
anya-e0812n:200_8: gāthā saṅghāto, sopi catubbidho pajjappakāro yathāvuttasaggabandhovāti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:200_9: Gajjaṃ nāma pādasanniṭṭhānarahito syādyantatyādyantappabandho. Tassa tu dve pakārā
anya-e0812n:200_10: ākhyāyikā, kathāti. Vimissaṃ pajjagajjamayaṃ nāṭakappakaraṇādi, campū jātakamālādikā ca.
anya-e0812n:201_0: 8. Idāni sañjānanābhilāsīnaṃ alaṅkāranissitaṃ bandhasarīraṃ, sova bandhoti adhikataṃ,
anya-e0812n:201_1: “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti pasiddhakuṇḍalittānuvādena appasiddhassa devadattattavidhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:201_2: viya dassento “bandho”ccādimāha. Tattha bandho nāma ca bandhanaṃ pana. Dosavajjitā
anya-e0812n:201_3: saddatthanissitadosehi pariccattā, te vā vajjitā etehi tādisā. Sahitā aññamaññānurūpatthena
anya-e0812n:201_4: sahabhāvaṃ gatā. Saddatthā saddo, attho ca. Evaṃpakārehi tu īdisasaddatthānaṃ viññūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:201_6: Saddatthāti ettha saddatthānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Saddo pana atthappatītiyaṃ attano
anya-e0812n:201_8: Kamato vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjanako ceti tividho. Tathā atthopi vācco lakkhaṇiyo
anya-e0812n:201_9: byaṅgyo cebhi tividho. Atra tu vācako saddo attanā dīpetabbamukhyatthassa jātiguṇakriyādabbabhedena
anya-e0812n:201_10: catubbidhattā sayampi jātiguṇakriyādabbasaddavasena catubbidho. Vācakasaddassa mukhyabyāpāro
anya-e0812n:201_11: “abhidhā”ti ca voharīyati. So mukhyabyāpāro jātyādīhi abyavahitattheva vattate. Tathā
anya-e0812n:201_12: hi “go nīlaṃ pācako visāṇi”ccādo goādisaddānaṃ mukhyabyāpāro gopiṇḍanīlapaṭapācakakattusiṅgīti
anya-e0812n:201_13: dabbānaṃ visesanabhūtajātiguṇakriyādabbesveva pavattati, na pana jātyādīnaṃ nissayabhūtagopiṇḍādīsūti. Vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0812n:202: “Visesyaṃ nābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n:203: Tassattho – visesane visesanabhūtajātyādimhi khīṇasatti khīṇabyāpāravatī abhidhā mukhyabyāpārova visesyaṃ dabbaṃ na gacche na pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0812n:204_0: Jātyādīnaṃ nissayagopiṇḍādikaṃ abhidhā na vadati ce, evañca sati “go gacchati, nīlaṃ
anya-e0812n:204_1: nivāseti, pācako āgacchati, siṅgī dhāvati”ccādīsu jātyādivisiṭṭhagopiṇḍādīnaṃ goādisaddassa
anya-e0812n:204_2: kathaṃ vācakattaṃ yujjatīti? Dabbādhīnajātiguṇādīsu vuttesu tabbisiṭṭhassa dabbassa
anya-e0812n:204_3: pariyāyato vācakattā. Nippariyāyato pana suddhalakkhaṇabyāpārasseva visayo. Lakkhaṇabyāpāropi
anya-e0812n:204_4: suddho upacāramissoti duvidho. Tattha suddho lakkhaṇabyāpāro jātyādivajjitatthavisayo.
anya-e0812n:204_5: Tathā hi “go gacchati, nīlaṃ nivāseti, pācako āgacchati, siṅgī dhāvati, mañcā ugghosenti,
anya-e0812n:205_0: Misso tu upacārabhedena bahuvidho. Tathā hi katthaci kāraṇe kāriyamupacarīyate, yathā
anya-e0812n:205_1: “āyughata”nti, ettha āyuvaḍḍhanakāraṇabhūte ghate kāriyabhūtaāyuno vohāro āropito
anya-e0812n:205_2: hoti. Uparipi upacāro yathāyogaṃ yojetabbo. Ataṃsabhāve hi taṃsabhāvāropanaṃ upacāro.
anya-e0812n:205_3: Katthaci kāraṇakāriyānamabhedo, yathā “āyuyeva ghata”nti. Katthaci upameyyaupamānopacāro,
anya-e0812n:205_4: yathā “go bāhiko”ti. Katthaci upamānaupameyyānamabhedo, yathā “goyevāyaṃ bāhiko”ti.
anya-e0812n:205_5: Katthaci tadādhāratāya tadūpacāro, yathā “padīpaṭṭhā kapallikā padīpo”ti. Katthaci
anya-e0812n:205_6: kriyāsambandhena taṃbyapadeso, yathā “avaḍḍhakīpi vaḍḍhakī aya”nti. Katthaci saṃsāmisambandhena
anya-e0812n:205_7: taṃbyapadeso, yathā “rājavallabhopi rājā aya”nti. Katthaci avayave samudāyabyapadeso,
anya-e0812n:205_8: yathā “paṭo daḍḍho”ti. Iminā mukhena upacārabhedo daṭṭhabbo. Byañjanasabhāvabyāpāro
anya-e0812n:205_9: eva “dhana”nti ca vuccati, tassa tatiyabyāpārassa visayo tādisavākyameva vāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:206: Ettha byaṅgyatthaṃ bandhassa jīvitamiti ca, byaṅgyatthapadhānaṃ bandhamuttamanti ca, byaṅgyatthapadhānarahitaṃ majjhimanti ca, abyaṅgyabandhaṃ adhamamiti ca vadanti. Honti cettha –
anya-e0812n:220: Byañjako tu anaññattā, visuṃ tehi na vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n:221_0: Lakkhaṇato evaṃ veditabbaṃ – “munindavadanambhoje” tyādigāthāyaṃ vadanasaddassa mukhattho
anya-e0812n:221_1: vāccattho, āropitaambhojattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Ambhojasaddassa padumattho vāccattho,
anya-e0812n:221_2: upacaritamukhattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Vāṇisaddassa saddhammasaṅkhāto attho vāccattho,
anya-e0812n:221_3: āropitadevatāattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Ettha āsīsanā nāma yathāvuttanayena puññātisayatā,
anya-e0812n:221_4: tato idha abhimatatthabādhakākusalanivāraṇañca kusalānamanubalappadānañca tato kāyacittapīḷāvigamo
anya-e0812n:221_5: ca tato sukhappaṭilābho ca tato cittasamādhānañca tatoyeva anekavidhatthāvabodho
anya-e0812n:221_6: ca tato abhimataganthaparisamatti ca bhavatītyayaṃ vākyasāmatthiyato laddhattho byaṅgyatto.
anya-e0812n:221_7: Taṃtaṃatthappakāsakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjanakā nāma bhavanti. Evaṃ saddasaddatthavicāro veditabbo.
anya-e0812n:222_0: Idāni pakāsitabandhassa bhedaṃ vadati “pajjā”dinā. Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo bandho pajjagajjavimissānaṃ
anya-e0812n:222_1: bhedena gāthācuṇṇiyatadubhayamissānaṃ vasena tidhā bhave. Saddo ca attho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:222_2: sahabhāvaṃ itā pattāti ca, dosehi vajjitā, dose vā vajjitā yehīti ca, pajjañca gajjañca
anya-e0812n:222_3: vimissañceti ca viggaho. Iha pajjaṃ nāma muttakakulakakosakasaṅghātavasena catuppabhedaṃ
anya-e0812n:222_4: chandasi niddiṭṭhavuttavisesaviracitaṃ catuppadikagāthābandhaṃ. Tattha muttakaṃ nāma
anya-e0812n:222_5: niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā ekā gāthā, kulakaṃ nāma paccekamaniṭṭhitatthā aññamaññasāpekkhā
anya-e0812n:222_6: ekakriyādvārikā nānāgāthā, kosako nāma nānāvidhavaṇṇanābhūmikā bhinnakriyādvārappavattā
anya-e0812n:222_7: sappadhānā gāthārāsi, saṅghāto nāma sañcyākālādiekavaṇṇanābhūminissitā bhinnakriyāsamudāyena
anya-e0812n:222_8: pavattā gāthā. Gajjaṃ nāma aniyatapado ākhyāyikākathāvasena dvippabhedo syādyantatyādyanto
anya-e0812n:222_9: vacanappabandho. Misso pana imehi dvīhi saṃmisso nāṭakapakaraṇādi ca jātakamālādicampū ca.
anya-e0812n:224: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0812n:226_0: 9. Evaṃ tippakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ vatvā idāni aññathāpi dassetumāha “nibandhocā’nibandho
anya-e0812n:226_1: ca, puna dvidhā niruppate” iti. Puna bhiyyo yathāvutto pajjamayabandho dvidhā dvippakārena
anya-e0812n:226_2: niruppate nicchīyate. Kathaṃ? Nibandho ca tadekadesabhūtehi muttakādīhi catūhi saggabandhādivasena
anya-e0812n:226_3: bandho ca anibandho ca kevalaṃ muttakavasenāti evaṃ dvidhā niruppate iti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n:226_4: Nanu tassetassa yathāvuttavātimayassa sakkaṭaṃ pākataṃ apabbhaṃso pesācikaṃ missañceti
anya-e0812n:226_5: pañcavidhattaṃ vatvā “sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā. Pākataṃ catubbidhaṃ sakkaṭehi vaṇṇaññattamattena
anya-e0812n:226_6: uppannattā mahindasindhavādi tabbhavaṃ, tassamaṃ hiriharakamalādi, mahāraṭṭhādidesapasiddhaṃ
anya-e0812n:226_7: desīyaṃ, tabbhavādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ. Ābhīrādīnaṃ vācā apabbhaṃso, so ca pākataṃ
anya-e0812n:226_8: viya catubbidho, tividho ca nāgaraupanāgaravuddhabhedena. Pisācānaṃ vacanaṃ pesācikaṃ.
anya-e0812n:226_9: Sabbesaṃ vasena missa”nti sakkaṭādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā “siṅgārappadhānanaccasaṅkhātalāsyādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:226_10: paṭipādakatthena lāsyādikamabhinayappadhānattā dassanīyaṃ, itaraṃ kabbaṃ savanīya”nti
anya-e0812n:226_11: duvidhaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ pubbācariyehi bhāsābhedena vuttaṃ pañcavidhattaṃ, viniyogabhedena
anya-e0812n:226_12: vuttaṃ duvidhattañca idha kasmā na vuttanti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi tadevamidhānupayogitāya
anya-e0812n:227_0: Evamalaṅkārādhiṭṭhānabhāvena paṭhamaṃ bandhasarīraṃ dassetvā idāni hārakeyūrādinā
anya-e0812n:227_1: purisasarīramiva bandhasarīraṃ saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi vindanīyataraṃ hotīti dassetumāha
anya-e0812n:227_2: “taṃ tu” iccādi. Tusaddo visesavacanicchāyaṃ. Taṃ bandhasarīraṃ tu alaṅkārā alaṅkariyati
anya-e0812n:227_3: taṃ bandhasarīrametehīti pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā, sabhāvavutyādayo atthālaṅkārā ca
anya-e0812n:227_4: vindanīyatarattanaṃ atisayena vindanīyabhāvaṃ assādanīyabhāvaṃ pāpenti nayanti. Sabbathā
anya-e0812n:227_5: niddosabhūtānaṃ saddatthānaṃ aññamaññānurūpato sahitabhāvena paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
anya-e0812n:227_6: samannāgataṃ tādisapurisasarīramiva vindanīyampi samānaṃ alaṅkārehi pasādhite sati
anya-e0812n:228_0: 9. Punapi tasseva bandhassa bhedaṃ kathetuṃ “nibandho cā”dimāha. Puna nibandho ca
anya-e0812n:228_1: muttakādīhi catūhi avinābhāvato mahākabbādisabhāvena nirantaraṃ katvā bandho ca anibandho
anya-e0812n:228_2: ca kevalaṃ mahākabbādisabhāvena muttakattā anirantaraṃ katvā bandho cāti sova bandho
anya-e0812n:228_3: dvidhā niruppate nicchīyate. Punapi so bandho sakkaṭapākataapabbhaṃ sapesācikamissabhāsābhedena
anya-e0812n:228_5: tadaññaṃ kabbaṃ savanīyamiti vaḷañjanabhedato duvidho ca hoti. So sabbopi payojanābhāvato
anya-e0812n:228_6: iha na gahito. Tattha sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā. Tato kehici akkharehi bhinnaṃ pākataṃ
anya-e0812n:228_7: nāma. Taṃ pana tabbhavatassamadesiyamissavasena catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha sakkaṭato
anya-e0812n:228_8: vaṇṇaññattamattena nibbattaṃ tabbhavaṃ nāma, taṃ mahindasindhavādi. Tassamaṃ hiriharakamalādi.
anya-e0812n:228_9: Dese pasiddhaṃ desiyaṃ. Missaṃ nāma tabbhavādīhi sammissaṃ. Apabbhaṃso nāma gopālakādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:228_10: vācā, so ca tabbhavādīhi catubbidho, nāgaraupanāgaravuddhabhedena tividho ca hoti.
anya-e0812n:228_11: Pisācānaṃ vacanaṃ pesācikaṃ. Tehi sakkaṭādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ nāma hoti. Idāni īdisappabhedavantabandhassa
anya-e0812n:228_12: alaṅkārena sobhanattaṃ vattuṃ “taṃ tu”ccādimāha. Taṃ tu taṃ pana vuttappakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ
anya-e0812n:228_14: atisayapasādanīyattaṃ pāpenti. Nirantaraṃ bandho nibandhoti ca, na nibandho anibandhoti
anya-e0812n:228_15: ca, atisayena vindanīyo vindanīyataro, tassa bhāvo vindanīyatarattananti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:232_1: piḷakatilakakāḷakādyanāhatāya ca sundarabhāvato agarahitaṃ mukhambhojaṃ vadanāravindañca
anya-e0812n:232_2: tathā anavajjā padādidosānabhibhūtāya sundarabhāvena agarahitā bhāratī ca vāṇī upacārato
anya-e0812n:232_3: tappaṭipādanīyo attho cāti ete alaṅkatāva mukhaṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādinālaṅkārena, saddatthā
anya-e0812n:232_4: saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi pasādhitā sajjitā eva, niralaṅkatā tathā apasādhitā asajjitā
anya-e0812n:232_5: sobhante kiṃ nu, na sobhantevāti vitakkemīti attho. Nuiti vitakke.
anya-e0812n:233_0: 10. Tameva “anavajja” miccādinā samattheti. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiavayavasampattiyā ca piḷakatilakakāḷakādidosarahitattā
anya-e0812n:233_1: ca aninditaṃ mukhambhojañca anavajjā padadosavākyadosaatthadosehi amissattā agarahitā
anya-e0812n:233_2: bhāratī vāṇī ca abhedopacārena tappaṭipādanīyattho cāti ime alaṅkatāva kuṇḍalatilakādiābharaṇehi
anya-e0812n:233_3: ca saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi ca sajjitā eva, niralaṅkatā tehi avibhūsitā sobhante
anya-e0812n:233_4: kiṃ nu, na sobhanteti maññe. Natthi avajjamassāti ca, mukhameva ambhojamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:236: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0812n:237_0: 11. Alaṅkaraṇañca tesaṃ vinā gurūpadesena karonto vinā pahāsaṃ nāparaṃ visesamadhigacchatīti
anya-e0812n:237_2: vā upadesaṃ “ettha evaṃ kate sobheyyā”ti upadisanaṃ vinā pariccajja mukhassa, bandhassa
anya-e0812n:237_3: ca alaṅkaraṇānabhiññatāya bālo aññāṇako yo koci puggalo taṃ mukhaṃ, bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ
anya-e0812n:237_4: anurūpavasena sajjetuṃ icchati adhippeti, so tādiso aññāṇapuggalo viññūhi tabbidūhi
anya-e0812n:237_5: paṇḍitajanehi hassabhāvaṃ avahāsaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena na sampāpuṇeyya. “Kimidaṃ
anya-e0812n:237_6: aññāṇapurisena kariyatī”ti hasantevāti adhippāyo. Nuiti vitakke.
anya-e0812n:238_1: seṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “vinā gurūpadesa” miccādisilesālaṅkāramāha. Bālo mukhādisarīrālaṅkāre,
anya-e0812n:238_2: bandhālaṅkāre vā asamattho yo koci gurūpadesaṃ vinā sarīrālaṅkārakaraṇassa, bandhālaṅkārakaraṇassa
anya-e0812n:238_3: vā anurūpopadesamantarena taṃ sarīraṃ, bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādīhi, saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi
anya-e0812n:238_4: vā sajjetuṃ icchati ce, so viññūhi tadubhayaññūhi hassabhāvaṃ avahasitabbataṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0812n:238_5: na sampāpuṇe, pāpuṇātyeva, tasmā gurūhi sādarato uggaṇhitvā kattabbanti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n:242_0: 12. Nanu saddagammā, atthagammā ca alaṅkārāti gantho kathanti āha “ganthopī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n:242_1: Kavivācānaṃ kavippayogānaṃ samudāyarūpānaṃ, paṭipādanīyatāya tabbacanīyānañca atthānaṃ
anya-e0812n:242_2: alaṅkārappakāsako alaṅkārānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ vibhāvito ganthopi kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n:242_3: satthampi tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vāccataṃ yāti upagacchati. Kinti āha
anya-e0812n:242_4: “tabbohārūpacārato”ti. Tassa katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa, tasmiṃ vā maṇḍanavisese
anya-e0812n:242_5: pavattassa alaṅkāravohārassa upacaraṇaṃ soyamityabhedena parikappanaṃ upacāro. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:242_6: Paṭipādanīyapaṭipādakānaṃ abhedavasena kāraṇe kārīyassa upacariyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:243_3: tabbohārūpacārato tassa alaṅkāroti katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa kāraṇe kārīyūpacārena
anya-e0812n:243_4: tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vattabbataṃ yāti. Apisaddo alaṅkāramapekkhati.
anya-e0812n:243_5: Alaṅkāre pakāseti, alaṅkārānaṃ vā pakāsakoti ca, tena vacanīyo, tassa bhāvoti ca
anya-e0812n:243_6: viggaho. Ettha bhāvoti vāccavācakasambandho. Tassa saddādialaṅkārassa vohāroti ca,
anya-e0812n:247_0: 13. Idāni yathāvuttaalaṅkārānaṃ pabhedaṃ, tappasaṅkañca taṃbandhasarīrañca heṭṭhā
anya-e0812n:247_1: vuttampi ekato sambandhetvā dassetuṃ “dvippakārā”di āraddhaṃ. Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte
anya-e0812n:247_2: ganthe, tasmiṃ vā bandhālaṅkārādhikāre alaṅkārā yathāvuttā dvippakārā honti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n:247_3: Saddabhedato, atthabhedato ca, saddālaṅkārā atthālaṅkārāti alaṅkārā dvippakārā hontīti
anya-e0812n:247_4: attho. Yesaṃ bhedena te dvippakārā, te saddā, atthā ca. “Bandho” iti vuttaṃ nāmaṃ
anya-e0812n:247_5: yassā āvaliyā sā bandhanāmā eva. Taṃsajjitatadāvali tehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā pakāsitā
anya-e0812n:247_6: taṃsajjitā, tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ āvali samudāyā, mahāvākyaṃ, antaravākyaṃ vā. Paripuṇṇo
anya-e0812n:247_7: bandho mahāvākyaṃ, muttakādayovayavā antaravākyāni, taṃsajjitatadāvalikaṃ pasiddhabhāvena
anya-e0812n:248_1: ekato dassetuṃ “dvippakāre”ccādimāha. Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte alaṅkāraganthe,
anya-e0812n:248_2: no ce, alaṅkārādhikāre vā alaṅkārā vakkhamānālaṅkārā saddatthabhedato saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārabhedena
anya-e0812n:248_3: dvippakārā honti, yesaṃ bhedena alaṅkārā bhinnā, te saddatthā bandhanāmāva. Taṃsajjitatadāvali
anya-e0812n:248_4: tehi saddatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkatā, tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ mahākabbādisamudāyarūpā paṭipāṭibandhoti
anya-e0812n:248_5: vuttaṃ hoti. “Bandho” iti nāmaṃ yasseti ca, tehi saddatthālaṅkārehi sajjitāti ca,
anya-e0812n:251: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0812n:252_0: 14. Evaṃ guṇena alaṅkārena sajjitāpi sā saddatthāvali appakenapi dosena saṃyuttā
anya-e0812n:252_1: satī asamphusitabbāva viññūhi siyāti dassetumāha “guṇa” iccādi. Saddālaṅkārākhyena
anya-e0812n:252_2: guṇena, atthālaṅkārena ca saṃyuttāpi visesena sajjitāpi saddatthāvali dosalavena
anya-e0812n:252_3: dosalesenāpi aṅkitā abhilañchitā satī viññūhi guṇadosavibhāgavidūhi paṇḍitapurisehi
anya-e0812n:252_4: na pasaṃsiyā neva pasaṃsitabbā. Kāviyāti āha “kaññā viyatādisī”ti. Yathā hi kaññā
anya-e0812n:252_6: cālaṅkatā kenaci kuṭṭhadosalesena aṅkitā viññūnaṃ asamphusanīyā siyā, pagevāparā,
anya-e0812n:252_7: evameva saddatthāvalipi appakenapi saddarūpena, atthalakkhaṇena ca dosena kuṭṭhakappena
anya-e0812n:252_8: vajjanīyā eva viññūnaṃ, pageva bahunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:253_0: 14. Evaṃ saddatthānaṃ guṇībhūtehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā saddatthāvali kenaci padādidosena
anya-e0812n:253_2: api saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātaguṇena, atthālaṅkārena ca visesena yuttāpi sā saddatthāvali
anya-e0812n:253_3: dosalavaṅkitā padadosādinā aṇumattenapi dosena aṅkitā yuttā sahitā tādisī guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāpi
anya-e0812n:253_4: dosalavaṅkitā kaññā viya dasavassikā yobbanappattā vanitāva viññūhi guṇadosaparikkhakehi
anya-e0812n:253_5: na pasaṃsiyā na pasaṃsitabbā. Yathā hi dasavassikā itthī piyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā manuññehi
anya-e0812n:253_6: guṇehi, sobhanānurūpagīveyyādiābharaṇavisesehi yuttāpi dissamānena kenaci setakuṭṭhalavena
anya-e0812n:253_7: yuttā samānā guṇadosaparikkhakehi dassanīyā na hoti, evaṃ vuttappakārāpi bandhapaddhati
anya-e0812n:253_8: kuṭṭhatulyena kenaci padādidosena yuttā viññūhi assādanīyāti adhippāyo. Dosānaṃ lavo,
anya-e0812n:253_9: tena aṅkitāti ca, sā viya dissatīti tādīsīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:256: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ.
anya-e0812n:257_0: 15. Yato evaṃ, tena tasmā kāraṇā mahussāhena mahatā vāyāmena dosānaṃ padadosādīnamanatthanimittānaṃ
anya-e0812n:257_1: nirāsova satthadiṭṭhiyā satthappabhāvato pariccāgoyeva sādhiyo sādhetabbo, “viññūhī”ti
anya-e0812n:257_2: seso. Evaṃ dosanirāse ko guṇo upalabbhatīti ce. Sabbathā sabbappakārena niddosā dosehi
anya-e0812n:257_3: niggatā sāyaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi sahitā na bhaveyya
anya-e0812n:257_4: kiṃ, bhavatyeva, guṇarahitaṃ taṃalaṅkatamanupādeyyaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:258_0: 15. Tena yato dosayuttā viññūhi anupādeyyā, tasmā mahussāhena adhikavāyāmena dosanirāsova
anya-e0812n:258_1: padadosādīnaṃ nirākaraṇameva sādhiyo anekasatthavisayāya paññāya viññūhi sādhetabbo,
anya-e0812n:258_2: evaṃ sati sabbathā sabbākārena niddosā dosarahitā sā ayaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0812n:258_3: guṇehi yuttā na bhaveyya kiṃ, guṇayuttā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Dosānaṃ nirāsoti ca,
anya-e0812n:258_4: natthi dosā etissā, niggatā dosehi vāti ca, saha guṇehi vattamānāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:262_1: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttāpi satī niddosā sabbappakārena dosehi niggatā
anya-e0812n:262_3: harati attano santikamākaḍḍhatīti manoharā hotīti. Tatthodāharaṇamāha “dosarahitā
anya-e0812n:262_4: guṇayuttā vadhū viyā”ti. Yathā yena kenacipi dosena virahitā vadhū manāpacāritādīhi
anya-e0812n:262_5: guṇavisesehi saṃyuttā satī kenaci ābharaṇena amaṇḍitā apasādhitāpi kinnāma madhurā
anya-e0812n:262_6: kavīnaṃ pasādhanaṃ kinnāma manoharā hoti, evamayaṃ saddatthāvalipi manoharā hotīti attho.
anya-e0812n:263_1: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttā satīpi niddosā sabbappakārena dosarahitā guṇayuttā
anya-e0812n:263_2: tatoyeva guṇībhūtā saddālaṅkārena yuttā dosarahitā dubbaṇṇadussaṇṭhānādidosehi pariccattā
anya-e0812n:263_3: guṇayuttā hadayaṅgamaguṇayuttā vadhū viya aṅganā viya manoharā sādhujane ārādheti.
anya-e0812n:265: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0812n:267_0: 17. Yato evaṃ guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāyapi dosalavaṅkitāya viññūnamanādaraṇīyatā, alaṅkāraviyuttāpi
anya-e0812n:267_1: dosābhāvena guṇayuttāya manoharatā, evamanatthāvahassāpi dosassa pariharitabbatā
anya-e0812n:267_2: satthadiṭṭhiyā, tasmā te dose dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “pade”tiādinā. Tesaṃ padānaṃ vākyānaṃ
anya-e0812n:267_3: attho tadattho, tasmiṃ. Udāharīyati lakkhyabhāvenāti udāharaṇaṃ, saha udāharaṇehīti
anya-e0812n:268_0: 17. Evaṃ alaṅkārayuttāpi appakena dosena yuttabandhassa anupādeyyattā, alaṅkāraalaṅkaraṇe
anya-e0812n:268_1: asatipi dosarahite viññūhi upādeyyattā ca mukhyassa dosaparihārassa avassaṃ kattabbattā
anya-e0812n:268_2: idāni adhigatadose dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “pade vākye”ccādinā. Pade nāmādicatubbidhapade
anya-e0812n:268_3: ca, vākye “syādyantatyādyantānaṃ cayo vākyaṃ sakārakakiriyā”ti vuttalakkhaṇe vākye
anya-e0812n:268_4: ca, tadatthe ca tesaṃ padavākyānaṃ atthe ca vividhā anekappakārā ye dosā viññūhi
anya-e0812n:268_5: dosabhāvena matā ñeyyā, etesaṃ padādidosānaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ udāharaṇasahitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:270: Nipātakañca taññūhi, asso khalvābhidhāvatī”ti rūpabhiddhiṭīkāyaṃ nāmakaṇḍe.
anya-e0812n:271: Vuttaniyāmena padaṃ tāva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Udāharīyanti lakkhiyabhāvenāti udāharaṇānīti ca, saha udāharaṇenāti sodāharaṇanti ca, lakkhīyati lakkhiyamanenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:286_0: 18-19-20. Idāni yathāpaṭiññāte dose uddisati “viruddhatthantara” iccādinā. Viruddhaṃ
anya-e0812n:286_1: atthantaraṃ yassa taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Padaṃ. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ.
anya-e0812n:286_2: Adhiko attho visesyassa yena taṃ adhyatthaṃ. Nīyati avutto hetu ettha ānīyatīti neyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:286_3: Dosā padānanti yehi dosehi padāni duṭṭhāni, te viruddhatthantaratādayo padānaṃ dosāti
anya-e0812n:286_4: attho. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ. Vākyānaṃ dosāti sambandho. Bhaggā rīti kamo yasmiṃ
anya-e0812n:286_5: taṃ bhaggarītikaṃ, vākyaṃ. Apakkamatādayo vākyatthadosā, vākyatthānaṃ dosato. Vākyaṃ
anya-e0812n:286_6: duṭṭhaṃ siyāti vākyameva visesyate. Tena sabbattha napuṃsakaliṅgena niddeso.
anya-e0812n:287_0: 18-19-20. Idāni kathetabbabhāvena paṭiññāte dose uddisanto “viruddha…pe… nissitā”ti
anya-e0812n:287_1: āha. Kavīhi icchitatthato viruddho aññattho yassa padassāti taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ
anya-e0812n:287_2: nāma. Visesyassa adhikatthabhāvakaraṇato ajhatthaṃ nāma. Kavīhi icchitatthassāvīkaraṇe
anya-e0812n:287_3: avisadattā kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Desakālakalādīnaṃ viruddhattā virodhi nāma. Aññamāharitvā
anya-e0812n:287_4: vattabbato neyyaṃ nāma. Visesanaṃ patvāva sātthakabhāvappattito visesanāpekkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:287_5: Visesyassa hīnatāpādanato hīnatthakaṃ nāma. Attharahitattā anatthakaṃ nāmāti ime
anya-e0812n:288_0: Vuttatthasseva puna vacanato ekatthaṃ nāma. Bhinnakkamattā bhaggarītikaṃ nāma. Tathā
anya-e0812n:288_1: sammohakāraṇattā byākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Visiṭṭhavacanavirahato gāmmaṃ nāma. Yatisampattivirahato
anya-e0812n:288_2: yatihīnaṃ nāma. Padatthakkamato cutattā kamaccutaṃ nāma. Lokiyaṃ vohāramatikkamma
anya-e0812n:288_3: vuttattā ativuttaṃ nāma. Samudāyatthato apagatattā apetatthaṃ nāma. Bandhapharusayuttattā
anya-e0812n:288_4: bandhapharusaṃ nāma, tena sahitaṃ sabandhapharusanti ime nava vākyānaṃ tathā dosā
anya-e0812n:289_0: Apagatakkamattā apakkamaṃ nāma. Ucitabhāvassa parihīnattā ocityahīnaṃ nāma. Bhinnavibhattikkamattā
anya-e0812n:289_1: bhaggarīti nāma. Saṃsayajananato sasaṃsayaṃ nāma. Duppatītikarattā gāmmaṃ nāma. Dūsitālaṅkārattā
anya-e0812n:289_2: duṭṭhālaṅkati nāmātime cha vākyatthanissitattā vākyatthadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n:290_0: Añño attho atthantaro. Viruddho atthantaro yassāti viggaho. Dosapakāsakapadampi dosato
anya-e0812n:290_1: abyatirittattā doso nāma. Evaṃ santepi samāsena padassa gahitattā napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:290_2: Esevanayo ito paresupi. Visesyassa adhiko attho yassa taṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ viya kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:290_3: Yathā hi malaggahito ādāso attano kiliṭṭhattā mukhādīnaṃ pakāsane avisado hoti, evamadhippetatthappakāsane
anya-e0812n:290_4: asamatthaṃ padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Virodho assa atthīti virodhi. Nīyati avutto hetu
anya-e0812n:290_5: etthāti neyyaṃ. Visesane apekkhā yassa taṃ. Hīno visesyassa attho yena taṃ. Natthi
anya-e0812n:291_0: Padadosānaṃ anaññattepi vikappanābhedato “padānaṃ dosā”ti vuttaṃ, yathā “silāputtakassa
anya-e0812n:291_1: sarīra”nti. Vākyānaṃ dosāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Eko attho yassa taṃ. Bhaggārīti kamo
anya-e0812n:291_2: yassa taṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ākiṇṇaṃ byākiṇṇaṃ. Gāme bhavo gāmmo, abyattānaṃ vohāro. Tappakāsakapadampi
anya-e0812n:291_3: upacārato gāmmaṃ nāma. Yati hīnā etthāti yatihīnaṃ. Kamato cutaṃ kamaccutaṃ. Atikkamma
anya-e0812n:291_4: vuttaṃ ativuttaṃ. Atthato apetaṃ apetatthaṃ. Bandhe pharusaṃ pharusatā yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n:291_5: Apagato kamo yasmā taṃ. Ocityaṃ hīnaṃ yattha taṃ. Bhaggā rīti yattha taṃ. Saha saṃsayena
anya-e0812n:291_6: vattatīti taṃ. Gāmmaṃ vuttanayameva. Duṭṭhā dūsitā alaṅkati alaṅkāro yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n:291_7: Vākyānaṃ attho, tannissitā vākyatthanissitāti viggaho. Ettha anatthakāpetatthadosadvayaṃ
anya-e0812n:291_8: padavākyato bhinnaṃ, aññaṃ bhaggarītidosadvayaṃ, gāmmadvayaṃ, kamaccutaapakkamadvayañca
anya-e0812n:295: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:296_0: 21. Athoddesakkamena padādidose udāharati “viruddhi” ccādinā. Hi yasmā kāraṇā, pasiddhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n:296_1: vā hisaddo. Yassa padassa añño adhippetato aparo attho adhippete vattumicchite atthe
anya-e0812n:296_3: Yathā idaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ, tathā aññampi tādisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na tvidameveti yathāsaddassa
anya-e0812n:296_4: attho. Megho visado sukhaye jananti. Visaṃ udakaṃ, taṃ dadātīti visado megho vārivaho
anya-e0812n:296_5: janaṃ lokaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavicchitattho. Visasaddo garaḷassa ca vācako siyāti
anya-e0812n:296_6: garaḷado megho mārayati, na pana sukhayatīti “visado”ti visesanapadassa viruddhatā.
anya-e0812n:297_1: Yassa padassa aññattho kavicchitatthato añño attho adhippete icchitatthe hi yasmā
anya-e0812n:297_2: virujjhati, tasmā taṃ padaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ nāma. Pasiddhiyaṃ vā hisaddo. Tathā
anya-e0812n:297_3: hesa appasiddhaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti pakāsetvā
anya-e0812n:297_4: tasmiṃ pakāsitatthavisaye vattati. “Taṃ hī”ti yojitattā “yassa aññattho adhippete
anya-e0812n:297_5: virujjhatī”ti lakkhaṇaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā taṃ viruddhatthantaranti anuvaditabbaappasiddhaviruddhatthantaraṃ
anya-e0812n:297_6: vidhīyate, yathā “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti. Upari pasiddhānuvādena appasiddhavidhānameva
anya-e0812n:297_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yathā…pe… jana”nti udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ dasseti. Yathā “megho visado”ccādi
anya-e0812n:297_8: viruddhatthantarassa udāharaṇaṃ, evamīdisamaññampi imassudāharaṇaṃ, na kevalaṃ “megho”ccādimeva
anya-e0812n:297_9: bhavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāsaddo cettha ivasaddapariyāyatthepi udāharaṇattho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0812n:297_10: uparipyevaṃ. Megho ambudharo visado visasaṅkhātaṃ jalaṃ dadanto janaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti
anya-e0812n:297_12: dadātīti visado”ti ettha visassa udakavisānaṃ sādhāraṇattā visadāyako megho nāsetiyeva,
anya-e0812n:297_13: na sukhayatīti kavinā adhippetassa sukhakāraṇassa meghavisesanavisasaddassa viruddhaaññatthatāti
anya-e0812n:303_0: 22. Yena padena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ aparaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ bhavatītyanuvaditvā
anya-e0812n:303_2: suviññeyyaṃ. Obhāsitā dīpitā asesā nikhilā disāyena soyaṃ khajjoto virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n:304_0: 22. Yena visesanapadena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ hoti, etaṃ
anya-e0812n:304_1: yathāvuttalakkhaṇopetaṃ padaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhave ajhatthaṃ nāma padadoso bhave. Yathā
anya-e0812n:304_2: tassudāharaṇamevaṃ. Obhāsitāsesadiso jotitasabbadiso ayaṃ khajjoto ayaṃ jotiriṅgaṇo
anya-e0812n:304_3: virājate dippati. Ettha visesyassa khajjotassa sakaladisobhāsanassa ajhatthattā atyuttattā
anya-e0812n:304_4: (ka.) “obhāsitāsesadiso”ti visesanapadaṃ ajhatthapadadoso nāma. Obhāsitā asesadisā yenāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:310_0: 23. Pakatyādivibhāgatoti paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati. Ādisaddena paccayādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:310_1: pariggaho. Pakatyādīnaṃvibhāgato vibhajanato, “ayaṃ pakati, ayaṃ paccayo, ayamādeso”tiādinā
anya-e0812n:310_2: pakatipaccayavibhāgakappanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pīṇetīti pī, tāya piyā vallabhāya soyaṃ
anya-e0812n:311_0: 23. Yassa padassa atthāvagamo atthāvabodho pakatyādivibhāgato “ayaṃ pakati, ayaṃ
anya-e0812n:311_1: paccayo, ayamādeso”tiādinā pakatyādīnaṃ vibhajanajānanena, “pakatyādi nāma ki”nti
anya-e0812n:311_2: gavesanato vā dukkho, taṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Yathā tassudāharaṇamevaṃ. Tāya piyā vanitāya
anya-e0812n:311_3: so ayaṃ vallabho āliṅgyate silissate. Paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati. Sā ādi
anya-e0812n:311_4: yesaṃ paccayānaṃ, tesaṃ vibhāgoti vākyaṃ. Pīṇetīti pī, nārī. Tāya piyā ettha piyāsaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n:311_5: vallabhāya kathane pīsaddassa avisadattā “piyā”ti padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:315_1: Tattha yanti aniyamavacanaṃ, tassa niyamavacanaṃ yamakādikanti. Yamakamādi yassa
anya-e0812n:315_2: paheḷikājātassa taṃ yamakādikaṃ. Kīdisanti āha “kiliṭṭhapada”ntiādi. Kiliṭṭhāni appatītadosasabhāve
anya-e0812n:315_3: ṭhitatāya malitānyavisadāni padāni yassa taṃ kiliṭṭhapadaṃ. Mando appako abhidheyyo
anya-e0812n:315_4: attho yassa taṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ, tādisaṃ tampi yamakādikaṃ kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvutte
anya-e0812n:315_5: anto abbhantare karīyati vidhīyati tattheva pakkhipīyati, kiliṭṭhapadadosato na byatiriccatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:316_0: 24. Idāni anadhippetamapi yamakādiṃ kiliṭṭhadoseyeva antokaraṇabyājena āvīkaronto
anya-e0812n:316_1: āha “yaṃ kiliṭṭhe”ccādi. Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ appatītadosena missakattā avisadapadaṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ
anya-e0812n:316_2: appakābhidheyyaṃ yaṃ yamakādikaṃ yaṃ yamakappaheḷikājātamatthi, tampi kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva
anya-e0812n:316_3: yathāvuttakiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva anto karīyati abbhantare karīyati, kiliṭṭhapadadosato
anya-e0812n:316_4: abyatirittanti adhippāyo. Kiliṭṭhāni padāni yassa, mando abhidheyyo yassa, yamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:316_5: ādi yassa paheḷikājātassa, kiliṭṭhapadānaṃ dosoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:320_0: 25. Hotu kāmamanabhimatamedisaṃ yamakādikaṃ, kiñcarahi abhimatanti āha “patīti”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:320_1: Attano vacanīyatthappatītavasena vācakāpi saddā patītāyeva nāmāti patītehi pasiddhehi
anya-e0812n:320_2: saddehi pāṭipadikehi racitaṃ kataṃ patītasaddaracitaṃ. Siliṭṭhā aññamaññāliṅganena
anya-e0812n:320_3: maṭṭhā padānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ sandhayo sandhanā yassa taṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ.
anya-e0812n:320_4: Patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādasaṅkhātena guṇena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttaṃ sammadevopetaṃ
anya-e0812n:320_5: edisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇāsayaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ yamakaṃ mataṃ abhimatanti attho.
anya-e0812n:321_0: 25. Idāni adhigatesu yamakesu īdisaṃ yamakamiṭṭhamiti sissānaṃ upadisanto āha “patīte”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:321_1: Patītasaddaracitaṃ “imassatthassāyaṃ vācako”ti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi racitaṃ
anya-e0812n:321_2: pāṭipadikehi kataṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ siliṭṭhā syādyantādipadānaṃ sandhayo yassa
anya-e0812n:321_4: saṃyuttaṃ īdisaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ guṇādhikato ramaṇīyaṃ upari vakkhamānayamakasadisaṃ yamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:321_5: mataṃ viññūhi abhimataṃ. Patītā ca te saddā ca, tehi racitaṃ, siliṭṭhā padānaṃ sandhayo
anya-e0812n:321_6: yassa, pasādoti guṇo saddālaṅkāro, tena saṃyuttanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:325_0: 26. Idāni taṃ yathāvuttamabhimataṃ dassetumupakkamate “abyapete”ccādinā. Āvuttā adhivuttā
anya-e0812n:325_1: punappunuccāraṇupetā anekesaṃ patirūpattā, bahuvaṇṇā sarabyañjanarūpā, na eko vaṇṇo
anya-e0812n:325_2: tassānuppāsattā, tathā ca vakkhati “vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā”ti subodhālaṅkāra 127 gāthā,
anya-e0812n:325_3: tehi jātaṃ yamakanti viññāyate. Katividhaṃ taṃ vikappīyatīti āha “abyapetaṃ byapetañña”nti.
anya-e0812n:325_4: Tattha yaṃ vaṇṇantarābyavahitaṃ vaṇṇasamudāyena vuttaṃ. Tadabyapetaṃ yamakaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0812n:325_5: tu byavahitaṃ, taṃ byapetaṃ. Yaṃ pana ubhayamissaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ aparaṃ abyapetabyapetanti
anya-e0812n:325_6: tidhā yamakaṃ tāva vikappīyate. Tametaṃ tividhaṃ yamakaṃ visayavibhāganirūpanāyaṃ
anya-e0812n:325_7: ādi ca majjho ca anto ca gocaro visayo yasseti ādimajjhantagocaraṃ viññeyyaṃ. Kesaṃ
anya-e0812n:325_8: pādānaṃ? Paccekaṃ catunnaṃgāthāvayavānaṃ. Sāpekkhattepi samāso gammakattā.
anya-e0812n:326_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhantabhāvīnaṃ yamakānaṃ yāvanto pakārā sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n:326_1: te mūlā satta. Kathaṃ? Ekasmiṃyeva pāde kvaci ādiyamakaṃ, kvaci majjhayamakaṃ, kvaci
anya-e0812n:326_2: antayamakaṃ, kvaci majjhantayamakaṃ, kvaci majjhādiyamakaṃ, kvaci ādyantayamakaṃ,
anya-e0812n:326_3: kvaci sabbayamakanti. Evaṃ paccekaṃ mūlabhūtā sattāti catūsu aṭṭhavīsati honti. Pādādiyamakañca
anya-e0812n:326_6: anekadhā pasaṃsanti. Yadā ca sabbatoyamakaṃ, tadā mahāyamakādayo vikappā jāyantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:327_0: 26. Idāni abhimatayamakaṃ dīpeti “abyapete”ccādinā. Āvuttehi punappunaṃ vuttehi anekavaṇṇehi
anya-e0812n:327_1: samudāyarūpattā anekehi sarabyañjanasarīrehi vaṇṇehi jātaṃ yamakaṃ aññehi vaṇṇehi
anya-e0812n:327_2: abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ, vaṇṇantarehi byavahitattā byapetaṃ, ubhayamissakattā tehi
anya-e0812n:327_3: aññaṃ abyapetabyapetañcāti tividhaṃ hoti. Tañca yamakaṃ visayavibhāganiyamena gāthāpādānaṃ
anya-e0812n:327_4: ādigocaraṃ majjhagocaraṃ antagocaramiti tividhaṃ hoti. Ettha casaddo vattabbantare
anya-e0812n:327_5: pavattati, vattabbantaraṃ nāma yathāvuttaabyapetādibhedato aññaṃ vattabbatāya samukhībhūtaṃ
anya-e0812n:327_6: pādānaṃ ādimajjhāvasānantaraṃ, upanyāso vākyārambhoti ca etasseva nāmaṃ. Visadisena
anya-e0812n:327_7: vaṇṇena apetaṃ byapetaṃ. Tabbiparītamabyapetaṃ. Abyapetañca byapetañca aññañcāti
anya-e0812n:327_8: samāhāradvando. Aneke ca te vaṇṇā ca, āvuttāyeva anekavaṇṇā, tehi jātaṃ, ādi ca majjho
anya-e0812n:327_9: ca anto ca, te gocarā yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:328_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhāvasānesu labbhamānayamakabhedā ekekasmiṃ pāde satta
anya-e0812n:328_1: satta bhavanti. Kathaṃ? Pādādiyamakaṃ pādamajjhayamakaṃ pādantayamakaṃ majjhantayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:328_2: majjhādiyamakaṃ ādyantayamakaṃ sabbatoyamakanti evaṃ paccekaṃ satta satta katvā catūsu
anya-e0812n:328_3: mūlabhūtayamakā aṭṭhavīsa bhavanti. Ettha pādādiyamakādikampi abyapetapaṭhamapādādiyamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:328_7: evamabyapetapādādiyamakā dasa honti. Tathā byapetāpi dasāti vīsati, abyapetapaṭhamapādamajjhayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:328_8: tathā dutiyapādamajjhayamakamiccādinā majjhayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ hoti. Abyapetapaṭhamapādantayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n:328_9: tathā dutiyapādantayamakamiccādinā antayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ. Saṃsaggabhedato pana anekavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:333_0: 27. “Sujanā”iccādi. Sujanā sajjanā, asujanā asajjanāti ete sabbe ubhayapakkhapātino
anya-e0812n:333_1: visesā janā guṇena sīlādinā karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā vivekinopi sādhūsu labbhamānānamasādhūsvanupalabbhanato
anya-e0812n:333_2: puthubhūtāpi avivekīnaṃ janānaṃ antike samīpe tesaṃ sannidhāne vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na
anya-e0812n:333_3: samāyanti napāpuṇanti, vibhāgavijānanapaññāvekallena ca vivekinopi janā te ekato
anya-e0812n:334_1: sādhujanā, asujanā asādhujanā ceti sabbe ubhayapakkhikā sīlādinā, pāṇātipātādinā
anya-e0812n:334_2: guṇena hetunā vivekino api sādhūsu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ, asādhūsu sīlādīnaṃ appavattito
anya-e0812n:334_3: guṇena puthubhūtāpi avivekijanantike vivekañāṇarahitānaṃ janānaṃ santike vivekaṃ
anya-e0812n:334_4: vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti na pāpuṇanti. Viveko vinābhavanametesamatthīti vivekino. Ettha
anya-e0812n:334_5: visayopacārena vivekoti paññā, na vivekinoti avivekino, teyeva janā, tesaṃ antikamiti
anya-e0812n:339_0: 28. “Kusalā”iccādi. Pabalā āsevanappaṭilābhavasena balavanto ca. Athāti anantaratthe
anya-e0812n:339_1: nipāto. Apabalā tadabhāvato dubbalā ca sabbe kusalākusalā dhammā yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ
anya-e0812n:339_2: ahosittaṃ vinā uppattimattaṃ phaladānāsambhavato kevalaṃ “ahosī”ti vacanīyatthanimittamattakammabhāvena
anya-e0812n:339_3: ahosikammattaṃ no yātā na sampattā, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ sukhañca dukkhañca taṃ padantīti
anya-e0812n:339_4: sukhadukkhappadā siyuṃ. Yāva saṃsārapavatti, tāva sukhadukkhadāyakā hontīti. Idaṃ
anya-e0812n:340_0: 28. Pabalā āsevanādipaccayalābhena balavanto vā atha apabalā tadabhāvena dubbalā
anya-e0812n:340_1: vā sabbe kusalākusalā ahosittaṃ phaladānābhāvato pavattimattataṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ
anya-e0812n:340_2: no yātā appattā, tāva tattakaṃ sukhadukkhappadā yathākkamaṃ sukhadukkhapadāyino siyuṃ
anya-e0812n:340_4: vattabbassa bhāvo ahosittaṃ. “Ehipassiko”tiādīsu viya kriyāpadatopi ṇādipaccayā honti.
anya-e0812n:343: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0812n:345_0: 29. “Sādara”miccādi. Vandanā dvārattayopadassiyamānā māno ca pūjā, tesaṃ bhājane
anya-e0812n:345_1: ādhārabhūte ratijananādinā atthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye samūhabhūte
anya-e0812n:345_2: ratanattaye sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ katvā mayā vihitā katā, vihitā alaṃsaṃsāradukkhavisaṭanirākaraṇato
anya-e0812n:345_3: visesena hitā padhyā sā vandanā so paṇāmo daraṃ darathaṃ kāyacittapariḷāhaṃ hantu
anya-e0812n:345_4: hiṃsatu. Mayāti vuttattā meti atthato viññāyati. Idaṃ pana paṭhamadutiyatatiyapādādiyamakamabyapetaṃ.
anya-e0812n:346_1: ratijananādiatthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye mayā yā vandanā sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ
anya-e0812n:346_2: vihitā katā, vihitā lokiya lokuttara sampattisādhanato visesena hitā sā vandanā daraṃ
anya-e0812n:346_3: mayhaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ hantu vināsetu. Idaṃ abyapetapaṭhamadutiyatatiyapādādiyamakaṃ.
anya-e0812n:346_4: Saha ādarena vattamānaṃ sādaraṃ, kriyāvisesanaṃ. Ettha kriyā nāma vihitāsaddena niddiṭṭhakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:346_6: vijjamānaṃ “akāsi”nti kriyāya sambandhamupentaṃ kammañca hoti, bhāve vihitassa yupaccayantassa
anya-e0812n:346_7: napuṃsakattā napuṃsakañca, sattāya ekattā ekavacanañca tabbisesanattā sādarasaddopi
anya-e0812n:350: Kātabbā tā visesane”ti sambandhacinto 15 gāthā bhedacintā 194 gāthā.
anya-e0812n:351_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kriyāvisesane gahite sāmatthiyato “mayā”ti tatiyantassa paṭhamantattaṃ,
anya-e0812n:351_1: “vandanā”ti paṭhamantassa chaṭṭhuntañca hoti. Vandanā ca māno ca, tesaṃ bhājanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:351_2: Tiṇṇaṃ samūho tayaṃ, ratanānaṃ tayanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:355: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sahitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0812n:356_0: 30. “Kamala”miccādi. Kamalaṃ aravindaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ sajjanatthāya hoti, vikasitāravindasandohasambhāvitodakassa
anya-e0812n:356_1: vāpādīsu tādisaramaṇīyattasampattisambhavato, avanaṃ rakkhaṃ dadāti sassasampatyādikāraṇabhāvenāti
anya-e0812n:356_2: avanado. Vanaṃ jalaṃ dadāti na tucchoti vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakuharassa
anya-e0812n:356_3: dassanīyatāguṇayogato alaṃkattunti adhikataṃ. Sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuddhiṃ
anya-e0812n:356_4: karaṃ karonto suṭṭhu gadatīti sugato mañjubhāṇī pubbabuddhā viya nekkhammādinā kāmacchandādike
anya-e0812n:356_5: pajahanto gantvā arahattamaggena savāsanasakalakilese samucchinditvā sobhanaṃ nibbānapuraṃ
anya-e0812n:356_6: gatoti vā sugatoti vutto so mahāmuni attano aparimitapāramitāsimpakacagalitatilakabhāvena
anya-e0812n:356_7: lokaṃ lokattayaṃ, sahitaṃ lokanti vā yojanīyaṃ alaṅkattuṃ alaṃkaraṇāyāti. Idaṃ pādacatukkādiyamakamabyapetaṃ.
anya-e0812n:357_0: 30. Kamalaṃ padumaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ pañcavidhapadumasañchannassa udakassa ramaṇīyattā
anya-e0812n:357_1: sajjetuṃ hoti. Avanado kāle vuṭṭhisampadāya sassasampadādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ārakkhaṃ
anya-e0812n:357_2: dento vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ alaṅkattuṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakucchiyā dassanīyattā
anya-e0812n:357_3: sajjetuṃ hoti, sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuḍḍhiṃ karaṃ karonto sugato citrakathī
anya-e0812n:357_4: sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato vā so sugato so tathāgato lokaṃ lokattayaṃ, sahitaṃ lokaṃ
anya-e0812n:357_5: vā alaṅkattuṃ citrakathādikāraṇehi tādisassa aññassa ca lokarāmaṇeyyassābhāvā sajjetuṃ
anya-e0812n:357_6: hoti. Sabbapadatthānaṃ sattābyabhicārittā hotīti gammaṃ. Tatoyeva sabbe paṭhamantabhavanakriyāya
anya-e0812n:361_1: “abyapete”ccādinā. Abyapetassa abyavahitassa catunnaṃ pādānaṃ ādo, ādibhūtassa vā
anya-e0812n:361_2: yamakassa eso yathāvutto leso kocideva bhedo nidassito vikappito. Aparānipi kiṃ na
anya-e0812n:361_3: vikappiyantīticeti āha “ñeyyāni”ccādi. Imāya disāya iminā upāyena maggeneva aññāni
anya-e0812n:361_6: abyapetabyapetāni, tathā majjhantapādayamakāni ñeyyāni jānitabbāni, viññūnaṃ tādisāya
anya-e0812n:363: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te”.
anya-e0812n:371: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yo”.
anya-e0812n:377: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvaṃ”.
anya-e0812n:379_2: vā eso leso “sujani”ccādiko appakodāharaṇanayo nidassito niddiṭṭho. Aññāni yamakānipi
anya-e0812n:379_3: imāyeva disāya iminā nayeneva ñeyyāni viññūhi ñātabbāni. Ādo yamakaṃ, ādibhūtaṃ vā
anya-e0812n:379_4: yamakaṃ, abyapetañca taṃ ādiyamakañcāti vākyaṃ. Evaṃ dassitena iminā kamena abyapetadutiyapādādiyamakādayo
anya-e0812n:382: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te.
anya-e0812n:383_0: Bho nātha te tuyhaṃ citte sādhavo asādhavo te janā guṇāguṇena sakasakaguṇena aguṇena
anya-e0812n:383_1: ca saha samaṃ ekajjhaṃ kathaṃ nu vigāhante, cittaṃ acchariyaṃ sujanadujjanesu samamettā
anya-e0812n:386: Pādānate jinokāsi, so dhammo hantu vo’ppīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:387: Jino appiyabhāṇinopi sabbe jane piyena yena vacasā pādānate akāsi, so dhammo vo appiyaṃ hantu. Ettha apisaddapariyāyassa pisaddassa gahitattā yatibhaṅgo natthi.
anya-e0812n:390: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yoti.
anya-e0812n:391_0: Ettha “samalaṃ samalaṃ, suciraṃ sucira”nti visadisavaṇṇehi abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ,
anya-e0812n:391_3: ca byavahitattā byapetañca hoti. Suciraṃsuci sobhanaraṃsinā uci yutto yo jino saṃ
anya-e0812n:391_4: santiṃ nibbānaṃ samalaṃbhi alabhi, alaṃ accantaṃ atisayena suciraṃgaṃ visuddhadehaṃ
anya-e0812n:391_5: taṃ jinaṃ samalaṃ jallikāsaṅkhātena, rāgādikucchitasaṅkhātena vā malena sahitaṃ saṃ
anya-e0812n:391_6: attānaṃ alaṃkattuṃ nimmalaṃ katvā sajjetuṃ suciraṃ sucirakālaṃ raṃjaye attani abhiramāpeyya.
anya-e0812n:393: Manohara hara klesaṃ, jina cetobhavaṃ mama;
anya-e0812n:395: Manohara jina mama cetobhavaṃ klesaṃ santāpaṃ hara apanaya, tvaṃ pāramīsārāmatabhāvitaṃ osadhaṃ dibbosadhaṃ nanu.
anya-e0812n:398: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvanti.
anya-e0812n:399_0: Yo jinavaro sādhunā jayaddhaninā veneyyajayaghosena mahiṃ āpūrayi, dhīraṃ taṃ jinavaraṃ
anya-e0812n:399_1: tuvaṃ sappurisa ce atthakāmo asi, raṃjaya abhiramāpehi. Iminā niddiṭṭhayamakeheva
anya-e0812n:405_0: 32. Kiṃ pana sākallena na vikappitānīti āha “accanti”ccādi. Tesaṃ vikappānaṃ sambhedo
anya-e0812n:405_1: saṅkaro missattamuccāraṇappakāro yoni pabhavo yesaṃ te sambhedayoniyo, bhedā pakārā
anya-e0812n:405_2: accantabahavo atisayena bahulā yathāvuttanayena sambhavanti, tatthāpi tesu vikappesupi
anya-e0812n:405_3: keci vikappā sukhena karīyanti payujjantīti sukarā, tabbiparīto ca keci vikappā accantadukkarā.
anya-e0812n:405_4: Iti dvidhā saṅgayhanti, tesu sukarānaṃ kesañci abhimatayamakānaṃ mukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:405_5: Idāni dukkarānaṃ kesañci mukhamattaṃ na sabbamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:407: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n:416_1: Tesaṃ yamakānaṃ sambhedayoniyo pabheduppattikāraṇabhūtā bhedā uccāvacapakārā accantabahavo,
anya-e0812n:416_2: tatthāpi tesupi keci yamakā sukarā susādhiyā, keci accantadukkarā atisayena dussādhiyā.
anya-e0812n:420: Manaṃ manaṃ tena dadeyya ce na,
anya-e0812n:423_0: Yo puggalo manaṃ attano cittaṃ satthu jinassa manaṃ khaṇamattampi dadeyya ce, satthu
anya-e0812n:423_1: munindassa manaṃ cittaṃ assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ pīṇayati sampīṇeti, tena tasmā
anya-e0812n:423_2: manaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ dadeyya ce na yadi no dadeyya, assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n:423_3: manaṃpi muhuttampi sādhupujjaṃ sādhūhi pūjitabbaṃ na bhavati.
anya-e0812n:425: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n:429_0: Yato yena kāraṇena te tuyhaṃ satā sobhanena samunnatena sammā unnatena hetunā natepi
anya-e0812n:429_1: avanatepi anatepi anavanatepi te te subhā te te sobhanā na na siyuṃ, bhavanteva,
anya-e0812n:429_2: ato tena kāraṇena te subhā te sobhanā nate avanate kathaṃ na siyuṃ, bhavanteva.
anya-e0812n:435_0: Paṇāmonatasajjanaṃ paṇāmitukāmonatasādhujanavantaṃ janaṃ veneyyajanaṃ asajja pamādamakatvā
anya-e0812n:435_1: guṇe sīlādiguṇe nivesentaṃ niyojentaṃ veneyyanette añjanaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ guṇabhājanaṃ
anya-e0812n:435_2: guṇānamādhārabhūtaṃ sajjanaṃjanaṃ iminā kāraṇena sādhujanānaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n:435_3: sādhujanaṃ khalu ekantena mamentaṃ mamāyantaṃ naṃ jinaṃ name namāmi.
anya-e0812n:438: Sābhāya sā bhāti na ce kathaṃ na,
anya-e0812n:441_0: Bhuvane sattaloke sābhāsu vijjamānābhāsu jinassa sābhā sobhanā ābhā sābhāya vijjamānāya,
anya-e0812n:441_1: sobhanāya vā ābhāya ābhāto jātu ekantena bhāsatiyeva dippateva, sā jinābhā sābhāya
anya-e0812n:441_2: vijjamānābhāto adhikā hutvā ce na bhāti yadi na bhāsati, sasābhānaṃ vijjamānasobhanābhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:441_3: brahmādīnaṃ sābhā sobhanābhāyo aticca atikkamma kathaṃ na bhāti, bhāsatiyeva.
anya-e0812n:447_0: Surāvinissaṭā surāpānato apagatā janā yathā surājanti, tathā vibhūsitā visesena alaṅkatā
anya-e0812n:447_1: tepi surā te devā api na bhāsurā sobhamānā na honti, tathā evaṃ surāparājitā surāpānahetu
anya-e0812n:447_2: parājitabhāvaṃ pattā bhūri asurā bahavo vepacittiādayo asurāpi na bhāsurā na sobhanti,
anya-e0812n:447_3: tathā evaṃ surājito suṭṭhu alaṅkato rājāpi sabhāsu na bhāsuro.
anya-e0812n:453_0: Ye sappurisā jināṇattiyaṃ buddhassa vinayapaññattisaṅkhātāṇattiyaṃ ohitāsā avītikkamavasena
anya-e0812n:453_1: patiṭṭhitaāsā honti sitāsā parisuddhāsā, te sādhavo hatāsā anukkamena hatataṇhā avassaṃva
anya-e0812n:453_2: ekanteneva atāsā bhayarahitā yato honti, ato tasmā sabbapāpe sabbākusale satāsā bhayasahitā
anya-e0812n:453_3: vatāsāva niravajjavatābhilāsavanto sādhujanā santissitā santinissitāyo sāmitāsā sāmibhāvāsāyo karonteva.
anya-e0812n:457_0: 33. Nanu yamakaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyavisesasūcakanti tattha taṃ sopayogaṃ, paheḷikā
anya-e0812n:457_1: ca sopayogā kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānamantane parabyāmohane paramabyāmohane (ka.),
anya-e0812n:457_2: kābyādāsa 3.97 ca, tasmā tattha kathamupekkhā bhavatoti āha “yamaka”ntiādi. Taṃ yathāvuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:457_3: yamakañca sukaradukkarappabhedaṃ. Paheḷikā pana pubbācariyehi soḷasa niddiṭṭhā samāgatāvañcitādikā.
anya-e0812n:474_0: Dosattepi cesaṃ sabbesaṃ ukkantādīsu dosabhāve nāropitabbā. Esā hi manasoti (ka.)
anya-e0812n:474_1: “bahuguṇe paṇamati”ccādinā subodhālaṅkāra 44 gāthā vākyasaṃkiṇṇanāmena na vuttā,
anya-e0812n:474_2: pakappitā ca saṃsayadosaparihārena “yāte dutiyaṃ nilaya”nti subodhālaṅkāra 112 gāthā ādinā niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0812n:481: Pamussitādayo tu lakkhaṇānusārena, tatthodāharaṇānusārena ca veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:482_0: Evaṃ pubbācariyehi parikappitā paheḷikā ceti etāni sabbāni ekantena niyamena na madhurāni
anya-e0812n:482_1: attharasassa vā saddarasassa vā kassaci abhāvena assāditabbāni na hontīti iminā kāraṇena
anya-e0812n:482_2: sissānamuppanno khedoyeva bhayaṃ tato tesaṃ khedato vā uppannabhayato mayā upekkhiyantīti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:483_0: 33. Evaṃ sukaradukkaravasena duvidhattaṃ vatvā kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyappakāsane sappayojanayamakānañca,
anya-e0812n:483_1: kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānasammantane parabyāmohane cāti imesu sappayojanānañca paheḷikānamavacane
anya-e0812n:483_2: kāraṇaṃ niddisati “yamaka”miccādinā. Taṃ yamakaṃ yathāvuttaṃ sukaradukkarādibhedaṃ
anya-e0812n:483_3: yamakajātañca paheḷi ca pubbācariyehi niddiṭṭhā samāgabhādikā paheḷikā ca iti imāni
anya-e0812n:483_4: sabbāni ekantamadhurāni na iti assādetabbassa attharasassa, saddarasassa vā niyamato
anya-e0812n:483_5: abhāvā ekantena amadhurāni, iti iminā kāraṇena ca sissakhedabhayā sissānaṃ asahanasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n:483_6: asahanena jātāya vā bhītiyā ca mayā upekkhīyanti. Sissānaṃ khedoyeva bhayaṃ, sissakhedato
anya-e0812n:507_0: Ayaṃ panettha attho – padasandhinā padānaṃ sandhānato guḷhatthā apākaṭatthā samāgatā
anya-e0812n:507_1: nāma siyā. Guḷhatthāti pasiddhānuvādena apasiddhā samāgatā vidhīyate. Ito parampi
anya-e0812n:507_2: anuvādānuvādyabhāvo evaṃ veditabbo. Yattha paheḷikāyaṃ aññattha ruḷhena saddena aññasmiṃ
anya-e0812n:507_3: atthe pasiddhena ruḷhisaddena vañcanā vañcitā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:508_0: Atibyavahitappayogā atisayena antaritapayujjamānapadayuttā tatoyeva mohakārinī sammohakārikā
anya-e0812n:508_1: paheḷikā ukkantā nāma. Yassā paheḷikāya padāvali padapanti dubbodhatthā duranubodhābhidheyyā, sā pamussitā nāma.
anya-e0812n:509_1: nissāya āropanato upaṭṭhitapadayuttā samānarūpā nāma siyā. Paccayādīhi paccayādesādīhi
anya-e0812n:509_2: kathañcipi yena kenaci pakārena jātasaddā nipphannasaddā pharusā nāma.
anya-e0812n:510_0: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ vuttamapi byāmohakāraṇaṃ hoti, sā paheḷikā
anya-e0812n:510_1: saṅkhyātā nāma siyā. Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ vākyattho samudāyattho aññathā aññena
anya-e0812n:510_2: pakārena ābhāsate viññāyate, sā pakappitā nāma.
anya-e0812n:511_0: Yassā paheḷikāya nāme payuttābhidhāne nānatthakappanā vividhābhidheyyakappanā sambhavati,
anya-e0812n:511_1: sā paheḷikā nāmantarikā nāma. Tulyatthasutihetuto samānatthasaddānaṃ payogahetuyā
anya-e0812n:511_2: avaṭṭhitaññatthā patiṭṭhitaaññatthā hoti, sā nibhūtā nāma.
anya-e0812n:512_0: Yā paheḷikā iṭṭhasaddapariyāyasādhitā icchitatthasaddassa vevacanehi nipphāditā hoti,
anya-e0812n:512_1: sā samānasaddā nāma. Sādhukaṃ niddiṭṭhatthāpi dassitaatthayuttāpiyā mūḷhatāyeva sammohabhāvatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:513_0: Yassā paheḷikāya viracane nāmaṃ dassiyamānaṃ nāmaṃ sambandhabāhulyā sambandhassa
anya-e0812n:513_1: bahulabhāvato bhavati, sā pārihārikī nāma. Yassā ādheyyaṃ byañja abhibyañjiya pakāsetvā
anya-e0812n:513_2: nissayagopanā ādhāragutti bhavati, sā ekacchannā nāma.
anya-e0812n:514_0: Yassā payoge ubhayagopanā ubhinnamādhārādheyyānaṃ gopanā bhavati, sā ubhayacchannā
anya-e0812n:514_1: nāma. Yassā nānālakkhaṇasaṅkaro samāgatādinānāvidhalakkhaṇānaṃ saṅkaro hoti, sā saṃkiṇṇā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:515: Idāni samāgatādīnaṃ lakkhiyaṃ kamena evaṃ ñātabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n:519_0: Nātha tava pabhavato paṭṭhāya natavittiṇṇā oṇatavasena patthaṭā, evaṃ sati nadī viya
anya-e0812n:519_1: dissati. Pabhava pakaṭṭhatta sobhāvanta. Bho nātha tava tuyhaṃ mahatī satī mahantī
anya-e0812n:519_2: samānā āṇā ānatavittiṇṇā attani natesu janesu patthaṭā pahutaphalasādhinī bahulatthanipphādanī
anya-e0812n:519_3: cirāya cirakālaṃ jayataṃ ukkaṃsabhāvena pavattatu. Ettha pabhavaānataitisandhinā attho guḷho.
anya-e0812n:523_0: Vidhūtamadakibbisaṃ vināsitamadadosaṃ bhaddameva mandapiya pindapissa (ka.) – bhaddajātikesu
anya-e0812n:523_1: hatthīsu bhaddajātikahatthimeva upaseveyyāti vuttaṃ viya dissati. Bhaddameva uttamapurisameva
anya-e0812n:523_2: seveyyāti attho. Sevanaṃ kimatthanti ce? Hatthipakkhe danto sikkhito so hatthi attanisevitaṃ
anya-e0812n:523_3: attānaṃ bhajitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ puraṃ nagaraṃ sampāpeti. Purisapakkhe pana
anya-e0812n:523_4: danto damito so ariyapuggalo attanisevitaṃ attānamupasevitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ niddukkhaṃ
anya-e0812n:523_5: puraṃ nibbānapuraṃ pāpeti. Ettha kavicchitauttamatthato aññena hatthiatthe ruḷhena
anya-e0812n:527: Byākiṇṇadosatte satipi paheḷikāruḷhattā esā iṭṭhā. Vuttañhi “paheḷikāyamāruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā”ti. Iha sambandhīpadānaṃ aṭṭhānaṭṭhāpanena byavahitattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:531_0: Mukhaphullaṃ tilakādiṃ giṅgamakaṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ pasādhanaṃ niyuruggatthanunnataṃ niyuraṃ
anya-e0812n:531_1: valayaṃ, uggatthanaṃ payodharapaṭaṃ, unnataṃ nalāṭapaṭādikaṃ, mukhato unnatābharaṇañca
anya-e0812n:531_2: dhārayantiyā bhīruyā itthiyā paṭaccarī jiṇṇavatthanivāsī poso puriso varaṃ uttamo.
anya-e0812n:531_3: Ettha bahupayogarahitehi saddehi racitattā atthassa duravabodhatā.
anya-e0812n:535_0: Asmiṃ ratanākare aggaratanāni nava dissanti, ettha imesu ratanesu aṭṭha ratanāni
anya-e0812n:535_1: aṭṭhannaṃ purisānaṃ asādhāraṇāni, aparaṃ ratanaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ. Imāni nava lokuttarāni
anya-e0812n:535_2: cittīkatādiatthena “ratanānī”ti ca tappabhavo sammāsambuddho “ākaro”ti ca kappitoti
anya-e0812n:537: Rasavante sare satta, na nāgāpi uposathā”ti.
anya-e0812n:539_0: Himavantamahātale himālayassa matthake rasavante sodake satta sare anotattādike devagandhabbā
anya-e0812n:539_1: vindanti sevanti, uposathā nāgāpi na vindanti. Ayamaparattho. Himavantamahātale candaraṃsiyutte
anya-e0812n:539_2: mahāpāsādatale devagandhabbā kīḷamānā gandhabbā rasavante madhuraguṇayutte satta
