anya-e0812n:539_3: sare vīṇāya chajjādike satta sare vindanti, nāgāpi ariyāpi uposathāpi upavutthāpi
anya-e0812n:539_4: na vindanti nānubhavanti. Ettha dibbantīti devā. Uposatho etesamatthīti uposathāti
anya-e0812n:539_5: viggaho. Lakkhaṇakkamato pasiddhapacurapayogato aññadatthā yena kenaci lesena paccayādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:540: “Gītasadde sarā dve dve, dve chajjaññatra chassarā;
anya-e0812n:541: Pañcavaṇṇaṃ yathā cakkhu, chabbaṇṇā nāsikā tathā”ti.
anya-e0812n:543_0: Gītasadde sarā dve honti, chajja’ññatra chajjato aññatra chajjaṃ vajjetvā usabho
anya-e0812n:543_1: gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādoti. Ettha yugaḷato dve dve chassarā chasaravanto.
anya-e0812n:543_2: Yathā cakkhu pañcavaṇṇaṃ hoti, tathā evaṃ nāsikā chabbaṇṇā hoti, gītasadde īkāraakārasaradvayasabbhāvato
anya-e0812n:543_3: ca chajjaṃ ṭhapetvā usabhādīsu sarānaṃ tividhattā ca “cakkhū”ti sarabyañjanavasena
anya-e0812n:543_4: pañcavaṇṇānaṃ sabbhāvato ca “nāsikā”ti channaṃ sabbhāvato ca evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha vuttasaṅkhyāgītādisaddasanniṭṭhānato sammohakārinī hoti.
anya-e0812n:547_0: Sirimā sirimanto rattamaṇḍalo anurattajanapadamaṇḍalo, anurattaamaccamaṇḍalo vā sakantigahanakkhattasaṅghayutto
anya-e0812n:547_1: sakassa attano ante samīpe gahanehi aviraḷehi khattasaṅghehi khattiyasamūhehi yutto
anya-e0812n:547_2: saṃyutto sulakkhaṇo pasatthapurisalakkhaṇo udito pasiddho rājā narindo vo tumhe pātu
anya-e0812n:547_3: rakkhatūti ayaṃ anadhippetattho. Sirimā “lakkhiyā vāsaṭṭhānattā”ti vuttattā sirimanto
anya-e0812n:547_5: gahanakkhattatāragaṇehi yutto sulakkhaṇo suṭṭhu sasalakkhaṇo udito uggato rājā cando
anya-e0812n:547_6: vo tumhe pātūti ubhayapakkhassa sādhāraṇaguṇaguṇīpadapariggahena idha vākyatthassa
anya-e0812n:549: Sanātano ca na isi, na sakhā na sanātano”ti.
anya-e0812n:551_0: Eko ādo pubbe “isī”ti vuccati, sumahantopakāravā atimahantopakārasamannāgato sanātano
anya-e0812n:551_1: ca sassato ca hoti, tathāpi na isi isi nāma na hoti, na sakhā mittopi na hoti, na
anya-e0812n:551_2: sanātano sassatopi na hoti, ayaṃ gamyamānattho. Sumahā atimahanto eko ādo nāmādimhi
anya-e0812n:551_3: isīti vuccati, anto majjhe pakāravā pa-kārena samannāgato, sanātano ca sassato ca
anya-e0812n:551_4: hoti, isipi nāma na hoti, mittopi na hoti, so nātano tanaiti akkharadvayarahito na
anya-e0812n:551_5: hoti. Ādimajjhānaṃ vuttattā anteti ñāyati, “isipatanavihāro”ti gahetabbaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0812n:555_0: Udayā udayato pabhuti atthaṃ yāva atthaṃ dhāvantaṃ javantaṃ muhuttaṃ muhuttakālaṃ
anya-e0812n:555_1: na nivattati na punāvattati. Etaṃ candamaṇḍalampi na hoti, ādiccamaṇḍalampi na hoti.
anya-e0812n:555_2: Udayā paṭisandhito atthaṃ yāvacuti. Dhāvantanti āyukiccato āyucandādīnamatthānaṃ,
anya-e0812n:557: Hitvā na sari so dhīro, karontopyu’yyamavhaya”nti karontomuttamavhayanti (ka.).
anya-e0812n:559_0: Kittimahīnāmaṃ kittimahīnaṃ dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ deviṃ aggamahesiṃ kaḷāratthavhayaṃ
anya-e0812n:559_1: puriṃ kaḷāraatthānaṃ dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ puriṃ nagarañca so dhīro hitvā pariccajitvā
anya-e0812n:559_2: uyyamavhayaṃ uyyamanāmena samannāgataṃ karonto api na sari sampattiṃ nānusari, yasodharādeviñca
anya-e0812n:559_3: kapilavatthupuriñca hitvā vīriyasaṅkhātapadhānaṃ karonto mahāsatto sampattiṃ na sari,
anya-e0812n:563_0: Sindhavā cattāro assā catuddisāmukhā yathā catuddisāsammukhā honti, tathā bandhā
anya-e0812n:563_1: majjhe nikkhittaṃ tiṇaṃ sayaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanti, aññamaññaṃ piṭṭhiṃ katvā
anya-e0812n:563_2: bandhā viya khāyati, te pana sammukhaṃ katvā bandhā honti. Ettha “catuddisāmukhābandhā”ti
anya-e0812n:563_3: niddiṭṭhattā piṭṭhiṃ katvā bandhāti sammuḷhatā hoti.
anya-e0812n:567_0: Jīvanajānandakarabandhussa jīvanato udakato jātānaṃ padumānaṃ ānandakarassa sūriyassa
anya-e0812n:567_1: bandhussa sammāsambuddhassa bhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ sakkaronto pūjento jano puññārikkhayagocare
anya-e0812n:567_2: puññānaṃ paṭipakkhattā puññārisaṅkhātānaṃ akusalānaṃ khayassa nimittabhūtaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:567_3: katvā uppanne maggaphale pappoti pāpuṇāti. Ettha jīvanajānaṃ ānandakarassa bandhusseti
anya-e0812n:567_4: ca, puññārīnaṃ khayanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatteti ca iminā buddho maggaphalā
anya-e0812n:567_5: ca pārampariyena sambandhena vuttāti sambandhānaṃ bāhullabhāvo.
anya-e0812n:568: “Na gaṇhāti mahantampi, saddaṃ na ca vibhūsanaṃ;
anya-e0812n:571_0: Kassāpi catuppadassa kaṇṇo mahantampi saddaṃ na gaṇhāti, ārammaṇaṃ na karoti, vibhūsanampi
anya-e0812n:571_1: na gaṇhāti. Tathāpi ayaṃ kaṇṇo aphalo na kila, saphalato nipphalo na hoti kira. Assakaṇṇo
anya-e0812n:571_2: rukkho. Ettha kaṇṇoti ādheyyaṃ katvā tadādhārassa avacanato nissayagutti.
anya-e0812n:575_0: Sassiriko sadevakaṃ bhuvanaṃ alaṅkarontoti buddho viya khāyati. Bhuvanaṃ bhuvanasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n:575_1: kaṃ jalaṃ sadā eva alaṅkaronto sassiriko lakkhiyasamannāgato kasmiṃ jale sañjātasaṃvaddho
anya-e0812n:575_2: ko kataro kena jalena na upalimpati na limpati. Padumoti visajjanaṃ. Padumo hi puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgo.
anya-e0812n:575_3: Iha jalapadumānaṃ dvinnampi chāditattā ubhayacchannā nāma.
anya-e0812n:579_0: Ante avasāne yo hoti, ādopi soyeva hoti, majjhimassa ādibhūto majjhimo eva hoti,
anya-e0812n:579_1: siddhaṃ nipphannaṃ tādīsu ariyesu vattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ vada kathehīti ayamaparattho.
anya-e0812n:579_2: Ādo ādimhi soyeva sakāro eva ante pariyosāne yo yakāroyeva, majjhimo majjhimavaṇṇo
anya-e0812n:579_3: majjhimassa saddassa ādi makāro, siddhantādīsu matasamayakālādīsu vattantaṃ vācakabhāvena
anya-e0812n:579_4: pavattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ saṅkhatato aññattā asaṅkhatabhūtaṃ paññattiṃ vada kathehīti.
anya-e0812n:579_5: Samayasaddo hi nāmapaññatti. Ettha siddhantasaddena ādisaddassa saṅgahitattā tādiattho
anya-e0812n:579_7: aññattharuḷhasaddena vañcitattā vañcitālakkhaṇena ca samayasadde nānatthakappanato
anya-e0812n:579_8: nāmantarikālakkhaṇena cāti tīhipi lakkhaṇehi missitoti. Sesesupi saṃkiṇṇattaṃ evameva
anya-e0812n:579_9: veditabbaṃ. Tattha tattha vuttalakkhaṇānusāreneva samāgatādīnaṃ anvatthasaññatā veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:583_0: 34. “Desi”ccādi. Deso thalajaladesādi. Kālo rattindivo. Kalā naccagītādayo. Loko
anya-e0812n:583_1: carācarabhūtappavatti. Ñāyo yutti. Āgamo idha buddhavacanaṃ. Aññattha tu sutidhammasaṃhitā,
anya-e0812n:583_2: te ca. Tehi virodho assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi. Yanti anuvaditvā. Taṃ virodhipadanti
anya-e0812n:583_3: vidhīyate. Etañca padaṃ udāharaṇato lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Yato jalajādīnaṃ thalādīsu
anya-e0812n:583_4: pātubhāvādi, ratyādīsu sambhavantānaṃ kusumādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca, “naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n:583_6: ca, “aggisītalo, nissāro khadiro”tiādinā lokasīmātikkamo ca, vuttāyapā’naruppattasamuppattiyā
anya-e0812n:583_7: middhassa rūpabhāvāpādanādiñāyavirodho ca, yathāsakamāgamena virodho ca sukhena ca
anya-e0812n:583_8: sakkā pākaṭattā viññātuṃ, tato sabbametaṃ nodāhaṭanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:584_0: 34. Evaṃ yamakapaheḷikānamadassane kāraṇaṃ vatvā idāni uddesakkamena sampattavirodhidosaṃ
anya-e0812n:584_1: “desakāli”ccādinā vadati. Yaṃ padaṃ deso thalajalapabbatādi. Kālo rattindivo hemantādivasena
anya-e0812n:584_2: tividho, vasantādivasena chabbidho. Kalā naccagītādicatusaṭṭhi. Loko thāvarajaṅgamabhūtapavattisaṅkhāto.
anya-e0812n:584_3: Ñāyo yutti. Āgamo iha buddhavacanaṃ, aññattha pana sutidhammasaṃhito ca. Tehi virodho
anya-e0812n:584_4: assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi. Taṃ virodhipadaṃ nāma. Etaṃ virodhipadaṃ udāharaṇato
anya-e0812n:584_5: lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ paribyattaṃ. Vassikajātisumanādīnaṃ jalajādibhāvo ca, padumakumudādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:584_6: thalajādibhāvo ca, rattiādīsu labbhamānānaṃ kumudādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca, naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n:584_7: kalāsu “chajjo usabho gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādo”ti dassitasattasarānamekadesassa
anya-e0812n:584_8: chajjassa bhinnasattasaro chajjo nāmāti samudāyavasena vohārakaraṇādīhi satthāgatataṃ,
anya-e0812n:584_9: lakkhaṇātikkamañca, “aggi sītalo, candanaṃ uṇhaṃ, khadirarukkho nissāro, eraṇḍo sasāro”
anya-e0812n:584_10: iccādinā lokamariyādātikkamo ca, middhassa arūpabhāvupapattiyā vuttāyapi rūpabhāvasādhanasadisayuttivirodhikathanañca,
anya-e0812n:584_11: yathāsakamāgamamatikkamma kathanañcāti sabbesaṃ viruddhasabhāvassa pākaṭattā udāharaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:584_12: na dassayissāmāti adhippāyo. Imesameva desādivirodhīnamaviruddhattaṃ ettheva virodhipadadosaparihāre
anya-e0812n:584_13: “bodhisattappabhāvenā”ticcādinā dissati. Desa…pe… gamehi virodho, so assa atthīti
anya-e0812n:587: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:588_0: 35. “Ya”miccādi. Appatītaṃ saddato, atthato vā anadhigataṃ nahyaññathāvagamo ganthantarābhāvato.
anya-e0812n:588_1: Vakkhati hi “dullabhāvagatī sadda-sāmatthiyavilaṅghinī”ti. Yaṃ kiñci padaṃ samānīya
anya-e0812n:588_2: ānetvā vattabbaṃ, taṃ neyyamāhu. Yathetyudāharati. Sabbāpi sakalāpi disā pubbadisādayo
anya-e0812n:588_3: dasa disā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ dhavalā ujjalā rocanti dippantīti ettake niddiṭṭhe candamarīcino ettha neyyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:589_0: 35. Idāni neyyadosamudāharati “ya”miccādinā. Yaṃ padaṃ appatītaṃ padantarena, tenābhihitatthena
anya-e0812n:589_1: vā “imassatthoya”miti aviññātaṃ ānīya vattabbaṃ, tatoyeva padantaramānīya vattabbaṃ
anya-e0812n:589_2: hoti, taṃ neyyamāhu “neyyadoso”ti porāṇā āhu. Yathā tatthodāharaṇamīdisaṃ “sabbāpi
anya-e0812n:589_3: dhavalā disā rocanti rattiya”nti. Sabbāpi disā pubbadakkhiṇādayo dasa disā dhavalā
anya-e0812n:589_4: setā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ rocanti dippanti. Ettha disāya visesanaṃ dhavalaguṇaṃ kelāsakūṭasudhābhitticandaraṃsiādīsu
anya-e0812n:589_5: kuto sañjātamiti anicchitattā aññanivattanatthaṃ candakiraṇādivācakapadaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0812n:589_6: dhavalatā imineti vattabbattā dhavala padaṃ neyyadosena duṭṭhaṃ hoti. Patītaṃ viññātaṃ,
anya-e0812n:589_7: na patītaṃ appatītaṃ. Ettha akāro pasajjapaṭisedhe.
anya-e0812n:591: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0812n:593_0: 36. Appatītaṃ nicchanti viññūti dassetumāha “ne”tiādi. Īdisaṃ anantare vuttappakāraṃ
anya-e0812n:593_1: neyyaṃ sabbepi viññuno ñeyyavidū sabbattha gajjādike na bahu maññanti na sambhāventi
anya-e0812n:593_2: nappayujjanti. Kiṃ na bahumaññantīti ce āha “dullabhā”tiādi. Tathā hi avagatī atthāvagamo
anya-e0812n:593_3: saddaṃ vācakaṃ, sāmatthiyañca ñāyaṃ vilaṅghayati cajati anupadassanatoti saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī
anya-e0812n:593_4: dullabhā na labhyate. Ñāyopattho vā saddopattho vā yottho na hoti. So nappatīyate
anya-e0812n:593_5: yathā manasi avaṭṭhitamattenāti attho. Tasmā saddato, atthato vā patītabbamaneyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:594_0: 36. Imaṃ appatītapadaṃ viññūhi nābhimatanti dassento āha “nedisa”miccādi. Īdisaṃ
anya-e0812n:594_1: yathāvuttappakāraṃ neyyaṃ sabbe viññuno sabbattha gajjapajjādike na bahu maññanti
anya-e0812n:594_2: na sambhāventi nappayojenti. Avagatī atthāvabodho saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī saddasaṅkhātavācakañca
anya-e0812n:594_3: sāmatthiyasaṅkhātañāyañca atikkamma pavattinī dullabhā tādisapayogābhāvato dullabhā
anya-e0812n:594_4: hoti. Yo attho saddāgato, ñāyāgato vā na hoti, so kattuno manasi patiṭṭhitamattena
anya-e0812n:594_5: patīto na hotīti taṃ padaṃ neyyadosamiti sabbe kavino pariharantīti adhippāyo. Bahumānaṃ
anya-e0812n:594_6: karontīti vākye bahumaññantīti nāmadhātu. Saddasāmatthiyaṃ vilaṅghayati sīlenāti
anya-e0812n:600_0: 37. “Siyā”iccādi. Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ. Nibbisesanantu
anya-e0812n:600_1: vuttatthameva hoti. Taṃ visesanāpekkhaṃ siyā. “Taṃ yathe”tyādinā udāharati. “Passatī”ti
anya-e0812n:601_0: 37. “Siyā”miccādi. Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā sātthakaṃ atthasahitaṃ, tadabhāve niratthakaṃ
anya-e0812n:601_1: hoti, taṃ visesanāpekkhaṃ nāma siyā. Taṃ yathā tassodāharaṇamevaṃ “taṃ so bhiyyo
anya-e0812n:601_2: passati cakkhunā”ti. So puriso taṃ purisaṃ bhiyyo yebhuyyasā cakkhunā passati. Ettha
anya-e0812n:601_3: “passatī”ti vutteyeva “cakkhunā”ti ñāyati. Cakkhunāti visesyapadaṃ visesanaṃ laddhāva
anya-e0812n:601_4: sātthakaṃ hoti. Visesane apekkhā assāti ca, saha atthena vattamānaṃ sātthakamiti ca samāso.
anya-e0812n:603: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0812n:605_0: 38. “Hīna”miccādi. Yaṃ visesanapadaṃ visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ hīnaṃ lāmakaṃ kare kareyya,
anya-e0812n:605_1: taṃ visesanapadaṃ hīnatthaṃ hīno attho yassa taṃ hīnatthaṃ nāma bhaveyya. “Yathā”ityādinā
anya-e0812n:605_2: udāharati. Nippabhīkato khajjoto yena so divākaro pabhākaro samudeti upagacchatīti.
anya-e0812n:606_0: 38. “Hīnaṃ kare”ccādi. Yaṃ padaṃ visesyaṃ hīnaṃ karoti, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave. Yathā
anya-e0812n:606_2: khajjotā yena so divākaro sūriyo samudeti uggacchati. “Nippabhīkatakhajjoto”ti iminā
anya-e0812n:606_4: nindāyeva, na thutīti visesyaṃ hīnatthaṃ hoti. Hīno attho yasseti ca, natthi pabhā
anya-e0812n:606_5: etesanti ca, nippabhā katāti ca, nippabhīkatā khajjotā yenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:610: 39. Hi api casaddānaṃ pādapūraṇamattattā anatthakattaṃ. Visesanavisesyapadadoso.
anya-e0812n:611_1: pūraṇamattameva hoti, taṃ anatthamiti mataṃ ñātaṃ. Yathāsaddo vuttattho. Buddhassa
anya-e0812n:611_2: pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pādambujaṃ vandeti. Ettha hi apicāti imesaṃ samattanādiatthesu appavattito
anya-e0812n:611_3: kevalaṃ pādapūraṇamattato anatthakattaṃ. Mattasaddo avadhāraṇe. Visesanavisesyapadadoso.
anya-e0812n:615: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0812n:617_0: 40. “Saddato”iccādi. Saddato vācakena tasmiṃyevatthe tasseva saddassa puna payogato
anya-e0812n:617_1: atthato abhidheyyena pubbapaṭipādikasseva vatthussāvisesena puna paṭipādanato vuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:617_2: payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi vuccati punapi payujjate,
anya-e0812n:617_3: tamekatthanti anuvaditvā “yathe”ccādinā vidhīyate. Vāriṃ dadātīti vārido. Ayaṃ vārido
anya-e0812n:617_4: megho ābhāti dippatīti. Jaladānamattāpekkhāya idaṃ saddato ekatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n:618_0: 40. Idāni uddiṭṭhakkamena vākyadosaṃ niddisati “saddato”ccādinā. Saddato vācakena
anya-e0812n:618_1: atthato abhidheyyena vuttaṃ payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi
anya-e0812n:618_2: punapi vuccati yujjate, taṃ vākyaṃ ekatthaṃ nāma doso. Udāharaṇaṃ “yathi”ccādi. Vārido
anya-e0812n:618_3: jaladāyako ayaṃ vārido megho ābhāti dippati. Sampattisādhakaṃ “jaladāyako”ccādivisesanaṃ
anya-e0812n:618_4: vinā jaladānamattassa vuttattā saddato ekatthaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:623_0: 41. Titthiyasaṅkhātānaṃ aṅkurānaṃ bījāni uppattihetubhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni dvāsaṭṭhi
anya-e0812n:623_1: diṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto dūrīkaronto so mahāmuni sammāsambuddho iha loke attani pasanne
anya-e0812n:623_2: pasādabahule mahājane pasādetīti aparamudāharaṇaṃ. Pasādasaṅkhātassa atthassa “pasanne
anya-e0812n:624_1: uppattikāraṇabhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni sassatādibhedabhinnā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto
anya-e0812n:624_2: apanento iha loke pasanne attani pasanne mahājane pasādeti. Pasannasaddena vuttappasādasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n:624_3: atthassa pasādetīti kriyāpadenapi vuttattā sadde bhinnepi atthato ekanti atthato
anya-e0812n:624_4: ekatthassudāharaṇaṃ. Titthiyā eva aṅkurāni, tesaṃ bījāni, diṭṭhīsu gatāni, diṭṭhiyo
anya-e0812n:627: Kāpi paññā, kopi guṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0812n:628_0: 42. Āraddho vattumupakkamanto, kamo vacanapaṭipāṭi. Tassa vicchedo bhaṅgo, tato.
anya-e0812n:628_1: “Yathe”tiādinā udāharati. Avuttassapi pasādavasā ajjhāhāroti. Mahāmuni tava te paññā
anya-e0812n:628_2: kāpi sātisayattā aniddhāritaṃ sabhāvavisesā kāciyeva, aho pavattamānāyapi vasabhāvassāniddhāritattā
anya-e0812n:628_3: acchariyanti attho. Ettha kāpi kopīti sabbanāmapadakkamassa pakatīti ettha vicchinnattā bhaggarīti.
anya-e0812n:629_1: bhaggarīti bhave bhaggarītivākyadoso bhavati. Udāharati “yathi”ccādi. Mahāmuni tava
anya-e0812n:629_2: tuyhaṃ paññā sātisayabhūtā paññā kāpi vacanavisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva. Guṇo sīlasamādhiādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇasamūho
anya-e0812n:629_3: kopi pamāṇapariggahassa kenaci lesenapi kattumasakkuṇeyyattā kopiyeva. Pakatīpi acinteyyabhūtā
anya-e0812n:629_4: pakatīpi evameva aho vijjamānānaṃyeva paññādīnaṃ sabhāvāvabodhassa dukkaratā acchariyā.
anya-e0812n:629_5: Kāpi kopīti padakkamassa “pakatī”ti ettha suññattā rītibhaṅgo. Āraddhoyeva kamo,
anya-e0812n:629_6: tassa vicchedo, bhaggā rīti assa, ettha vāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:633_0: 43. “Padāna”miccādi. Yattha yasmiṃ vākye padānaṃ syādyantākhyātikānaṃ dubbinikkhepā
anya-e0812n:633_1: duṭṭhapanato byāmoho saṃmuḷhatā jāyati uppajjati, taṃ vākyaṃ byākiṇṇanti viññeyyaṃ
anya-e0812n:633_2: ñātabbaṃ. Tassa byākiṇṇassa udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ “yathe”ti dasseti. Yathā idaṃ, tathā aññampīti attho.
anya-e0812n:634_1: vākye byāmoho saṃmoho jāyati, taṃ byākiṇṇadosoti viññeyyaṃ. Tadudāharaṇaṃ tassa byākiṇṇadosassa
anya-e0812n:638_0: 44. Bahuanantattā bahubhūte guṇe sīlādike samanussaraṃ sammadeva uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya
anya-e0812n:638_1: anussaranto guṇavisayasatiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpento teneva kāraṇena pamudito haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
anya-e0812n:638_2: ayaṃ jano sabbopi loko dujjanānaṃ sujanetarānampi devadattādīnaṃ niccaṃ kālaṃ hitaṃ
anya-e0812n:638_3: sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ paṇamati namassatīti ayaṃ attho kavivañcito. Tattha “bahuguṇe
anya-e0812n:639_1: visesato anussaranto pamudito tatoyeva pahaṭṭho ayaṃ jano sattanikāyo dujjanānampi
anya-e0812n:639_2: asappurisānampi niccaṃ satataṃ hitaṃ mittabhūtaṃ sugataṃ sabbaññuṃ paṇamati vandati.
anya-e0812n:639_3: Ettha padānaṃ aṭṭhānapayogato byākiṇṇattaṃ padatthānusāreneva gamyate.
anya-e0812n:642: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃ nvi’daṃ.
anya-e0812n:643_0: 45. Visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthassa vacanato kathanato apetaṃ pariccattaṃ. Kaññeityāmantanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:643_1: Ahaṃ taṃ icchāmi, tādisaṃ maṃ tvaṃ kasmā nicchasi, idaṃ kiṃ nu iti gāmikajanavacanattā
anya-e0812n:644_1: kathanato parihīnaṃ vākyaṃ “gāmmadosa”nti kavīhi abhimataṃ. Udāharati “yathi”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:644_2: Kaññe he kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ icchayamānaṃ maṃ na kāmayasi tvaṃ na icchasi,
anya-e0812n:644_3: idaṃ kiṃ nu. Īdise icchāvighāte vuccamāne evaṃ–
anya-e0812n:648: Sa manmathonyatra gato mato nu”iti viya.
anya-e0812n:649_0: Piyatthassa kathanābhāvato “kaññe”tyādikaṃ vacanaṃ milakkhukānaṃ vacanattā gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n:649_1: Ettha kaññāsaddo dasavassikāya vattatīti niyamo natthi. Visiṭṭhassa atthassa vacanato apetanti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:653_0: 46. “Pade”ccādi. Padasandhānato pubbāparānaṃ padānaṃ sandhivasena yaṃ kiñci vākyaṃ
anya-e0812n:653_1: duṭṭhu asutisubhagaṃ patītimavabodhaṃ karotīti karaṃ bhave, tampi yathāvuttaṃ gāmmantyabhimataṃ.
anya-e0812n:653_2: Yathātyudāharati. Bhavato yā kāci vanitā piyā hotīti ekottho. Yabha methune. Yabhanaṃ
anya-e0812n:653_3: yābho. So vijjate yassa so yābhavā. Tassa yābhavato piyāityapi bhavati.
anya-e0812n:654_0: 46. “Padasandhāni”ccādi. Kiñci vākyaṃ padasandhānato pubbāparapadānaṃ ghaṭanato duppatītikaraṃ
anya-e0812n:654_1: bhave asabbhabhūtaduṭṭhatthassa pakāsako hoti, tampi gāmmanti yathāvuttagāmmadosena
anya-e0812n:654_2: dūsitanti duppasitanti (ka.) sabbehi kavīhi abhimataṃ ñātaṃ. Yathāti udāharati. Bhavato
anya-e0812n:654_3: bhavantassa yā kāci itthī piyā bhavatīti ayaṃ kavinā icchitattho. Yābhavato methunavantassa
anya-e0812n:654_4: piyātipi attho. “Yabha methune”ti hi dhātu. Yabhanaṃ yābho, so assa atthīti yābhavā,
anya-e0812n:654_5: tassa yābhavatoti gahite asotabbattā duppatītikaratā. Duṭṭhāyeva patīti avabodho,
anya-e0812n:656: Vuttesu sūcite ṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0812n:657: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0812n:658_1: “etthayatī”ti chandovicitiyā pakāsitaṭṭhāne padānaṃ syādyantānaṃ chedo vicchiti vibhāgo
anya-e0812n:658_2: anuvādo yaṃ yati bhaveti vidhīyati. Tāya yatiyā hīnaṃ parihīnaṃ viruddhaṃ yaṃ vākyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:658_3: taṃ yatihīnanti vuttaṃ, “yamanaṃ virāmo yati, sā hīnā etthā”ti katvā. Panāti visese,
anya-e0812n:659_1: yatī”ti pakāsite ṭhāne padacchedo syādyantatyādyantādīnaṃ padānaṃ vicchedo yati nāma
anya-e0812n:659_2: bhave, tāya yatiyā yaṃ vākyaṃ hīnaṃ abhimataṭṭhāne vaṇṇavicchedena parihīnaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0812n:659_3: vākyaṃ yatihīnanti yatihīnadosena duṭṭhanti viññūhi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:661: Yati sabbattha pādante, vuttaḍḍhe ca visesato;
anya-e0812n:663_1: ante avasāne ca visesato visesena ekantena vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ pādadvayasaṅkhāte
anya-e0812n:663_2: aḍḍhe ca, tadavasāne cāti adhippāyo. “Siyā”ti seso. Nanu “padacchedo”ti vuttattā
anya-e0812n:663_3: padamajjhe yati na hotevāti ceti āha “pubba”iccādi. Katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne, na sabbattha.
anya-e0812n:663_4: Pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhepi yatīti sambandho. Pubbe ca apare ca pubbāpare. Aneke
anya-e0812n:663_5: vaṇṇā anekavaṇṇā. Pubbāpare anekavaṇṇā yassa taṃ tathā. Tañca taṃ padañca, tassa majjhepi.
anya-e0812n:664_0: 48. Idāni yatimhi labbhamānaṃ sabbavisayaṃ dasseti “yati”ccādinā. Sā pana yati sabbattha
anya-e0812n:664_1: pādante catutthaṃsasaṅkhātagāthāpādānaṃ ante ca visesato niyamato vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ
anya-e0812n:664_2: pādadvayasaṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca, tadavasāne cāti adhippāyo. Katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhepi
anya-e0812n:664_5: vuttaṃ. Ettha pādanto, vuttaḍḍho, padamajjhañca yatiṭṭhānanti. Padamajjheyeva labbhamānā
anya-e0812n:664_6: yati katthaci hoti, dvakkharatyakkharapadamajjhe pana na hoti.
anya-e0812n:669_1: suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā namāmi. Kīdisaṃ? Yo tathāgato sakalāpi
anya-e0812n:669_2: disā sabbāyeva dasa disā soṇṇarasehi cāmīkaravaṇṇattā rasehi suvaṇṇarasehi siñcatīva
anya-e0812n:669_3: siñcatīti maññe, taṃ tathāgatanti apekkhate. Ettha pubbapādante vuttaḍḍhe ca niyatā
anya-e0812n:669_4: yati. Cāmīkarasaddo cettha caturakkharo. Tattha cāmīiti pubbabhāgo, karaiti paro.
anya-e0812n:669_5: Ettha pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhe yati. Siñcatīti ettha pana pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhattābhāvā
anya-e0812n:670_0: 49. Tattha pādantavuttaḍḍhesu yatiyā pākaṭattā tasmiṃ padamajjhe yatiyā udāharaṇapaccudāharaṇāni
anya-e0812n:670_1: iṭṭhodāharaṇapaṭipakkhodāharaṇāni yathā. “Taṃ name”ccādi. Yo tathāgato sakalāpi disā
anya-e0812n:670_2: soṇṇarasehi suvaṇṇarasadhārāhi siñcatīva siñcati maññe, ivasaddo vitakke. Cāmīkaravaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:670_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇaṃ taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā name. Ettha “cāmīkaravaṇṇa”nti
anya-e0812n:670_4: yatiyā cāmīti akkharadvayamatikkamma ṭhitattā antepi karaiti akkharadvayenānūnattā
anya-e0812n:670_6: vaṇṇadvayamatikkamma yatiyā dissamānattepi tiiti parabhāge ekavaṇṇattā anekavaṇṇābhāvoti
anya-e0812n:670_7: paccudāharaṇaṃ. Ettha anekavaṇṇattaṃ padavaseneva ñātabbaṃ. Cāmīkarassa vaṇṇo viya
anya-e0812n:672: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0812n:674_0: 50. “Saro”ccādi. Vibhattiyā lope sati sandhimhi saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ saro parapadādibhūto
anya-e0812n:674_1: pubbanto viya pubbapadassa antabhūto yo saro, so viya hoti, anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi
anya-e0812n:674_2: tato vihitayatiyā nevatthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo. Aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope tu sati
anya-e0812n:674_3: saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ pubbapadantabhūto saro ce, aññathā aññena pakārena hoti, parapadassādisaro
anya-e0812n:674_4: viya hotīti attho. Taṃ vibhattiyā saddhiṃ vihāya katayatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:674_5: Tattha tassaṃ yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kātabbo yakārādesādi parādiva parapadassa
anya-e0812n:674_6: ādisaro viya hoti. Katayādesādisahitaṃ byañjanaṃ vihāya katāya yatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:675_0: 50. Idāni heṭṭhā vuttassa viruddhattepi yatibhaṅgābhāvaṃ dassento āha “saro”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:675_1: Vibhattiyā lope sandhimhi sati saro sandhisaro pubbanto viya pubbapadassa anto viya
anya-e0812n:675_2: hoti, aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ aññathā hoti, pubbapadantabhūto
anya-e0812n:675_3: saro parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti. Tattha yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kattabbayakārādesādi
anya-e0812n:675_4: parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti, pubbantasadisasaramatikkamitvāpi parapadādisarasadisavaṇṇamāgamma
anya-e0812n:675_6: anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi yatibhaṅgo na hotīti adhippāyo. Pubbassa antoti ca, yo ca so
anya-e0812n:675_7: ādeso ca, so ādi yassa makārādinoti ca, parassa ādīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:679_0: 51. Niccaṃ anavarataṃ pubbapadaṃ sitā nissitā cādī cakārādayo nipātā pubbassa padassa
anya-e0812n:679_1: antā avayavā viya honti, te anto katvā yati kātabbāti adhippāyo. Parena parapadena
anya-e0812n:679_2: niccasambandhā satatayogino, tusaddo aṭṭhānappayutto, pādayo tu parādīva parapadassa
anya-e0812n:679_3: ādī avayavā viya honti, taṃ vihāya pubbapadante yati kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:680_0: 51. “Cādi”ccādi. Niccaṃ satataṃ pubbapadassitā pubbapadaṃ nissāya pavattā cādī cakārādinipātā
anya-e0812n:680_1: pubbapadantāva pubbapadassa antā avayavā viya honti, parena parapadena niccasambandhā
anya-e0812n:680_2: nirantarayogino pādayo tu pādiupasaggā pana parādīva parapadassa ādī avayavāviya
anya-e0812n:680_3: honti. Cādayo āgamma te bahi katvāpi pādayo āgamma te anto katvāpi pavatto virāmo
anya-e0812n:680_4: yatibhaṅgoti adhippāyo. Coādi yesanti ca, pubbapadaṃ sitāti ca, po ādi yesanti ca,
anya-e0812n:680_5: niccaṃ sambandhāti ca viggaho. Ettha ca tagguṇasaṃviññāṇattā cakārapakārādīnampi pariggaho.
anya-e0812n:684: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta-sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0812n:687: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0812n:688_1: adhippāyo tu yato lokaggataṃ patto, tato sabbopamātīto, yato paññāmettā loke nirantaramiva
anya-e0812n:688_2: vattanti, tato anantamati, uttamo cāti. Ettha “sabbā upamā”ti samāsaṃ katvā vibhattilope
anya-e0812n:688_3: saṃhitāyañca katāyaṃ parapadādiukāro pubbapadantabbakāraṭṭhaakāro viya hotīti sabbo
anya-e0812n:688_4: iccatra pādantayati. Pattassopamā iccatra yakārādesassa parādisadisabhāvo viya hoti,
anya-e0812n:688_5: vibhattiyā alope saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ savibhattiyā akāro parapadādi ukāro viya hotīti
anya-e0812n:688_6: taṃvibhattiyā pasiddhaṃ vihāya pattaiccatra pādantayati. Tathā vandāmyanantaiccatra
anya-e0812n:688_7: yakārādesassa parādisadisabhāvo vihitoti myasaddaṃ vajjetvā vandāiccatra pādantayati.
anya-e0812n:688_8: Pubbapadassitānaṃ cādīnaṃ pubbapadantasadisatā vuttāti mettā cāti casaddato yati,
anya-e0812n:688_9: aparapadasambandhā pādayo parapadādisadisā hontīti nissīmāti ettha nisaddaṃ vihāya tato ādimhi yati.
anya-e0812n:689_1: ta”miccādi, lokaggataṃ pattassa yassa buddhassa upamā na hi yujjati sakalapadatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n:689_2: atikkamma ṭhitattā na hi yujjati. Sabbopamātītaṃ taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā name namāmi.
anya-e0812n:689_3: Sabboti ettha okārassa pubbapadantasarasadisattā tato parāya yatiyā ca ssopamāti
anya-e0812n:689_4: parapadādisadisaṃ vaṇṇamanatikkamma ṭhitāya yatiyā ca udāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:690_0: “Muninde”ccādi. Yassa sambuddhassa paññā ca mettā canissīmā anantasattaanantañeyyavisayakaraṇato
anya-e0812n:690_1: sīmārahitā ativijambhati. Anantamatiṃ udayabbayasambhavepi ñeyyassānantattā visayimhi
anya-e0812n:690_2: visayavohārena anantapaññāya samannāgataṃ uttamaṃ tato eva pavaraṃ taṃ munindaṃ sadā
anya-e0812n:690_3: vandāmi, yādesassa parādisadisattā tamanāgamma yati bhavati. Mettācanissīmāti ettha
anya-e0812n:690_4: cādīnaṃ pubbapadantasadisattāca pādīnaṃ parapadādisadisattā ca “cā”ti “nī”ti imesampi yati bhavati.
anya-e0812n:695_0: 54. “Mahā”iccādi. Yatthāti yasmiṃ jine. Paramodayāti mahāmettādayo ukkaṭṭhābhivuḍḍhiyo.
anya-e0812n:695_1: Tatoyeva varaguṇālayaṃ, teneva pavaraṃ uttamaṃ taṃ jinanti sambandho. Ettha pubbapadanissitaṃ
anya-e0812n:695_2: cakāraṃ parapadādibhūtaṃ katvā tato pubbe katā yati ca, parapadādisambandhapakāraṃ
anya-e0812n:695_3: pubbapadantabhūtaṃ katvā pakārato paraṃ katā yati ca viruddhāti ubhayattha paccudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:696_0: 54. Cādipādīsu visayabhūtesu paccudāharaṇaṃ yathā. “Mahāmetti”ccādi. Yattha yasmiṃ
anya-e0812n:696_1: jine mahāmettā ca mahāpaññā ca imā paramodayā ukkaṭṭhābhivuḍḍhiyo honti. Varaguṇālayaṃ
anya-e0812n:696_2: uttamaguṇākaraṃ pavaraṃ tatoyeva uttamaṃ taṃ jinaṃ paṇamāmi. Ettha cakāraṃ parapadādiṃ
anya-e0812n:696_3: katvā pakāraṃ pubbapadantaṃ katvā yatiyā pavattattā “ca yattha, taṃ pā”tidvayamapi paccudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:699: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:700_0: 55. “Pada”iccādi. Padānaṃ atthakkamato muttaṃ gaḷitaṃ kamaccutamidanti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:700_1: Khettaṃ vā iccādinā arucitoyaṃ yācanakkamo vattuno aviññutaṃ gameti. Yo hi khettampi
anya-e0812n:700_2: dātuṃ nicchati, kathaṃ so gāmādikaṃ dassatīti.
anya-e0812n:701_0: 55. “Padatthi”ccādi. Padatthakkamato padānaṃ atthakkamato muttaṃ gaḷitaṃ idaṃ vākyaṃ
anya-e0812n:701_1: kamaccutaṃ nāma. Udāharati “yathi”ccādi. Mama sobhanaṃ khettaṃ vā gāmaṃ vā desaṃ
anya-e0812n:701_2: vā janapadaṃ vā dehi. Ettha khettamiccādi yācanakkamo vattuno aviññubhāvaṃ vinā ucitapadatthakkamaṃ
anya-e0812n:701_3: nappakāseti, tathā hi khettamapi dātumanicchanto gāmanigamajanapadādiṃ kathaṃ dassatīti kamahāni.
anya-e0812n:705_0: 56. “Loki”ccādi. Loke vidito lokiyo, taṃ lokiyatthamabhidheyyaṃ atikkantaṃ ananuvuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:705_1: yaṃ taṃ ativuttaṃ matanti vidhīyate. Yathetyādinā udāharati. Etissā vanitāya thanānaṃ
anya-e0812n:705_2: payodharānaṃ jambhane byāpane ākāsaṃ gaganaṃ atisambādhaṃ accantappakaṃ.
anya-e0812n:706_1: atikkamitaṃ vākyaṃ ativuttamiti mataṃ. Udāharati “yathi”ccādi. Etissā thanajambhane
anya-e0812n:706_2: thanānaṃ vijambhane ākāsaṃ atisambādhaṃ anokāsaṃ. Ettha payodharānaṃ mahantattaṃ
anya-e0812n:706_3: vadāmāti loke mahantanti pasiddhaṃ gaganamapi atikkantattā vākyamativuttadosena dūsitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:709: Gāviputto balībaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0812n:710_0: 57. “Samudāyi”ccādi. Samudāyassa pakaraṇato padasandhino vākyassa attho abhidheyyaṃ
anya-e0812n:710_1: aṅgaṅgibhūtaṃ kriyākārakasambandhīvisesalakkhaṇaṃ saṃvohārikaṃ, tato apetaṃ apagataṃ
anya-e0812n:710_2: suññaṃ, vinā na (ka.) padatthamattena tassa katthaci byabhicārābhāvato etādisaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0812n:710_3: tamapetatthakanti vidhi. Na hi “gāviputto”ccādīsu samudāyattho sambhavati.
anya-e0812n:711_1: sambandhapadattā vohārānurūpaatthato apetaṃ apagataṃ, avayavatthamattassa vā sabbattha
anya-e0812n:711_2: labbhamānattā samudāyatthato suññaṃ, taṃ vākyaṃ apetatthakaṃ nāma. Yathiccādinā udāharati
anya-e0812n:711_3: “gāviputto balībaddho usabho tiṇaṃ khādi, jalaṃ pivī”ti. Ettha avayavatthamattena
anya-e0812n:711_4: vinā samudāyena gamyamānassa kassaci visesatthassa abhāvā samudāyatthato apagataṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:713: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0812n:714: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0812n:715_1: khilā khāṇukādayo parikkhīṇā khayaṃ pattā yato, tasmā khette kedāre khittaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:716_1: yattha vākye bhavati, taṃ vākyaṃ bandhapharusaṃ nāma hoti. Yathāti udāharati. Kharā
anya-e0812n:716_2: kakkasā khilā khāṇukādayo parikkhīṇā yasmā khīṇā honti, tasmā khette khittaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:722_1: lakkhaṇaṃ anvatthavasena apagato kamo yattha taṃ apakkamantiādinā atthānugamanavasena
anya-e0812n:722_2: ñeyyaṃ viññātabbaṃ. Idāni vākyadose niddisitvā avasarappatte imasmiṃ kāle etesaṃ
anya-e0812n:722_3: apakkamādīnaṃ udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ ahaṃ sandassayāmi pakāsessāmi.
anya-e0812n:723_2: anvatthavasena apagato kamo yatthiccādivacanatthānugatañāṇavasena ñeyyaṃ ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n:723_3: visuṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na vadāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idāni ahaṃ etesaṃ apakkamādīnaṃ udāharaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:723_4: lakkhiyaṃ sandassayāmi. Atthānugatamanvatthaṃ anvatthassa ñāṇassa vasoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:728: 60. “Bhāvanā”iccādi. Sammā alobhādihetusampattiyā sakkaccaṃ sampāditāni nipphāditāni. Ettha bhogasaggādinibbānānaṃ hetavo yathākkamaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāyo, na tu bhāvanādānasīlāni.
anya-e0812n:729_0: 60. Tattha tesu apakkamādīsu apakkamaṃ yathā apakkamassodāharaṇamevaṃ. Ocityahīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:729_1: yathātyādīsupi evamattho veditabbo. “Bhāvani”ccādi. Iha imasmiṃ attabhāve sammā sampāditāni
anya-e0812n:729_2: alobhādihetusampattiyā sakkaccaṃ sampāditāni rāsikatāni bhāvanādānasīlāni bhogasaggādinibbānasādhanāni
anya-e0812n:729_3: upabhogaparibhogāni, sagguppattiāyuārogyādīni, nibbānañceti etesaṃ sādhakāni. Na
anya-e0812n:729_4: saṃsayo sadisavisadisavipākadāne saṃsayo nāma natthi. Ettha bhogasagganibbānānaṃ
anya-e0812n:729_5: hetubhūtā pana kamato dānasīlabhāvanāyo bhavantīti phalakkamassa hetukkamaṃ viruddhamiti
anya-e0812n:732: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0812n:733_0: 61. “Pūjanīyi”ccādi. Yato yasmā kāraṇā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ kevale mayi eva
anya-e0812n:733_1: samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ, tasmā kāraṇā imasmiṃ sattaloke eko kevalo ahameva
anya-e0812n:733_2: nirantaraṃ satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pujjoti. Evamattapasaṃsanamarucitaṃ sappurisassa.
anya-e0812n:734_0: 61. “Pūjanīyatare”ccādi. Yato yasmā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ mayi adutiye mayi
anya-e0812n:734_1: eva samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ, tasmā loke sattaloke eko adutiyo ahameva nirantaraṃ
anya-e0812n:734_2: satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pūjanīyo. Evaṃ attappasaṃsanato ucitatāya parihānīti ocityahīnaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:737: Yācitohaṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmyapi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0812n:739: 62. “Yācito”iccādi. Ettha “yadi yāciṃsu, jīvitampi yācakānaṃ dajjāmī”ti dassitodāratāyānucitaṃ puttadāne hadayapavedhanakathanaṃ vessantarassa yajjevamavoca.
anya-e0812n:740_0: 62. Yathā ca, evampi ocityahīnassa udāharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “yācito”ccādi. Yācito yācakehi
anya-e0812n:740_1: yācito ahaṃ jīvitamapi kathaṃ nāma na dajjāmi, tathāpi evaṃ dānajjhāsaye satipi puttadānena
anya-e0812n:740_2: mama hadayaṃ vedhate kampate. Ettha vessantarassa “yadi yāceyyuṃ, jīvitamapi yācakānaṃ
anya-e0812n:740_3: dajjāmī”ti katapaṭiññāya puttadānena hadayakampanassa kathanaṃ cāgātisayayogasaṅkhātaudāraguṇassa
anya-e0812n:744: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhī ca.
anya-e0812n:745_0: 63. “Itthīna”miccādi. Nopapajjate na yujjati. Ettha sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā pariccāgena
anya-e0812n:745_1: viseiccādinā ādhāre sattamīniddeso attharītiyā bhaṅgo. Ādo majjhe ca cakārapariccāgā
anya-e0812n:745_2: saddarītiyā bhaṅgo, rītīnaṃ anantattā bhaṅgāpyanantā. Udāharaṇaṃ tu disāmattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:746_0: 63. “Itthīna”miccādi. Itthīnañca dujjanānañca vissāso sahavāsādīhi vissāso nopapajjate
anya-e0812n:746_1: anatthasaṃsayānivattikāraṇattā na yujjati. Vise garaḷe ca siṅgimhi siṅgavati mahiṃ
anya-e0812n:746_2: sādo ca nadiyañca roge vaḍḍhamānake roge ca rājakulamhi ca vadhabandhanādikārake
anya-e0812n:746_3: rājakule ca vissāso nopapajjate. Ettha ādo sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā ārabhitvā taṃ pahāya
anya-e0812n:746_4: sattamiyā vuttattā attharīti ca, ādimajjhesu casaddapariccāgato saddarīti ca bhinnā.
anya-e0812n:746_5: Casaddaṃ payuñjantena ādo eva vā ante eva vā paccekaṃ vā yojetabbaṃ hoti. Īdiso payogo
anya-e0812n:746_6: rītibhaṅgo nāma hoti. Rītīnaṃ bahuttā rītibhaṅgadosāpi bahuvidhā. Idaṃ pana mukhamattanidassanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:751_0: 64. “Munindi”ccādi. Candimā viya candimā, munindoyeva candimā, tassa ālokanaṃ dassanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:751_1: āloko pakāso vā, tasmiṃ raso anurāgo, tena lolāni capalāni locanāni akkhīni yassa
anya-e0812n:751_2: so jano avakkanto okkanto paviṭṭho pantho maggo yena avakkantapantho eva gunnaṃ raṃsīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n:751_3: iṭṭhatthanipphattisūcakabhāvena gopadatthassa vā padassanena pīṇito muditoti ettha
anya-e0812n:752_1: āloke dassane pātubhāve vā rasena ālayena cañcalanetto jano avakkantapanthova otiṇṇamaggova
anya-e0812n:752_2: buddhassa dassanatthāya maggamotiṇṇoti adhippāyo. Gopadassanapīṇito gosaṅkhātaraṃsipadassanena,
anya-e0812n:752_3: abhimaṅgalasammatagopadassanena vā santuṭṭho hoti. Ettha gopadassanenāti ca atthassa
anya-e0812n:752_4: gamyamānattā viññātuṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti sasaṃsayaṃ nāma. Avakkanto pantho yenāti
anya-e0812n:752_5: ca, gunnaṃ raṃsīnaṃ, gāvassa vā padassananti ca, gopadassanena pīṇitoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:756_0: 65. “Vākya”iccādi. Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna paharitvā vīriyavā sūro soyaṃ poso puriso
anya-e0812n:756_1: vissami vissattho. Ayamattho tāva na duppatīto. Paraṃ accantaṃ hantvāna vīriyavā
anya-e0812n:757_1: Vākyatthato duppatītikaraṃ viruddhappakāsakaṃ gāmmanti mataṃ. Yathāti udāharati.
anya-e0812n:757_2: Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna māretvāna vīriyavā sūro so ayaṃ poso vissami vigataparissamo
anya-e0812n:757_3: ahosi, ayamattho iṭṭho. Paraṃ atisayena hantvāna vītikkamaṃ katvā vīriyavā upacitasambhavo
anya-e0812n:757_4: upacitasukko so ayaṃ puriso vāyāmena vissami vigatavāyāmo ahosīti. Imassatthassa
anya-e0812n:757_5: asabbhārahattā gāmmattaṃ. Vīriyaṃ ussāho sambhavo vā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:761_0: 66. “Duṭṭhā”iccādi. Yattha yasmiṃ vākye alaṅkārānaṃ dūsanaṃ vikaṭatā, etantu duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:761_1: duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ nāma, tassa duṭṭhālaṅkārassa rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ alaṅkāraniddese taṃnāmake
anya-e0812n:761_2: paricchede āvībhavissati pakāsissati, tattheva taṃ dassayissāmīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:762_0: 66. “Duṭṭhālaṅkari”ccādi. Yattha vākye alaṅkāradūsanaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ virodho hoti,
anya-e0812n:762_1: etaṃ vākyatthanissitaṃ etaṃ vākyaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkāro nāma, tassa duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇadosopalakkhitavākyassa
anya-e0812n:762_2: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ lakkhiyaṃ alaṅkāraniddese alaṅkārānaṃ nidassanaṭṭhānabhūte paricchede
anya-e0812n:762_3: āvībhavissati. Ettha vuttepi puna tatthāpi vattabbaṃ siyāti na vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:762_4: Uddese “duṭṭhālaṅkatī”ti vatvā idāni “duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇa”nti vacanaṃ alaṅkati alaṅkaraṇaalaṅkārasaddānaṃ
anya-e0812n:771_1: dāni “katotri”ccādinā nikkhipananayaṃ saṅkhipati. Atra imasmiṃ adhikāre, paricchede
anya-e0812n:771_2: vā esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ dosānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo vibhajanaṃ saṅkhepanayā
anya-e0812n:771_3: saṅkhepakkamena, na vitthārato, yato aparisaṅkhyeyyānaṃ natthi pariyanto mayā kato
anya-e0812n:771_4: niṭṭhāpito. Nanu “saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttattā purātanehi purātarehi (ka.) dīpitā santi
anya-e0812n:771_5: bahū dosā, te pariccattā siyunti? Ettha vuccate, vitthārakkamassa anadhippetattā
anya-e0812n:771_6: “saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana sabbathā pariccāgena. Tathā hi–
anya-e0812n:773_0: Akkhamatthantarādikaṃ viruddhatthantarānugatanti ca. Ettha hi pataṅgasaddena jotiriṅgaṇasaṅkhātamatthantaramasamatthamicchitatthe
anya-e0812n:774_0: Gajahesādi sambandhadūsitaṃ lokavirodhi, sogatāgamādīsu pasiddhaṃ rūpakkhandhādikamaññatra
anya-e0812n:774_1: vuttaṃ appatītaṃ nāma. Idaṃ āgamavirodhiiti, sambandhadūsitappatītādikaṃ virodhimhi
anya-e0812n:774_2: paviṭṭhanti ca, ānetabbahetuttā hetvapekkhaṃ neyyato na byatiriccatīti ca.
anya-e0812n:776_0: Iccādikaṃ asāmatthyābhidheyyādikaṃ ocityahīne saṅgahitanti ca. Jigucchaasabbhasaṃsūcakaatthantarakañca
anya-e0812n:776_1: gāmmaṃ duppatītikare saṅgayhatīti ca. ( ) (duruccāraṇaṃ)? Sabandhapharusameveti ca.
anya-e0812n:777_0: Ettha pana ocityahīnaduppatītikarānaṃ vākyatthadosattepi phandhapharusassa ca vākyadosatte
anya-e0812n:777_1: padapadatthānaṃ dosato vākyameva duṭṭhaṃ siyā, vākyañca padehi viriccate, pade duṭṭhe
anya-e0812n:777_2: vākyattho ca duṭṭho siyā. Padadosato vākyavākyatthānaṃ nānābhāvābhāvañāpanatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:777_3: asāmatthiyābhidheyyādikaṃ padaṃ ocityahīnādivākyatthadosādīsu anto kathitaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0812n:777_4: hi purātanehi viruddhatthantarādīhi padehi viracitaṃ vākyaṃ viruddhantiādinā bahūni
anya-e0812n:777_5: duṭṭhāni vākyāni dassitāni. “Harisamānayī”ti ettha hapubbaṃ risa’mānayīti icchitatthā
anya-e0812n:777_6: pari bhaṭṭhaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃ. Nānatthamappasiddhehi yuttaṃ guḷhaṃ, yathā “sakko sahassagū”ti.
anya-e0812n:778_0: Vākyepi visandhikamihānupayogīti ca, vākyantaropagataṃ vākyaṃ vākyagabbhaṃ, vākyantarapadasammissaṃ
anya-e0812n:778_1: “apāthyameso dissati, vejjaṃ khādatyanārata”miccādikaṃ vākyasaṃkiṇṇañca byākiṇṇe samohitanti ca.
anya-e0812n:781_0: Idamavācakaṃ paheḷikāya pamussitāsannissitanti ca, tattha ca kavinā uyyānasaddena
anya-e0812n:781_1: gehaṃ, latāvācinā vallarīsaddena aṅganā, pallavasaddena karacaraṇadasanacchadā, mañcarīsaddena
anya-e0812n:781_2: nakhasobhā dantakantiyo ca vattumicchitā, vākyatthepi paduminīnaṃ rattiyamunniddatādikaṃ
anya-e0812n:781_3: viruddhaṃ virodhinilīnanti ca nātyanuññātā, na tu sabbathā pariccāgena. Esova evaṃ
anya-e0812n:781_4: yathāvuttanayena niṭṭhāpito ayaṃ saṅkhepanayo eva kavīnaṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ khedakaraṃ
anya-e0812n:781_5: “kathaṃ nāma bandhepīdisaṃ sati santī”ti evamāsuhanopajanaṃ paraṃ padadose asādhusandiddhapariyāya
anya-e0812n:781_7: vākyatthadose upakkamopasaṃhāravisamañceti iccevamādikamaparampi dūsanaṃ atthi ce
anya-e0812n:781_8: yadi bhaveyya, tampi bodhayitumavagametuṃ alaṃ samatthaṃ yathāvuttadosānusārena buddhimantehi sakkā ūhitunti.
anya-e0812n:782: Evaṃ vadato ca ganthakārassāyamadhippāyo – ye dosā vibhāgaso na vuttā, te mayā ganthagāravabhayā saṅkhepitā, lakkhaṇato tu saṅgahitā. Na hi tesamantaṃ ko jahāpeti.
anya-e0812n:783_0: Tattha saddasatthaviruddhamasādhu. Yaṃ kriyādinimittamupādāya atthantarepi vattate,
anya-e0812n:783_1: taṃ saññābhāveneva payuttaṃ sandiddhaṃ, yathā “ravimhihimahā”ti, idaṃ pana visesanatthe
anya-e0812n:783_2: sādhu hoti. Pasiddhasaññāsaddassa pariyāyantarena parikappitapadaṃ pariyāyañeyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:783_4: visesyassa guṇaṃ vadati, taṃ appatītatthaṃ, yathā “kaṇhamasī”ti. Adhigatatthānupayogaṃ
anya-e0812n:783_6: kani bhanti te” iccādiko dubbodho, kani kaññe khādayo gaggharikā. “Ime lāvaṇyatallā
anya-e0812n:783_7: te, gallā lolavilocane”iccādiko desiyo, tallo jalāsayaviseso, gallo kapolo. “Saggasevīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:783_9: vedhabyassa gammamānattā “saggasevīna”nti adhikanti. Yattha vattabbassa ūnatā, taṃ
anya-e0812n:783_10: ūnaṃ, yathā “tilokatilakaṃ muni”ntiādi. Ettha “vandāmī”ti ūnaṃ, chandobhaṅgānvitaṃ
anya-e0812n:783_11: vaco bhaggacchandaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Ārambhāvasānena visamaṃ upakkamopasaṃhāravisamaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0812n:786_1: idāni “katotre”ccādinā nigamento dose saṅkhipati. Atra imasmiṃ adhikāre, paricchede
anya-e0812n:786_2: vā esaṃ dosānaṃ yathāvuttapadadosādīnaṃ pavaro lakkhaṇāvirodhalakkhiyato uttamo vibhāgo
anya-e0812n:786_3: asaṅkarato vibhajanaṃ saṅkhepanayā vitthārāpaniyasaṅkhepakkamena mayā kato vutto
anya-e0812n:786_4: esova yathāvutto eso saṅkhepakkamo eva kavīnaṃ viracayantānaṃ khedakaraṃ bandhasarīre
anya-e0812n:786_5: īdisaṃ īdisappayogaṃ kathaṃ nāma karomīti evaṃ pavattakhedamuppādayantaṃ parampi
anya-e0812n:786_6: asādhusandiddhādi aññampi dūsanamatthi ce, taṃ sabbaṃ bodhayituṃ bodhetuṃ alaṃ samattho
anya-e0812n:786_7: hoti. Niyati avuttopi attho etenāti ca, saṅkhepo ca so nayo cāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:789: Akkhamatthantarādikaṃ viruddhatthantare anupatattā na vuttaṃ, ettha sūriyavācako pataṅgasaddo jotiriṅgaṇavācakopi hotīti vattumicchitaamittaggivināse asamatthaññattho hoti.
anya-e0812n:790: “Vacanti gaṇḍi”ccādikaṃ āgame appasiddhaṃ lakkhaṇamattena sādhiyaṃ. Appayuttapadādidoso kiliṭṭhapadadose antogadho hotīti na vutto.
anya-e0812n:791_2: virodhipade antogadhaṃ hoti. Hetvapekkhaṃ ānetabbahetuttā neyye antogadhanti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:793_0: Iccādikaṃ asamatthābhidhāyiccādi ocityahīne antogadhanti na vuttaṃ. Ettha divākaro
anya-e0812n:793_1: sayaṃ rāhugahito aññesaṃ kilesāpanayane asamatthoti tamasāmatthiyaṃ visesanabhūtena
anya-e0812n:794_0: Jigucchāvamaṅgalaasabbhānaṃ tiṇṇamaññatrassa jotakaṃ vācakaṃ vā atthantaraṃ vā gāmmaṃ
anya-e0812n:794_1: duppatītikarattā vākyatthagāmmadoseyeva antogadhanti na vuttaṃ. Duruccāraṇabhūtalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:794_2: kaṭṭhaṃ bandhapharusato abyatirittanti na vuttanti. “Harisamānayī”ti vattabbe hapubbaṃ
anya-e0812n:794_4: apasiddhavisaye pariyuttaguḷhañceti ime atthaguḷhādayo pasādālaṅkāraviruddhattā pasādaguṇādāneneva
anya-e0812n:794_5: pariccattāti na vuttaṃ. Ettha hi sahassaṃ gāvo cakkhūni assāti sahassagūti sakkassa
anya-e0812n:795: Vākyadosepi visandhivākyaṃ idha anupayogittā na vuttaṃ. Vākyamajjhapatitavākyayuttaṃ vākyagabbhañca, vākyantarapadasammissaṃ.
anya-e0812n:797_0: Iccādikaṃ vākyasaṃkiṇṇañca byākiṇṇe antogadhanti na vuttaṃ. Ettha eso bhisakko anārataṃ
anya-e0812n:797_1: niccaṃ apāthyaṃ rogassa ahitaṃ dissati vadati. Eso rogī anārataṃ satataṃ apāthyaṃ
anya-e0812n:797_2: ahitaṃ khādati. Vejjaṃ bhisakkaṃ dissati kujjhati. Evaṃ anekavākyehipi sandhivākyaṃ saṃkiṇṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:800_0: Idamavācakaṃ paheḷikāsu pamussitāsannissitamiti na vuttaṃ. Nanu cettha attanā paheḷikāya
anya-e0812n:800_1: adassitattā avācakassa pamussitāya antogadhakaraṇaṃ asiddhena asiddhasādhananti?
anya-e0812n:800_2: Nayidamevaṃ, “upekkhiyanti sabbāni, sissakhedabhayā mayā”ti ca upari kiliṭṭhapadadosaparihāre
anya-e0812n:800_3: “paheḷikāyamāruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā”ti ceti iminā purātanehi niddiṭṭhasoḷasapaheḷikāyopi
anya-e0812n:800_4: dassitāti siddhena asiddhasādhanaṃ hoti. Tattha kavinā uyyānasaddena gehañca latāpariyāyavallarīsaddena
anya-e0812n:800_5: aṅganā ca pallavasaddena karacaraṇādharā ca mañcarīsaddena nakhadantakantiyo ca vattumicchitā.
anya-e0812n:801_0: Vākyatthadosepi paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ pabujjhanādikaṃ viruddhaṃ virodhipadeyeva antogadhattā
anya-e0812n:801_1: na vuttanti dassetuṃ “katotra saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana tesaṃ sabbathā pariccattattāti.
anya-e0812n:801_2: Ettha ocityahīnaduppatītikarānaṃ dvinnaṃ vākyatthadosatte sati bandhapharusassa vākyadosatte
anya-e0812n:801_4: kaṭṭhapadaṃ, paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ phullatādi dunniddatādi (ka.) vākyatthañceti ime
anya-e0812n:801_5: cattāro dosā bhinnajātikesu ocityādīsu kathaṃ saṅgahitāti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi padānaṃ
anya-e0812n:801_6: duṭṭhatte sati vākyavākyatthānamaduṭṭhatā nāma natthīti padadosena sandhivākyavākyatthadosānamanaññattaṃ
anya-e0812n:801_7: sissānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ padadosādikaṃ vākyatthadosādīsu saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ. Imināyeva
anya-e0812n:801_8: purātanehi viruddhatthantarādipadehi vicaritaṃ vākyaṃ viruddhantiādinā duṭṭhāni bahūni
anya-e0812n:802_0: Imāyeva imissāyeva (ka.) gāthāya “tamatthi ce khedakaraṃ parampī”ti ettha parasaddenaasādhusandiddhapariyāyañeyyāppatītatthaappayojaka-
anya-e0812n:802_2: vākyatthadose ca pariggaṇhāti. Ettha saddasatthaviruddhamasādhu nāma. Kriyānipphattikāraṇamupādāya
anya-e0812n:802_3: atthantare pavattanāmaṃ visesanatthena vinā saññābhājane payuttaṃ sandiddhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:802_4: yathā “ravimhi himahā”ti. Ettha himahā ravīti visesane kate doso natthi. Pasiddhasaññāsaddassa
anya-e0812n:802_5: pariyāyanāmena kappitapadaṃ pariyāyañeyyaṃ nāma, yathā “vaḷavāmukhassa assavanitānana”nti.
anya-e0812n:802_6: Atisayā vinā bhāvitatthena visesyassa guṇavācakaṃ padaṃ appatītatthaṃ nāma, yathā
anya-e0812n:804: Kani he kaññe te tavapāde manuññaddhanayo manoharasaddasamannāgatā khādayo gaggharikā bhanti dibbantīti. Kismiñci deseyeva siddhanāmaṃ desiyaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n:806: He lolavilocane te tava ime gallā kapolā lāvaṇyatallā manuññatallā jalāsayavisesā bhavanti. Kenaci lesena pakāsitamatthamupādāya payuttamadhikaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n:809_0: Ettha “akaṅkaṇo pāṇi, nettamanañjana”nti imināyevathīnaṃ vidhavattaṃ gamyamānaṃ hotīti
anya-e0812n:809_1: tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttaṃ “saggasevina”nti idaṃ adhikaṃ nāma. Vattabbayuttato ūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:809_2: vākyaṃ ūnaṃ nāma. “Tilokatilakaṃ muni”nti ettha “vandāmī”ti vattabbassa avuttattā
anya-e0812n:809_3: ūnaṃ. Chandohānisaṃyuttaṃ bhaggacchandaṃ nāma. Idaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ chandānaṃ akkharagaṇanato
anya-e0812n:809_4: ūnādhikavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ādyantato visamaṃ upakkamopasaṃhāravisamaṃ nāma. Idaṃ
anya-e0812n:819_1: “kadācī”tyādi. Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho viruddhatthantarādikato na koci eko eva dosesu,
anya-e0812n:819_2: dosānaṃ vā saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma paricchijja guṇānaṃ vīthiṃ padaviṃ
anya-e0812n:819_3: guṇasabhāvataṃ vigāhate abbhupagacchati kadāci, na sabbadā. Kavino payujjakassa kosallā
anya-e0812n:819_5: Yenevaṃ, tena kāraṇena vuttānaṃ viruddhatthantarādīnaṃ virodhānaṃ yathā yena pakārena
anya-e0812n:819_6: avirodho niddosatā siyā bhaveyya, tathā tena pakārena dosānaṃ parihāro dūrīkaraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:819_7: avabujjhati ñāyati etenāti avabodho, tassa avabodho, tannāmiko paricchedo idāni nīyate
anya-e0812n:820_0: 68-69. Evaṃ dosavibhāgaṃ paricchinditvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihāratthamārabhanto
anya-e0812n:820_1: “kadācī”tyādimāha. Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho padadosādiko dosasaṅkhyaṃ dosānaṃ, dosesu
anya-e0812n:820_2: vā gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma kadāci kavikosallā kavino byākaraṇābhidhānachandoalaṅkatiādīsu
anya-e0812n:820_3: paricayalakkhaṇena paññāpāṭavena yato guṇavīthiṃ guṇapadaviṃ kevalaṃ guṇasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:820_4: vigāhate abbhupagacchati, tena kāraṇena vuttavirodhānaṃ yathāvuttapadadosādivirodhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:820_5: avirodho aviruddhatā yathā siyā yena pakārena bhaveyya, tathā tena pakārena dosaparihārāvabodho
anya-e0812n:820_7: idāni laddhāvasare nīyate vuccate. Yathāvuttadosā kavisāmatthiyena niddosattaṃ bhajanti,
anya-e0812n:825: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:826_0: 70. “Vindanta”miccādi. Pākena pariṇatabhāvena sālīnaṃ yuttānaṃ, manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:826_1: rattasāliādīnaṃ sālijātīnaṃ dassanā sukhaṃ cetasikaṃ somanassaṃ vindantaṃ taṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n:826_2: visado ayaṃ megho ambudo kathaṃ nāma sukhayeti. Ettha tādisassa janassa asukhappadānaṃ
anya-e0812n:827_0: 70. Tattha viruddhatthantarassa parihāro yathā evaṃ. “Vindanti”ccādi. Pākasālīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:827_1: pariṇāmena yuttānaṃ, manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ rattasāliādīnaṃ dassanā dassanahetu sukhaṃ
anya-e0812n:827_2: cetasikasomanassaṃ vindantaṃ anubhontaṃ taṃ janaṃ taṃ kassakajanaṃ visado jaladāyako
anya-e0812n:827_3: ayaṃ megho kathaṃ nāma sukhaye, na sukhayateva. Tādisassa janassa dukkhadānaṃ garaḷadāyakassa
anya-e0812n:827_4: meghassāpi anurūpamiti viruddhaññattho apanīto hoti. Pākena sālinoti viggaho. Sukhaṃ
anya-e0812n:834_0: 71. “Vināyakopi”ccādi. Vīnaṃ pakkhīnaṃ nāyako, garuḷo, satte vinetīti vināyako, vuddho,
anya-e0812n:834_1: bhagavā ca. Tattha yadā vināyako garuḷo, tadā tu nāgo pannagosīti viruddhaṃ, pakkhantare
anya-e0812n:834_2: tvaviruddhaṃ bhagavato āgussa rāgādino abhāvato. Imesaṃ gunnaṃ atisayena go gotamo
anya-e0812n:834_3: hīnapasu, gotamavaṃsāvatiṇṇattā gotamo bhagavā ca. Hīnapasu ca tvaṃ mahāmati asīti
anya-e0812n:834_4: viruddhaṃ accantahīnapasuno mahatiyā paññāya abhāvato. Pakkhantare tu na byāghāto.
anya-e0812n:834_5: Paṇīto madhuro raso, uttamo ca sugato. Tattha madhurarasato apeto apagatosīti virujjhati,
anya-e0812n:834_6: bhagavato tu rasehi siṅgārādīhi apetoti yujjati. Me mama. Sāmīti āmantanaṃ. Te tava
anya-e0812n:834_7: gati pavatti cittā abbhutāti. Ettha viruddhatthantaraṃ virodhālaṅkāraṃ silāghanīyanti tena taṃ parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n:835_0: 71. Yathā vā uttadosassa parihāro īdiso vā. “Vināyako”ccādi. He sāmi tvaṃ vināyakopi
anya-e0812n:835_1: garuḷopi nāgosi pannago asi. No ce, vināyakopi satte vinento eva nāgosi nikkileso
anya-e0812n:835_2: asi. Gotamopi pasutamopi mahāmati mahāpaññavāsi. No ce, gotamopi gottato gotamoyeva
anya-e0812n:835_3: mahāmati mahāpaññavāsi. Paṇītopi madhuropi rasāpeto madhurarasato apagatosi. No ce,
anya-e0812n:835_4: paṇītopi uttamo eva rasāpeto siṅgārādirasato apagatosi. Te tuyhaṃ gati pavatti me
anya-e0812n:835_5: mayhaṃ cittā acchariyā. Ettha garuḷassa nāgattañca pasutamassa paññavantattañca paṇītassa
anya-e0812n:835_6: nirasattañca viruddhaṃ, tathāpi aññapakkhassa aviruddhattā viruddhatthantaradoso
anya-e0812n:835_7: pasatthena viruddhālaṅkārena nirākato. Vīnaṃ pakkhīnaṃ nāyako, garuḷo. Satte vinetīti
anya-e0812n:835_8: vināyako, buddho. Natthi āgu ago (ka.) etassāti nāgo, buddho. Gunnamatisayena gotamo,
anya-e0812n:835_9: pasu. Mahatī mati assāti mahāmati, buddho. Padhānattaṃ nīto paṇīto, madhuro raso.
anya-e0812n:842_0: 72. “Katha”miccādi. Dujjano tādino guṇā lokaṃ tosenti, tādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ attani abhāve
anya-e0812n:842_1: sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti, na tosetīti attho. Vuttamevatthantarena sādheti
anya-e0812n:842_2: “khajjoto nāma obhāsitā dīpitā asesadisā yena tathāvidho kiṃ bhave, na bhaveyya tādino
anya-e0812n:842_3: guṇassa abhāvato”ti. Ettha khajjotassa adhikatthabhāvena sito obhāsitāsesadisattadoso
anya-e0812n:843_0: 72. Ajhatthassa yathāti ettha parihāro ajjhāhāro, evamuparipi. “Kathi”ccādi. Dujjano
anya-e0812n:843_1: guṇahīnajano tādiguṇābhāve santosajananakāraṇānaṃ tādisānaṃ sīlādiguṇānaṃ attani
anya-e0812n:843_2: avijjamānatte sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti, na tosetiyeva, tathā hi khajjoto
anya-e0812n:843_3: nāma obhāsitāsesadiso kiṃ bhave, na bhavatyeva. Ettha khajjotassa sakaladisobhāsanasaṅkhātamadhikatthadoso
anya-e0812n:843_4: “kathaṃ tādiguṇābhāve”ccādivākyalīlāya nirākato. Tādī ca te guṇā ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:846: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka-māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0812n:847_0: 73. “Paheḷikāyaṃ”iccādi. Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadoso paheḷikāya visaye āruḷhā sahī
anya-e0812n:847_1: na hi no duṭṭho siyā. Kīdisīti āha “piye”ccādi. Itīti nidassane. Piyā vallabhāya
anya-e0812n:847_2: āliṅgitaṃ kaṃ janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca no āliṅgati na saṃyujjati nu. Nuiti
anya-e0812n:847_3: parivitakke nipāto. Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhaṃ paheḷikāya samāropena parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n:848_1: ce, na hi duṭṭhā duṭṭhā na hoti. Kimudāharaṇaṃ? Piyā sukhāliṅgitaṃ kamāliṅgati nu
anya-e0812n:848_2: no iti, itisaddassa nidassanatthattā sesaudāharaṇānametamupalakkhaṇanti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:848_3: No ce, evaṃpakārānamudāharaṇānamapariggahetabbattā itisaddo pakāratthoti. Piyā vallabhāya
anya-e0812n:848_4: āliṅgitaṃ upaguhitaṃ kaṃ nāma janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikamānasikaṃ no āliṅgati nu, āliṅgatevāti.
anya-e0812n:848_5: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhapadaṃ paheḷikāyamāropanena nirākataṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:852: 74. “Yamake”ccādi. Tato aññanti icchitayamakato aññaṃ. Tuiti visesajotako. Etaṃmayaṃ viyāti etena kiliṭṭhapadena nibbattaṃ viya.
anya-e0812n:853_0: 74. “Yamake”ccādi. Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ icchite yamake iṭṭhayamake no payojeyya nappayujjeyya,
anya-e0812n:853_1: tato iṭṭhayamakato aññaṃ sabbaṃ yamakaṃ pana etaṃmayaṃ viya iminā kiliṭṭhapadadosena
anya-e0812n:853_2: kataṃ viya hoti. Ettha iṭṭhayamakaṃ vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ, etena nibbattaṃ etaṃmayanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:858_0: 75. “Bodhisatte”ccādi. Bodhisattassa māyādeviyā sutassa vakkhamānassa visesassa taduppannadine
anya-e0812n:858_1: sambhavā pabhāvena puññappabhāvato jalajāni ambujāni thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ acintanīyattā
anya-e0812n:858_2: puññappabhāvassa. Kiṃ pana vāpyādīsu kiṃ karontāva tahiṃ tasmiñca jale suciraṃ sabbadāva
anya-e0812n:858_3: āvasanamāvāso tena jāto kleso taṃ nudantāniva dūrato jahantāniveti. Acintanīyattā
anya-e0812n:859_1: tannāmakāni padumakeravādīni tahiṃ jale visayattena pasiddhe tasmiṃ udake sucirāvāsaklesaṃ
anya-e0812n:859_2: aticiraṃ nivāsato jātaāyāsaṃ nudantāni iva cajantāni iva thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ, vāpiādīsu
anya-e0812n:859_3: kā kathā. Ettha jalajānaṃ thaluppattikathanasaṅkhātaṃ desavirodhaṃ acinteyyapuññappabhāvena
anya-e0812n:859_4: īdisānaṃ acchariyānaṃ pātubhāvato “bodhisattappabhāvenā”ti iminā nirākaroti. Bodhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n:859_5: catumaggapaññāyaṃ sattoti ca, tassa pabhāvoti ca, suciraṃ āvāsoti ca, tena bhūto klesoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:864_0: 76. “Mahā”iccādi. Mando mudubhūto māruto ayaṃ sabbotukaṃ sabbesu utūsu pupphanakaṃ
anya-e0812n:864_1: kusumaṃ pupphaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto vikiranto munino munisadisattā bhavissantamunibhāvena
anya-e0812n:864_2: ca bodhisattassa, muninoyeva vā sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye mahānubhāvassa pisuno
anya-e0812n:864_3: sūcako vāyi pavāyatīti. Ettha yadyapekadā sabbotukāsambhavo nānāutūsu nānākusumassa
anya-e0812n:864_4: sambhavā, tathāpi bhagavato mahānubhāvapisunamīdisamekapadikaṃ sambhavatīti kālavirodho iminā parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:865_0: 76. “Mahānubhāve”ccādi. Ayaṃ mandamāruto acaṇḍasamīraṇo sabbotukaṃ vasantādīsu sabbautūsu
anya-e0812n:865_1: vikasantaṃ kusumaṃ pupphajātaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto kampento munino ekantabhāvittā
anya-e0812n:865_2: munisaṅkhātassa bodhisattassa, sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye bhūtattā munino sabbaññuno
anya-e0812n:865_3: vā mahānubhāvapisuno mahantaṃ puññappabhāvaṃ pakāsento vāyi sampavāyīti. Ettha nānākāle
anya-e0812n:865_4: sambhavantānampi kusumānaṃ ekakāle sambhavassa kālavirodhattepi bhagavato puññānubhāvo
anya-e0812n:865_6: iminā nirākaroti. Mahānubhāvassa, mahānubhāvaṃ vā pisunoti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:869: Tantissaravirodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:870_0: 77. “Nimuggi”ccādi. Buddhassa guṇe sīlādike aparimāṇe nimuggaṃ ogāḷhaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n:870_1: yassa tassa pañcasikhassa gandhabbadevaputtassapi vīṇāya tantiyā saro kiriyākālamānalakkhaṇavilambitadutamajjhabhedabhinno
anya-e0812n:870_2: chajjādiko tassa virodho kalāsatthapariniddiṭṭhakamavesamaṃ kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti,
anya-e0812n:871_1: otiṇṇacittassa pañcasikhassapi gandhabbadevaputtassāpi so tantissaravirodho vīṇāya
anya-e0812n:871_2: tantiyā ghaṭṭanakiriyā, addhamattikādikālo, hatthādīnaṃ sannivesalakkhaṇo mānoti
anya-e0812n:871_3: imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi yuttassa mandasīghamajjhimappamāṇehi bhinnassa chajjādisattasarassa
anya-e0812n:871_4: kalāsatthāgatakkamassa vināsasaṅkhāto virodho kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti, sampīṇeti eva.
anya-e0812n:871_6: jātoti so bhaṅgo “nimuggamanaso buddhaguṇe”ti vuttattā pītiyā kāraṇameveti na virodho.
anya-e0812n:871_7: Nimuggo mano assāti ca, tantiyā saroti ca, tesaṃ virodhoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:876_0: 78. “Gaṇaye”ccādi. Candanāya api sītalaṃ gaṇaye cintesi. Kintaṃ? Padittaṅgārapūritaṃ
anya-e0812n:876_1: cakkavāḷaṃ. Ko so? Sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe sattaṃ paribaddhaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n:876_2: yassa so. Sabbaññutaññāṇānubandhabuddhino hi tādiso manobandhoti na lokavirodho.
anya-e0812n:877_1: padittaṅgārapūritaṃ ādittaṅgārehi paripuṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ candanāyapi
anya-e0812n:877_2: candanato api sītalaṃ atisītalaṃ katvā gaṇaye cinteyyāti. Iṭṭhatthaluddhassa cittappavattiyā
anya-e0812n:877_3: īdisattā aggino candanatopi adhikasītattakappanā “candanaṃ sītalaṃ, aggi uṇho”ti
anya-e0812n:877_4: pavattalokasīmāya viruddhā na hoti. Sambodhiyaṃ sattahadayaṃ yasseti ca, padittāni
anya-e0812n:877_5: aṅgārānīti ca, tehi pūritanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:882_0: 79. “Pariccatte”ccādi. Munipuṅgava munīnaṃ uttama pariccatto visaṭṭho bhavo sugatiduggatisaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n:882_1: yenāti pariccattabhavopi tvaṃ upanīto ānīto pavattito bhavo vuḍḍhi yenāti upanītabhavo
anya-e0812n:882_2: asi. Tasmā kāraṇā acintyaguṇasārāya te namo atthūti seso. Īdisaṃ na ñāyaviruddhamevaṃvidhattā munipuṅgavassa.
anya-e0812n:883_1: upanītabhavo lokassānītaabhivuddhiko asi bhavasi, acintyaguṇasārāya tato eva cintāvisayātikkantasāraguṇassa
anya-e0812n:883_2: te tuyhaṃ namo atthūti sabbākārato bhavassa pariccattattā attani avijjamānaṃ sugatibhavaṃ
anya-e0812n:883_3: lokassa detīti etaṃ ñāyāgataṃ na hotīti paṭibhāti, tathāpi ca sabbaññūnaṃ pavatti
anya-e0812n:883_4: īdisāyevāti ñāyavirodho nirākato. Acintyā guṇasārā yasminti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:888_0: 80. “Neve”tiādi. Yatīti bhikkhu kenāpi saha nevālapati na vadatyeva, tathāpi vacīviññattito
anya-e0812n:888_1: copanavācāsaṅkhātena vacīviññattihetunā pavattito sampajānantassa musāvādato kāraṇā
anya-e0812n:888_3: Ettha anālapato vacīviññattiyā kathaṃ musāvādoti abhidhammāpannavirodho natthi, aparavacanatthe
anya-e0812n:889_0: 80. “Nevi”ccādi. Yati samaṇo kenāpi kenaci saddhiṃ nevālapati no bhāsati, tathāpi
anya-e0812n:889_2: musābhaṇanato āpattidukkaṭaṃ dukkaṭāpattiṃ phuseyya āpajjeyyāti. Ettha anālapantassa
anya-e0812n:889_3: vacīviññattito musāvādo kathaṃ sambhavatīti abhidhammāpannavirodho, “santiṃ āpattiṃ
anya-e0812n:889_4: nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvāda’ssa hotī”ti nidānuddese niddiṭṭhavacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0812n:889_5: dukkaṭāpatti hotīti āgamavirodho nirākato. Musābhaṇanaṃ vinā āpatti kathaṃ bhavatīti?
anya-e0812n:889_6: Yathā kāle avassamānameghato sañjātadubbhikkhaṃ “meghakataṃ dubbhikkha”nti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0812n:889_7: hoti, evaṃ kathetabbakāle akathanato sañjātā vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā dukkaṭāpattipi
anya-e0812n:889_8: tato sañjātāti vattabbā hoti. Sampajānantassa musāvādoti ca, āpattiyeva dukkaṭanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:893: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0812n:894_0: 81. “Marīcī”tyādi. Sītamarīcino candassa marīciyo dīdhitiyo eva candanaṃ, tassa ālepo
anya-e0812n:894_1: upadeho, tassa lābhena imā sabbāpi disā nibbharamatisayaṃ dhavalā setā rocantīti
anya-e0812n:895_1: paṭilābhato imā sabbāpi disā nibbharamatisayaṃ dhavalā setā rocanti dibbantīti. Disānaṃ
anya-e0812n:895_2: dhavalakāraṇassa “marīcicandanālepalābhā sītamarīcino”ti vuttattā neyyadoso na patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0812n:895_3: candanamiva candanaṃ, marīciyoyeva candanamiti ca, tassa ālepoti ca, tassa lābhoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:900_1: māraṅganānaṃ siṅgārakato vibbhamo vilāso jinena asamanuññāto abbhupagato mārassa
anya-e0812n:900_2: vasavattino hadayānalo hadayaggi jāto. Soko cettha analatthe niruppito tassa tādisatthānativattanato,
anya-e0812n:900_3: kāraṇantupacārenāti. Ettha yajjapi māraṅganāparājayo na saddopāttattho, tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo
anya-e0812n:900_4: mārassa hadayaggī”ti vutte sāmatthiyā māraṅganāparājayo gamyate, tathāvidhassa mārasokassa
anya-e0812n:900_5: māraṅganāparājayābyabhicārato. Nevedisassa neyyatā, vaṅkavuttīdisī guṇoyeva bandhassa.
anya-e0812n:901_1: dassanasavanānussaraṇaṃ karontānaṃ janānaṃ cittamattani anurañjanto māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamo
anya-e0812n:901_3: satthunā asamanuññāto anabbhupagato asampaṭicchito mārassa vasavattino hadayānalo
anya-e0812n:901_4: hadayaggi ahosīti. Analattena kappitakāriyabhūto soko māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamasaṅkhātakāraṇena
anya-e0812n:901_5: saddhiṃ abhedakappanāya analattakappanāya (ka.) “guḷo semhaṃ, tipusaṃ jaro”tiādīsu
anya-e0812n:901_6: viya tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto hoti. Ettha kiñcāpi māraṅganānaṃ parājayavācako
anya-e0812n:901_7: saddo natthi, tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo mārassa hadayānalo”ti vutte māraṅganāparājayaṃ
anya-e0812n:901_9: tāsaṃ parājayo pakāsito hotīti īdisavaṅkavuttiyā bandhaguṇattā neyyadoso nirākato
anya-e0812n:901_10: hotīti. Mano anurañjetīti ca, māraṅganānaṃ siṅgāroti ca, tena kato vibbhamoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:906: 83. “Apayāte”ccādi. Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi jananti sambandho. Apayāto apagato aparādho yassa taṃ, kodhena pāṭalabhūtena setarattena. Iminā visesanāpekkhadoso parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:907_0: 83. “Apayāti”ccādi. Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi apagatāparādhampi janaṃ kodhapāṭalabhūtena
anya-e0812n:907_1: kodhena bhūtasetalohitavaṇṇayuttena cakkhunā bhiyyo yebhuyyena passatīti. “Passatī”ti
anya-e0812n:907_3: labbhamānattā sātthakaṃ hotīti visesanāpekkhadoso nirākatoti. Apayāto apagato aparādho
anya-e0812n:907_4: asmāti ca, kodhena pāṭalabhūtanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:914_0: 84. “Appakāna”miccādi. Budho paṇḍitaposo appakānaṃ pāpānampi kimutamadhikānaṃ pabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:914_1: ānubhāvaṃ nāsaye appavattiṃ pāpeyya. Taṃ atthantaranyāsena sādheti. Bhāṇumā sūriyo
anya-e0812n:914_2: nippabhataṃ ānīto khajjoto yena tathāvidho api hoti. “Mandappabho aya”nti jotiriṅgaṇampi
anya-e0812n:915_0: 84. “Appakāni”ccādi. Budho paññavā appakānampi atimandānampi pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ pabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:915_2: pāpānaṃ vattabbameva natthi. Tamatthamatthantaranyāsālaṅkārena samattheti apiccādi.
anya-e0812n:915_3: Bhāṇumā sūriyo nippabhatānītakhajjoto api nippabhatamāpāditajotiriṅgaṇehi samannāgatopi
anya-e0812n:915_4: hotīti. Hīnapabhāvo hoti khajjopanake pahāya attano ālokaṃ karonto na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:915_5: Ettha api nippabhaticcādivacanavilāsavasena hīnapakkhaṃ gahetvāpi sūriyaudārattasseva
anya-e0812n:915_6: positattā “nippabhatānītakhajjoto”ti visesanapadaṃ hīnatthadosaṃ na nissayati. Natthi
anya-e0812n:915_7: pabhā yesanti ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca, taṃ ānītā khajjotā yeneti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:920: 85. “Na pāde”ccādi. Ettha vandeiccādo heṭṭhā viya pādapūraṇassa kassaci abhāvena anatthābhāvo.
anya-e0812n:921_1: nāmādikaṃ katthaci na yojeyya viññūti, yathā niratthakapadāyojane udāharaṇamevaṃ
anya-e0812n:921_2: “munindassa varaṃ pādapaṅkeruhaṃ vande”ti. Heṭṭhā duṭṭhodāharaṇe viya pādapūraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:921_3: kassaci padassa ayojitattā sātthakapadehi niratthakadoso nirākatoti. Mudunimmalasobhādisādhāraṇaguṇayogato
anya-e0812n:921_4: paṅkeruhasadisaṃ upacārato paṅkeruhaṃ nāma. Pādameva paṅkeruhanti viggaho. visesanavisesyapadadosaparihāro.
anya-e0812n:927_0: 86. “Bhaye”ccādi. Bhayañca cittutrāso kodho ca doso pasaṃsā ca thuti, tā ādi yassa
anya-e0812n:927_1: turitādino so tādiso viseso yadi vattuṃ kāmīyate icchīyate, tattha tasmiṃ bhayādivisese
anya-e0812n:927_2: visaye ekatthatāya ekatthabhāvena kato doso natthi.
anya-e0812n:928_1: samannāgato tādiso viseso vattuṃ yadi kāmīyate ce viññūhi icchīyate, tattha bhayakodhādike
anya-e0812n:928_2: visese ekatthatākato ekatthabhāvena kato doso vākyadoso na bhavati. Bhayādivisese
anya-e0812n:928_3: vattumicchite pubbuccāritapadassa punuccāraṇe ekatthadoso na hotīti adhippāyo. Bhayañca
anya-e0812n:928_4: kodho ca pasaṃsā cāti ca, tā ādi yassa turitakotūhalaaccharāhāsasokapasādasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n:928_5: atthavisesasseti ca viggaho. Tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā bhayādīsu kathitamapi
anya-e0812n:928_6: gahetvā punappunaṃ kathanamavirodhaṃ. Eko attho yesaṃ padādīnaṃ te ekatthā, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n:931: Sappo sappo ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato;
anya-e0812n:933_1: khede tato tamhā ṭhānā, sappato vā bhavaṃ bhavanto nivattatu gatamaggābhimukho āvattatu.
anya-e0812n:933_2: Taṃ ṭhānaṃ, sappaṃ vā. Natthettha ekatthatādoso bhayenāmeḍitappayogato.
anya-e0812n:934_0: 87. “Sappo”ccādi. Handa naṭṭho vata, ayaṃ sappo sappo bhavaṃ tato ṭhānato, sappato
anya-e0812n:934_1: vā nivattatu āvattatu yadi jīvitukāmo asi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ, sappaṃ vā kathamupasappasi
anya-e0812n:934_2: kathamupagacchasīti. Bhaye āmeḍitavacanattā ekatthatādoso natthi, jīvitukāmosīti ettha bindulopo.
anya-e0812n:943_2: yo kociyeva. Mano anekalokassa cittaṃ haratīti manoharā cittamavaharantī kanti sobhā
anya-e0812n:943_3: kāpi avacanapathā kāpiyeva. Vilāsassa gatyādino atisayo vacanapathātikkanto kopiyeva,
anya-e0812n:943_4: tasmā buddhassa mahanto udayo abhivuḍḍhi aho abbhutoti. Ettha kiṃsaddenāraddhā rīti na katthaci bhaggā.
anya-e0812n:944_2: ādhikyaṃ yo kociyeva manogocarabhāvaṃ vinā vacanavisayātikkantattā yo kociyeva. Manoharā
anya-e0812n:944_3: lokassa cittaṃ harantī kanti sobhā kāpiyeva vacīvisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva. Vilāsātisayo
anya-e0812n:944_5: Tato buddhamahodayo buddhassa mahābhivuddhisaṅkhāto udayo aho acchariyoti. Ettha
anya-e0812n:944_6: sabbanāmikena kiṃ saddena vattumāraddhakkamo na katthaci bhinnoti bhaggarītidoso natthīti.
anya-e0812n:948_0: 89. “Abyāmoha”iccādi. Natthi dūramesanti adūrāni, tāniyeva padāni, tesaṃ vinyāso
anya-e0812n:948_1: yāthāvato ṭhapanaṃ yassa taṃ. Tatoyeva abyākiṇṇo asammisso ca. So abyākiṇṇatāya eva
anya-e0812n:948_2: manoharo cāti abyākiṇṇaṃ manoharaṃ. Teneva “ayamettha attho ayaṃ vā”ti evaṃ byāmohaṃ
anya-e0812n:948_3: na karotīti abyāmohakaro, taṃ. Pasādālaṅkārālaṅkitaṃ bandhaṃ. Kavīnaṃ issarā padhānā.
anya-e0812n:949_1: siyā, tathā paṭipāṭiyā padaṭṭhapanena samannāgataṃ abyākiṇṇaṃ, tatoyeva aññasambandhīpadehi
anya-e0812n:949_2: asammissaṃ manoharaṃ, tatoyeva viññūnaṃ cittamārādhentaṃ abyāmohakaraṃ “imassattho
anya-e0812n:949_3: imassattho eso eso vā”ti saṃsayamanuppādentaṃ bandhaṃ pasādālaṅkārasaṃyuttaṃ bandhanaṃ
anya-e0812n:949_4: kavissarā kavīnaṃ padhānā paṇḍibhajanā, kaniṭṭhaṅguliyā gaṇitabbā aggakavinoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:949_5: Pasaṃsanti thomenti. Byāmohaṃ na karotīti abyāmohakaro. Vi ākiṇṇo byākiṇṇo, na byākiṇṇo
anya-e0812n:949_6: abyākiṇṇo. Natthi dūraṃ yesaṃ, tāniyeva padāni, tesaṃ vinyāso ṭhapanaṃ yassa bandhassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:956_1: indīvaradvayanibhaṃ, adharo adharoṭṭho bandhukamiva bandhukakusumamiva ruciro kanto,
anya-e0812n:956_2: nāsā nāsikā sayaṃ hemaṅkuso suvaṇṇaṅkusoyeva, tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyaṃ madhuraṃ
anya-e0812n:956_3: dassanamassāti piyadassano. Īdiso na byākiṇṇadoso, abyākiṇṇo pasādoyevāti.
anya-e0812n:957_0: 90. Idāni byākiṇṇadosaparihāraṃ pariharati “nīluppali”ccādinā. Nayanaṃ yassa nettayugaḷaṃ
anya-e0812n:957_1: nīluppalābhaṃ nīluppaladalasadisaṃ, adharo adharoṭṭho bandhukaruciro bandhukapupphamiva
anya-e0812n:957_2: manuñño, nāsā nāsikā hemaṅkuso suvaṇṇaṅkusoyeva, tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyadassano
anya-e0812n:957_3: manuññadassano hotīti. Ettha pasādālaṅkārena yuttattā na byākiṇṇadoso. Ābhāsaddo
anya-e0812n:957_4: nibhāsaddo viya ivattho. No ce, pabhāpariyāyo vā hoti. Bandhukamiva ruciroti ca,
anya-e0812n:957_5: piyaṃ dassanaṃ yasseti ca viggaho. Iha dassanassa kattubhūtasādhujanasambandhattepi
anya-e0812n:957_6: visayatteneva jinasambandho hotīti aññapadatthena tathāgato gahitoti.
anya-e0812n:961_0: 91. “Samatikkanti”ccādi. Sammā atikkantaṃ niggataṃ. Gāmmassa bhāvo gāmmattaṃ. Yāsaṃ
anya-e0812n:961_1: kantānaṃ madhurānaṃ vācānaṃ tāhi abhisaṅkhataṃ racitaṃ bandhanaṃ rasassa mādhuriyassa
anya-e0812n:961_2: hetuttā kāraṇabhāvena gāmmattaṃ yathāvuttaṃ ativattati atikkamati.
anya-e0812n:962_1: kantavācāhi racitaṃ bandhanaṃ muttakādibandhanaṃ rasahetuttā paṇḍitānaṃ pītirasassa
anya-e0812n:962_2: kāraṇattā yathāvuttagāmmadosaṃ ativattati atikkamma pavattatīti. Sammā atikkantaṃ
anya-e0812n:962_3: gāmmattaṃ yāsaṃ, tāhiyeva kantavācāhi abhisaṅkhatanti ca, rasassa hetu, tassa bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:969_0: 92. “Yathe”tyudāharati. Kāmāturā kāci vanitā attano piyaṃ patiṃ viravati “dunoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:969_1: Dayāya saha pavattīti sadayaiti anunayavasena piyassa āmantanaṃ, sānunayāmantanañhi
anya-e0812n:969_2: tatonuggahābhikaṅkhāyamaccantamucitaṃ, so kāmo kandappo eva caṇḍālo akaṇḍo vā asayhopatāpāvahattā.
anya-e0812n:969_4: taṃ paribhavantaṃ vippalapati, niddayo nikkaruṇo, idamapi ucitamupatāpe nikkaruṇānaṃ
anya-e0812n:969_5: tādisī gatīti. Maṃ dunoti adhikamupatāpeti niddayattā, na bhavantaṃ, teneva bhavaṃ
anya-e0812n:969_6: sukhī. Iminā aññāsattataṃ tassa dīpeti. Yadi nāññāsattosi, nāhamekākinī bhavāmi.
anya-e0812n:969_7: Asahāyānañhi paṭisattavo honti. Ekākittāyevāhamappaṭisaraṇattānena dusāmīti duññāmīti
anya-e0812n:969_8: (?) tava kāmaṃ tvaṃ sukhī hosi. Sanāthānaṃ tādisī vuttīti evaṃ sukhīpi tvaṃ īdisaṃ
anya-e0812n:969_9: byasanamāpannaṃ kiṃ kasmā upekkhaseti. Evamayaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā attano, taṃ visayamanubhavantassa
anya-e0812n:970_0: 92. Gāmmadosaparihāre lakkhiyaṃ dasseti “dunoti”ccādi. Kāmataṇhābhibhūtā aṅganā attano
anya-e0812n:970_1: vallabhaṃ nissāya evaṃ vilapati “sadaya he kāruṇika so kāmacaṇḍālo so anaṅganīco
anya-e0812n:970_2: niddayo nikkāruṇiko maṃ dunoti pīḷeti, sukhīpi mama viya anāthabhāvābhāvato sukhitopi
anya-e0812n:970_3: tvaṃ īdisaṃ byasanāpannaṃ evaṃ kāmacaṇḍālena akāruṇena kataasayhasantāpasaṅkhātabyasanamanuppattaṃ
anya-e0812n:970_4: maṃ kimupekkhase kasmā udāsīnosī”ti. Attano dukkhāturattā dukkhadūrīkaraṇaṃ kāruṇikānaṃyeva
anya-e0812n:970_5: visayanti “sadaye”ti anunayavasena āmantanucitaṃ attano dukkhāturataṃ posetuṃ pīḷākārake
anya-e0812n:970_6: kāme caṇḍālattāropanañca niddayattakathanañca ucitameva attani upekkhakattā. Sukhīpīti
anya-e0812n:970_7: iminā tassa paravisayāsattatāya aticāraṃ abbhupagameti. Evaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā attano
anya-e0812n:970_8: vallabhe sānurāgattañca attani tassa tadabhāvattañca dassetīti. “Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ
anya-e0812n:970_9: maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvida”nti ettha viya iha gāmmadoso natthīti gāmmadosaparihāramidaṃ.
anya-e0812n:970_10: Kāmoyeva caṇḍālo kāmacaṇḍālo, saha dayāya yo vattatīti ca, natthi dayā asseti ca,
anya-e0812n:970_11: sukhamassa atthīti ca viggaho. Apisaddo akkhame.
anya-e0812n:973: Yato na savanubbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0812n:974: 93. “Yati”ccādi. Vicāritanti “taṃ name sirasā cāmī-karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgata”ntiādinā heṭṭhā pakāsitanti attho.
anya-e0812n:975_1: na vutto”ti evaṃ viññūnamuppajjamānaṃ imassa ganthassa savanāsahanaṃ natthi, tato
anya-e0812n:975_2: yatihīnaparihāro yatihīnadosassa pariharaṇavasena pavattamudāharaṇaṃ idāni puna na
anya-e0812n:975_3: nīyate nāharīyateti. Iminādhigatamādo vuttatthameva samattheti. Heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritanti
anya-e0812n:975_4: evaṃ yatihīnadosapariharaṇaṃ heṭṭhā anantaraparicchede vicāritaṃ “taṃ name sirasā
anya-e0812n:975_5: cāmī-karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgata”ntiādinā pakāsitanti. Ādo yatihīnadosapātubhāveyeva parihārakkamassāpi
anya-e0812n:975_6: dassitattā ihādassanepi ganthassa ūnatā natthīti adhippāyo. Yati hīnā ettheti ca,
anya-e0812n:975_7: tassa parihāroti ca, savane ubbeganti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:979: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:980: 94. “Udāra”iccādi. Udāraṃ udārattaṃ cāgātisayasambandhato caritaṃ atiguṇapavatti yassāti viggaho. Ettha ucitattā desādīnaṃ yācanakkamassa kamaccutassa parihāroyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:981_1: teneva tena kāraṇeneva ārādhanā mama yācanā tvayi hoti. Desaṃ vājanapadaṃ vā, no
anya-e0812n:981_2: ce, gāmaṃ vā saṃvasathaṃ vā, no ce, sobhanaṃ khettaṃ vā kedāraṃ vā mama dehīti anupubbaṃ
anya-e0812n:981_3: hīnapadatthayācanā dāyakassa dānassāpi yācakassa icchitatthapaṭilābhassāpi anurūpattā
anya-e0812n:988_0: 95. “Muninda”iccādi. Munindoyeva cando, tato sambhūtā pātubhūtā, yasorāsī eva marīciyo,
anya-e0812n:988_1: tāsaṃ. Ayaṃ sakalo ākāsopi gaganameva, na tasseko padeso. Vijambhane byāpane nāvakāso
anya-e0812n:989_1: pātubhūtānaṃ kittisamūhasaṅkhātakiraṇānaṃ vijambhane byāpane ayaṃ sakalopi ākāso
anya-e0812n:989_2: nāvakāso na okāso hotīti. Hetuphalādiekekakāraṇenāpi appameyyānaṃ sabbaññuguṇānaṃ
anya-e0812n:989_3: pavattiyā appameyyasāmaññabhūtākāsassa niravakāsassa iva kathanamucitanti ativuttadoso
anya-e0812n:989_4: iha na bhavati. Cando iva cando, munindo eva cando, tato sambhūtānaṃyeva yasānaṃ
anya-e0812n:989_5: rāsī ca tā marīciyo cāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:993_0: 96. “Vākya”miccādi. Byāpannaṃ naṭṭhaṃ ayathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ, tesaṃ. Vākyaṃ
anya-e0812n:993_1: vākyalakkhaṇopetaṃ. Apeto apagato suñño attho abhidheyyaṃ saṃvohārikaṃ yassa, taṃ.
anya-e0812n:993_2: Aninditaṃ ahīḷitaṃ. Tena yathāvuttena kāraṇena. Taṃ vākyaṃ ummatto dhātukkhobhādinā
anya-e0812n:993_3: khittacitto, so ādi yesaṃ bālādīnaṃ tesaṃ vacanā asaṅgatāya vācāya aññatra aññasmiṃ
anya-e0812n:993_4: abyāpannacittavisaye dussati duṭṭhaṃ jāyate, ummattādīnaṃyeva tathāvidhāya vācāya ucitattāti.
anya-e0812n:994_1: vākyaṃ apetatthaṃ apagatasamudāyatthaṃ aninditaṃ viññūhi garahitaṃ na hoti, tena
anya-e0812n:994_2: kāraṇena ummattādikānaṃ ummattavedanaṭṭādīnaṃ vacanāññatra vacanaṃ vinā anummattādivacane
anya-e0812n:994_3: taṃ samudāyatthasambandharahitaṃ vacanaṃ dussati dosaduṭṭhaṃ hoti. Byāpannaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n:994_4: yesanti ca, apeto attho assāti ca, ummatto ādi yesanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:999_1: koci eko attho gayhati, yo so bandhattho siyā. Avayavatthā eva tu ayosalākākappāpaṭibhantīti
anya-e0812n:1000_0: 97. “Samuddo”ccādi. So ayaṃ samuddo pīyate yena kenaci pīyate, ahaṃ ajja jarāturo
anya-e0812n:1000_1: jararogābhibhūto, ime jīmūtā meghā gajjanti thanayanti. Sakkassa erāvaṇo piyoti.
anya-e0812n:1000_2: Idaṃ ninditāninditānaṃ dvinnamudāharaṇaṃ. Idaṃ vākyaṃ avayavatthamantarena samudāyato
anya-e0812n:1000_3: gamyamānatthassābhāvā apetatthaṃ nāma hoti. Īdisaṃ vākyaṃ ummattakādīhi vuttamappītikaraṃ
anya-e0812n:1000_4: na hoti, aññehi vuttaṃ pana kaṇṇe ayosalākā viya appītikaraṃ. Jarāya āturoti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1004_0: 98. “Sukhumāli”ccādi. Na virujjhati sīlenāti avirodhī, tassa bhāvo avirodhittaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1004_1: Sukhumālassa avirodhittaṃ yassa so dittabhāvo, tena pabhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ saṃyuttaṃ
anya-e0812n:1004_2: taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ saṃdūsayeyya nāsayeti attho.
anya-e0812n:1005_2: dittabhāvena piyabhāvena anubrūhitaṃ taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ bandhapharusasaṅkhātadosaṃ
anya-e0812n:1005_3: saṃdūsayeyya nāseyya, taṃ bandhapharusadosanti vā sambandhoti. Na virujjhati sīlenāti
anya-e0812n:1005_4: avirodhī, tassa bhāvoti ca, sukhumālassa avirodhittaṃ yassāti ca, soyeva dittassa
anya-e0812n:1005_5: bhāvoti ca, tena pabhāvitanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1010: 99. “Yathe”tyudāharati “passantā”iccādi. Keḷiyā kīḷāya parammukhā vigatacchandā carantīti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1011_0: 99. “Passante”ccādi. Sādhū sajjanā sambuddhakāle sambuddhassa dharamānakāle rūpavibhavaṃ
anya-e0812n:1011_1: tassa rūpasampattiṃ passantā cakkhuṃ santappetvā olokentā madhuraṃ giraṃ tasseva
anya-e0812n:1011_2: bhagavato aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ madhuravacanaṃ suṇantā keḷiparammukhā kīḷāya vimukhā
anya-e0812n:1011_3: kīḷābhiratirahitā caranti gacchanti pavattantīti. Kevalaṃ pharusasithilavaṇṇehi vinā
anya-e0812n:1011_5: ettha bandhapharusadoso natthi. Keḷiyā parāni parivattitāni mukhāni etesanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1011_6: Ettha kāloti kiriyā. Sā ca atthato tadākārappavattasambandhoyeva. Loko pana visuṃ
anya-e0812n:1018: 100. “Bhāvanā”iccādi. Ettha bhāvanādīni niddisitvā yathākkamaṃ nibbānādīnaṃ niddesena apakkamadoso parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:1019_0: 100. “Bhāvane”ccādi. Iha manussaloke sammā sampāditāni kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā yathāvidhi
anya-e0812n:1019_1: sampāditāni attano santāne pavattāpitāni bhāvanādānasīlāni nibbānabhogasaggādisādhanāni
anya-e0812n:1019_3: honti, ettha sādhane na saṃsayo hotīti. Iha bhāvanādayo uddisitvā uddesakkamaṃ anatikkamma
anya-e0812n:1019_4: nibbānādīnamanuddesassa katattā apakkamavākyatthadosassa okāso na hoti.
anya-e0812n:1021: Uddiṭṭhavisayo koci kopi, viseso tādiso yadi;
anya-e0812n:1023_0: 101. “Uddiṭṭhe”ccādi. Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamaṃ yuttā atthā visayo gocaro yassa uddesānuddesasambandhavijānanalakkhaṇassa
anya-e0812n:1023_1: visesassa so tādiso koci viseso anuddiṭṭhesu yathākkamamuddesakamānamatikkamena puna
anya-e0812n:1023_2: atthantaranissayena parāmaṭṭhesu yadi bhaveyya, kamassa yathoddiṭṭhesu anukkamassa
anya-e0812n:1024_0: 101. “Uddiṭṭhe”ccādi. Uddiṭṭhavisayo paṭhamaṃ payuttatthavisayo tādiso koci viseso
anya-e0812n:1024_2: viseso anuddiṭṭhesu atthantaraṃ nissāya puna vuttesu yadi “bhaveyyā”ti seso. Kamavilaṅghane
anya-e0812n:1024_3: uddesānuddesānaṃ kamātikkame doso satthaññūnaṃ sutikāle asahanakāraṇaṃ nevatthīti.
anya-e0812n:1024_4: Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamuccāritā atthā visayo gocaro asseti ca, kamassa vilaṅghananti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1029_1: dvādasavidhaṃ, abyākataṃ vipākakriyāsaṅkhātamiti etesu tīsu pacchimaṃ abyākataṃ,
anya-e0812n:1029_2: pākaṃ vipākaṃ dadātīti pākadaṃ. Neti nipātapadaṃ. Paṭhamadvayaṃ kusalākusalaṃ pākaṃ
anya-e0812n:1029_3: dadātīti pākadanti. Ettha apākadattaṃ abyākatasseva, pākadattaṃ tesameva dvinnanti viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:1030_1: akusalañca abyākataṃ vipākakriyārūpanibbānavasena catubbidhamabyākatañca iccesu evametesu
anya-e0812n:1030_2: tīsu pacchimaṃ uddesakkamena pacchimamabyākataṃ pākadaṃ na vipākadāyakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:1030_3: paṭhamadvayaṃ kusalākusalaṃ pākadaṃ yathāsakaṃ vipākadāyakaṃ hotīti. “Yathāsaṅkhyamanudeso
anya-e0812n:1030_4: samāna”nti pāṇini 1.3.10 suttamidaṃ. anudissate iti anudeso, pacchā uccārito iccattho
anya-e0812n:1030_6: samasaṅkhyāya labbhamānattā saṅkhyāyānatikkamo hoti. Ettha pana kusalādisabhāvato
anya-e0812n:1030_8: vatticchāto paṭhamaṃ vattabbataṃ vinā kamena nissayanaṃ nāma natthīti apakkamadoso na hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1034_0: 103. “Saguṇāna”miccādi. Sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise kāraṇe hetumhi sati
anya-e0812n:1034_1: bhūtaṃ yathāpavattaṃ atthaṃ attano caritalakkhaṇaṃ saṃsino vadantassa sassa attano,
anya-e0812n:1034_2: sānaṃ vā guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe adhikāravasena “pūjanīyataro loke”iccādikathane ocikyahīnatāya
anya-e0812n:1035_0: 103. “Saguṇi”ccādi. Tādise kāraṇe sati sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise hetumhi
anya-e0812n:1035_2: “pūjanīyataro loke ahameko”iccādinā tādisāvasare vadantassa saguṇānaṃ sassa attano,
anya-e0812n:1035_3: sānaṃ vā sakānaṃ guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe pākaṭīkaraṇe ocityahīnatāpatti ocityahīnasaṅkhātadosassāpatti
anya-e0812n:1035_4: natthīti. Sasaddassa attaattaniyavācakattā sassa attano guṇā se ca te guṇā ceti vā
anya-e0812n:1035_5: viggaho. Bhūtoyeva attho, taṃ saṃsati vadati sīlenāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1039_0: 104. “Ocitya”miccādi. Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ pasiddhaṃ ābālajanaṃ ābālajanānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1039_1: (ka.) yathāsakamanurūpaṃ vijānanato ocityaṃ ucitabhāvo nāmeti pasiddhiyaṃ ādarā ādarena
anya-e0812n:1039_2: ussāhena tato paramādaraṇīyassābhāvato, na hi anucitaṃ kiñci kenāpyādaraṇīyaṃ sabbathā
anya-e0812n:1039_3: anassādanīyattā, viññeyyaṃ “sotūna”nti seso. Tattha tasmiṃ ocitye upadesassa paṭhamuccāraṇassa
anya-e0812n:1039_4: uggaṇhāpanavasena pavattassa pabhavā uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā suṭṭhujanā kavipuṅgavā
anya-e0812n:1040_0: 104. “Ocitye”ccādi. Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ ābālapasiddhaṃ ocityaṃ nāma ādarā gāravena
anya-e0812n:1040_1: viññeyyaṃ viññūhi ñātabbaṃ hoti, tattha ocityavisaye upadesapabhavā paṭhamuccāraṇassa
anya-e0812n:1040_2: uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā sādhujanabhūtā kavipuṅgavā uttamakavayo bhavantīti, pasiddhaocityapadena
anya-e0812n:1040_3: yuttattā ettha nāmasaddo pasiddhiyaṃ. Upadesassa pabhavāti ca, pumāno ca te gāvo
anya-e0812n:1040_4: ceti ca, kavīnaṃ puṅgavāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1046_1: sampatti yena so ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare parivajjeyya. Tato tasmā parihārato
anya-e0812n:1046_2: hetuto ocityassa sampose suṭṭhu vaḍḍhibhāve vaḍḍhane kate rasassa assāditabbatāsaṅkhātassa
