anya-e0812n:2581_10: ca, āvibhavanamiti ca, tirobhāvo ca āvibhāvo ceti ca, te ādayo yassa ṭhāyībhāvesu
anya-e0812n:2581_11: vijjamānānaṃ sukhadukkhasabhāvānaṃ attani āropanasseti ca, soyeva visesoti ca, abhimukhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2581_12: bhāvoti ca viggaho. Byabhicārīpade visaddo visesatthe abhisaddo abhimukhabhāve vattati.
anya-e0812n:2592_0: 344. Te dasseti “nibbedo”iccādinā. Dīnatuggālasattanti dīnatā ca uggatañca ālasattañca,
anya-e0812n:2592_1: gilāni ussukaiti ussukkaṃ. Capalaiti cāpallaṃ, saha capalena sacapalo, so cāyaṃ byādhi
anya-e0812n:2592_2: ca, maraṇañca sacapalabyādhi ca samāhāre. Tañca saha biḷāya vattatīti sabiḷanti ete
anya-e0812n:2592_3: yathāvuttabyabhicārībhāvā tettiṃsa hontīti. Ussāhavatā vīraraso taṃvaseneva assādīyati.
anya-e0812n:2592_4: Bhīrunā tu sova bhayānakarasavaseneti lokasabhāvassa anekattā tadatthamete byabhicārino
anya-e0812n:2592_5: ekekassarasassa bahavo vaṇṇanīyā, yato taṃvaṇṇanādvārena sabbopi tesu kiñci assādetīti.
anya-e0812n:2592_6: Tattha yasmā pana māraṇopagataveridassanamekameva taṅkhaṇeyeva bhinnaṃ pakativasena
anya-e0812n:2592_7: bhīruno bhayassa hetu, saṅgāmalolassa tu ussāhanimittaṃ siyā. Tathā naṭena kataṃ
anya-e0812n:2592_8: vikatamābharaṇaṃ kriyāvā nīcapakatīnaṃ ṭhāyino hāsassa hetu, gambhīrapakatīnaṃ byabhicārino
anya-e0812n:2592_9: hāsassa, tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā, yathocityapariposo siyā.
anya-e0812n:2593: Tesu nibbedo attāvamānanaṃ. Tassa ca itthīnañca nīcānañca dāliddiyaṃ vibhāvo, yogīnaṃ tu tatvasaṃvedanaṃ vibhāvo, assupatanacintādayo ettha anubhāvā.
anya-e0812n:2594: Takko vitakkanaṃ. Tassa sandeho vibhāvo, sirokampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2596: Samo khedo. Tattha gatyādi vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2597: Dhiti santoso. Ñāṇādi vibhāvo, anubhāvo bhogālolatādi.
anya-e0812n:2598: Jaḷatā appaṭipatti. Tassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhadassanādi vibhāvo, animisanayanālocanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2599: Dīnatā cetaso anojatā. Tassā vibhāvo duggatatādi, anubhāvo malinavatthatādi.
anya-e0812n:2600: Uggatā dāruṇattaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo balavāparādhādi, tassa anubhāvo tajjanādi.
anya-e0812n:2603: Tāso cittakkhobho. Vibhāvo assa gajjitādi, kampanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2605: Kālakkhamatā ussukaṃ. Vibhāvo tassa ramaṇīyadassanicchādi, anubhāvo turitatādi.
anya-e0812n:2606: Cetopasādo harito. Tatra ussavādi vibhāvo, assusedādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2608: Paresamukkaṃsāsahanatā issā. Tassā dujjanattagabbādayo vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2609: Visādo khedo. Vibhāvo tassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhādi, bādhayatāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2610: Abahitthā kāyasaṃvaraṇaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo lajjādi, anubhāvo’ññavikriyā.
anya-e0812n:2612: Gabbo abhimāno. Vibhāvossa issariyādi, anubhāvo avajānanādi.
anya-e0812n:2613: Apamāro gāharukkhādīhi gāharukkhapatanādīhi (?), bhūpātādayo ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2614: Amariso akkhamatā. Vibhāvo assāvamānanādi, sirokampanatajjanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2615: Mado pamādukkaṃso. Tassa vibhāvo pānaṃ, calamānaṅgavacogatihāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2616: Mati kaṅkhacchedo. Upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhavikāsādi ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2617: Asamekkhitakāritā ummādo. Tassa vibhāvo sannipātagahaṇādi, aṭṭhānaruditagītahāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2621: Capalatā rāgadosādīhi, sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo. Byādhi pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n:2622_0: Ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā cittavuttivisesāpi saṃvijjanti sukhumabhedā, tesu keci
anya-e0812n:2622_1: vuttesvantogadhā honti. Yathā hi icchāsabhāvā sabbe kāmā ratiyaṃ antogadhā, tathā
anya-e0812n:2622_2: dosappakārā kodhā marisaissādīsvantogadhā, dukkhasabhāvā sokasamabyādhigilāni visādādīsvantogadhā.
anya-e0812n:2622_3: Pītyādayo sukhasabhāvā hariseti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu bhayā tāso añño, saṅkā tathā amariso.
anya-e0812n:2622_4: Tasmā issā, tathā gilānito samo, niddāya suttaṃ, ussukā capalatā, tathā mohā palayo
anya-e0812n:2623_0: 344. Idāni te byabhicārībhāve sarūpena dasseti “nibbedo”iccādinā. Nibbedo attanindāsaṅkhato
anya-e0812n:2623_1: ca, takkasaṅkā ca, samadhitijaḷatā parisamo santosalakkhaṇā dhiti jaḷatā ca, dīnatuggālasattaṃ
anya-e0812n:2623_2: dīnabhāvadāruṇabhāvaalasabhāvā ca, suttaṃ sayanañca, tāso cittakkhobho ca, gilānaparimadditabhāvo
anya-e0812n:2623_4: ca, gabbo abhimāno ca, apamāro ca, amarisamadamatummādamohā akkhantipamādādhikkā
anya-e0812n:2623_5: kaṅkhacchedaummādamohā ca, vibodho pabodho ca, niddāvegā niddā ca, āvegasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n:2623_6: sambhamo ca, sabiḷaṃ lajjāsahitaṃ maraṇasacapalābyādhi maraṇañca cāpalyasahitā byādhi
anya-e0812n:2623_7: ceti. Ete tettiṃsa byabhicārībhāvā nāma honti. Takko ca saṅkā ceti ca, samo ca dhiti
anya-e0812n:2623_8: ca jaḷatā ceti ca, dīnatā ca uggo ca alasattañcāti ca, ussukañcahariso ca sati ca
anya-e0812n:2623_9: issā ca visādo ca abahitthā ceti ca, amariso ca mado ca mati ca ummādo ca moho ceti
anya-e0812n:2623_10: ca, niddā ca āvego ceti ca, saha biḷāya vattatīti ca, saha capalena cāpalyena vattatīti
anya-e0812n:2623_11: ca, sacapalo ca so byādhiceti ca, maraṇañca sacapalabyādhi ceti ca vākyaṃ. Maraṇasacapalābyādhīti
anya-e0812n:2623_12: samāhāradvando. Tasmā “sabiḷa”nti padaṃ etassa visesanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2624_0: Lokasabhāvassa anekavidhattā ekoyeva vīraraso ussāhavatā vīrarasākārena assādanīyo
anya-e0812n:2624_1: hoti, soyeva bhīrunā bhayākārena assādanīyo hoti. Tasmā ekekassa rasassa ime bahū
anya-e0812n:2624_2: byabhicārino vaṇṇetabbā honti. Evaṃ sati anekādhippāyako loko tesu kiñci assādeti.
anya-e0812n:2624_3: Evaṃ sati bandho sabbajanassa kanto hoti. Tassaṃ bhāvavaṇṇanāyaṃ yasmā māretumāgacchantānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2624_4: sattūnaṃ dassanamekameva taṅkhaṇe janādhippāyato bhijjitvā pakatibhīrūnaṃ purisānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2624_5: bhayassa ca yuddhalolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ naṭena hasanatthaṃ katavikatamābharaṇañca
anya-e0812n:2624_6: tādisakiriyā ca uttānapakatikānaṃ purisānaṃ ṭhāyīhāsassa ca gambhīrapakatikānaṃ byabhicārīhāsassa
anya-e0812n:2624_7: ca hetu bhaveyya. Tasmā bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocityabhaṅgamakatvā sakkaccamocityaṃ
anya-e0812n:2624_8: sajjetvā bhāvappakāsakāni savibhāvānubhāvakavivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni. Ettha bhāvāvabodhakavibhāvādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2624_9: jānitabbattā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhiṃ evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:2625_0: Tesu bhāvesu attāvamānanalakkhaṇo nibbedo. Itthīnaṃ, hīnānaṃ hīnācārānaṃ (ka.) vā
anya-e0812n:2625_1: uppajjati ce, dāliddiyaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo nāma, yogīnaṃ ce, tathāvabodho ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2626: Vitakkassa sandeho uddīpanavibhāvo nāma, sirokampādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n:2627: Saṅkāya viruddhappavatti uddīpanavibhāvo, kampādiko anubhāvo. Upari “vibhāvo”ti vutte ālambaṇuddīpanesu dvīsu yaṃ yujjati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2628: Khedalakkhaṇassa samassa gamanādikaṃ vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2629: Santosalakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇādi vibhāvo, bhogesu alolabhāvādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2630: Ayoggatālakkhaṇāya jaḷatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhānaṃ ajānanādi vibhāvo, vivaṭanayanehi abhimukhavilokanatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2631: Cittassanittejalakkhaṇāya dīnatāya duggatatādi vibhāvo, malinavatthatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2634: Sayanasaṅkhātassa suttassa niddādi vibhāvo, assādādi anubhāvo. Ettha assādanaṃ nāma seyyasukhapassasukhādikaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2635: Cittakkhobhasaṅkhātassa tāsassa gajjitādi vibhāvo, gajjitaṃ nāma bhayajanakavacanaṃ. Kopena kampanā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2636: Pīḷāsaṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo, dubbaṇṇatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2637: Anurūpakālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa rammavatthudassanicchādi vibhāvo, turitatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2638: Cetopasādalakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgalakīḷādi vibhāvo, santosavacanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2639: Saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇadassanādi vibhāvo, bhamukkhepādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2640: Parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya dujjanabhāvagabbādi vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādi anubhavo.
anya-e0812n:2641: Khedalakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhikāriyabyāpattiādi vibhāvo, manosantāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2642: Ākārasaṃvaraṇalakkhaṇāya, rasasabhāvapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya vā abahitthayalajjādi vibhāvo, tadaññakriyākaraṇaṃ, adhomukhakaraṇaṃ, pādehi bhūmikhaṇanantiādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2643: Cintāya iṭṭhatthālābhādī vibhāvo, makulitanayanādi adhokhittacakkhādi vā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2646: Akkhamalakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānanādi vibhāvo, sirokampanatajjanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2647: Pamādādhikkalakkhaṇassa madassa santosapānaṃ vibhāvo, kampamānahatthapādavacanagamanahāsādī anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2648: Kaṅkhācchedanalakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhasantosādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2649: Anupaparikkhakāritālakkhaṇassa ummādassa sannipātajjarayakkhādi vibhāvo, akāraṇarodanahasanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2650: Muyhanalakkhaṇassa mohassa adhikabhayādi vibhāvo, sabhāvānavabodhanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2651: Niddāpagamasaṅkhātassa vibodhassa kālapariṇāmādi ālokasaraṇādi vā vibhāvo, akkhimaddanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2652: Manosampīḷanalakkhaṇāya niddāya kassaci acintanaakaraṇādi vibhāvo, akkhipidahanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2653: Bhayāgamanalakkhaṇassa āvegassa paccatthikadassanādi vibhāvo, utrāsakampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2654: Lajjālakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācārādi vibhāvo, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2656: Cāpallassa rāgadosādi vibhāvo, attano sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2657: Byādhiyā vātapittādīnaṃ ussadabhāvādi vibhāvo, nitthunanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2658_0: Imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre adassitasukhumabhedā aññāpi cittavuttivisesā santi, tesu icchāsabhāvā
anya-e0812n:2658_1: sabbe bhedā kāmaratiyañca, dosapakārā kodhaamarisaissādīsu ca, dukkhasabhāvā sokasamabyādhigilānavisādādīsu
anya-e0812n:2658_2: ca, pitiādayo harise ca antogadhāti veditabbā. Evaṃ samānānaṃ saṅgahe satipi tāsato
anya-e0812n:2658_3: bhayassa ca, saṅkāya amarissa ca, amarisato issāya ca, gilānato samassa ca, niddāya
anya-e0812n:2658_4: suttassa ca, ussukkato capalatāya ca, mohato vakkhamānapalayassa ca pākaṭavisesena
anya-e0812n:2663_1: attā cittaṃ tato pabhavaṃ uppannaṃ yaṃ, taṃ sattaṃ nāma. Tena sattena upapāditā nibbattitā
anya-e0812n:2663_2: thambhādayo sāttikā vuccante. Te ca puna anubhāvāpi bhavanti thambhādibhāvasaṃsūcanasabhāvavikārarūpattā.
anya-e0812n:2663_4: te sāttikā visuṃ puthageva bhāvā bhavanti, vuttanayena cittabhavattavirūpattā tesanti.
anya-e0812n:2664_2: nāma hoti. Tena lābhālābhādīsu ekākārassa hetunā thirabhāvena upapāditā nipphāditā
anya-e0812n:2664_3: thambhādayo sāttikā nāma bhavanti. Te sāttikā anubhāvattepi cittākārasaṅkhātathambhādipakāsanasabhāvavikārasarūpattā
anya-e0812n:2664_4: attano anubhāvatte satipi visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti yathāvutta “cittavuttivisesā tu, bhāvayanti
anya-e0812n:2664_5: rase yato”tiādinā bhāvā nāma hontīti. Ime sāttikābhāvānubhāvavasena duvidhā honti.
anya-e0812n:2664_6: Samāhito ca so attā ceti ca, tato pabhavamiti ca, santo upasanto ca so attā ceti
anya-e0812n:2664_7: ca, sattato bhavantīti ca, sattena uppāditāti ca, anubhāvānaṃ bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2671: 346. Te dasseti “thambho”iccādinā. Ettha thambho avissarakāyacittatā. Palayo assāsapassāsamattāvaseso suttāvatthāsabhāvo niddāpabhavo. Subyattalakkhaṇā sesā.
anya-e0812n:2672_0: 346. Idāni sāttike dasseti “thambho”iccādinā. Thambho kāyacittānaṃ avisarabhāvasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n:2672_2: romuggamo ca tathā evaṃ sedassuvepathu ca bhayādīhi uppajjamānadāho ca santosādīhi
anya-e0812n:2672_3: uppajjamānaassu ca kampā ca vevaṇṇiyaṃ virūpatā ca vissaratā virūpasaddatā cāti ete
anya-e0812n:2672_4: aṭṭha sāttikā bhāvā nāma honti. Romānaṃ añco uggamoti ca, palayo ca romañco ceti
anya-e0812n:2672_5: ca, vepanaṃ kampanamiti ca, sedo ca assu ca vepathu cāti ca, virūpo vaṇṇo asseti
anya-e0812n:2672_6: ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, virūpo saro asseti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2678: 347. Na kevalaṃ vuttāyeva byabhicārino, ratyādayopīti āha “yadā”iccādi. Bhavanti byabhicārinoti yathāyogaṃ yathāsambandhaṃ byabhicārino hontīti attho. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2679_0: 347. Idāni nibbedādayo viya ratihāsādayopi kismiñci kāle byabhicārinopi hontīti dasseti
anya-e0812n:2679_1: “yadā” iccādinā. Ratyādayo ratihāsādayo bhāvā nava ṭhāyībhāvā yadā ṭhitisīlā na honti
anya-e0812n:2679_2: ce virodhīhi tehi tehi bhāvantarehi byavahitattā sabhāvato ṭhitisabhāvā yadi na honti,
anya-e0812n:2679_3: tadā te bhāvā ratyādayo sabbepi byabhicārino bhavantīti. Yathāsakaṃ byabhicāritānurūpavibhāvānubhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2679_4: yogānurūpena byabhicārībhāvā honti. Ratiādi yesaṃ hāsādīnamiti ca, ṭhiti sīlaṃ yesaṃ
anya-e0812n:2685_0: 348. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve dasseti “vibhāvo”iccādinā. Tesaṃ ratyādīnaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppattiyā,
anya-e0812n:2685_1: tathā uddīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho vibhāvo nāma. Tattha ālambaṇavibhāvo
anya-e0812n:2685_2: kantādi, uddīpanavibhāvo candādi. Tesaṃ bodhako ñāpako kāyiko ca vācasiko ca byāpāro
anya-e0812n:2686_0: 348. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve dasseti “vibhāvo”iccādinā. Tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:2686_1: uppattiyā ca tathā uddīpane ca uppannānaṃ dīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena
anya-e0812n:2686_2: duvidho hetu vibhāvo nāma, tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ bodhako kāyikavācasiko yo siyā naṭakavīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2686_3: byāpāro atthi, ayaṃ anubhāvoti īritoti. Visesena bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti vibhāvo. Anubhāveti
anya-e0812n:2686_4: bodhetīti anubhāvo. Ettha vibhāvo nāma rativisaye naranārīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2686_5: candarammadesādi uddīpanavibhāvo ceti duvidho. Hāsādīnampi duvidhavibhāvaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0812n:2686_6: yojetabbaṃ. Anubhāvo nāma ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pakāsakavācasikabyāpārasaṅkhātakavipayogo
anya-e0812n:2686_7: ca kāyikapayogabhūto naṭānaṃ abhinayasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃbhāvasarūpanirūpako ceti duvidho byāpāro.
anya-e0812n:2690_1: sañjāta”miti vutte sokā ānandā rogā ceti ko nāma sakkoti kāraṇaṃ nicchituṃ, cittavuttivisesañca
anya-e0812n:2690_2: bhāvaṃ vinā vibhāvānubhāvaṃ kavi vaṇṇetuṃ naṭobhinetuṃ sāmajjiko vā viññātuṃ ko sakkotīti
anya-e0812n:2690_3: dassetumāha “neka”iccādi. Nekahetuṃ bahuhetuṃ manovuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vibhāvituṃ
anya-e0812n:2690_4: pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā vuttalakkhaṇā bandhane sabhāvanirūpakapade phuṭaṃ vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n:2691_0: 349. “Devadattassa cakkhūni assupuṇṇānī”ti vutte sokena santosena rogena vāti yathā
anya-e0812n:2691_1: assukāraṇakathanaṃ vinā na jānāti, evaṃ cittassa pavattisaṅkhātā ratihāsādayo te
anya-e0812n:2691_2: te bhāvā attano patītiyānurūpaṃ vibhāvānubhāvakathanaṃ vinā kavīhi vaṇṇetabbā, naṭehi
anya-e0812n:2691_3: dassetabbā, sabbhehi assādanīyā natthīti ṭhāyīādīnaṃ vaṇṇanameva kātabbanti idāni
anya-e0812n:2691_4: anusāsento āha “neka”iccādi. Nekahetuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppatyādo ālambaṇavibhāvādibahukāraṇavantaṃ
anya-e0812n:2691_5: manovuttivisesaṃ bhāvañca cittassa pavattivisesasaṅkhātabhāvañca vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ
anya-e0812n:2691_6: vibhāvānubhāvā anantaraniddiṭṭhā bandhane rasabhāvappakāsane phuṭaṃ pakāsaṃ katvā
anya-e0812n:2691_7: vaṇṇiyā kavinā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti. Na ekoti ca, so hetu asseti ca, manaso vuttīti
anya-e0812n:2691_8: ca, tāya visesoti ca, vibhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2695_0: 350. Idāni te bhāvā lokasabhāvānatikkamena vibhāvādīhi vaṇṇanīyāti āha “savibhāve”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:2695_1: Saha vibhāvehi savibhāvā, te ca te anubhāvā ca, tehi. Yathārahanti attano sambandhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2696_0: 350. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve nissāya vaṇṇanīyā te bhāvā lokasabhāvamanatikkamma kātabbāti
anya-e0812n:2696_1: anusāsanto āha “savibhāvā”iccādi. Lokarūpānugāminā lokavohāramanuvattamānena te te
anya-e0812n:2696_2: bhāvā ṭhāyībhāvādayo tayo yathocityaṃ ocityānurūpaṃ savibhāvānubhāvehi vibhāvasahitehi
anya-e0812n:2696_3: anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi yathārahaṃ tehi tehi bhāvehi sambandhīnaṃ vibhāvādīnaṃ vasena
anya-e0812n:2696_4: anurūpato vaṇṇanīyā vaṇṇetabbā hontīti. Vibhāvehi saha ye vattantīti ca, te ca te
anya-e0812n:2696_5: anubhāvā ceti ca, anatikkamma arahanti ca, anatikkamma ocityamiti ca, lokassa rūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:2696_6: sarūpamiti ca, taṃ anugacchati sīlenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2700_0: 351. Sāttikā kathaṃ vaṇṇanīyāti āha “citte”ccādi. Cittassa vuttiviseso yesaṃ, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n:2700_1: bhāvo, tasmā mānasā manasi bhavā sāttikā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭehi niggatehi
anya-e0812n:2700_2: sedādīhi anubhāvehi vaṇṇanīyā, na pana sedasalilameva bhāvoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2701_0: 351. Evaṃ sāmaññena bhāvavaṇṇanakkamaṃ dassetvā idāni visesena sāttikabhāvavaṇṇanā
anya-e0812n:2701_1: īdisāti dasseti “citta”iccādinā. Cittavuttivisesattā cittassa pavattivisesattā mānasā
anya-e0812n:2701_2: citte bhavā sāttikābhāvā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭasedādianubhāvehi bahinikkhantasedādīhi
anya-e0812n:2701_3: anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi vaṇṇiyā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti, aṅgato bahi nissaṭanti visesanena
anya-e0812n:2701_4: visiṭṭhabhūtasedādīnameva bhāvānubhāvattaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sedādayo vuttā samānā bhāvādayo
anya-e0812n:2701_5: nāma na hontīti adhippāyo. Cittassa vuttīti ca, sā eva viseso yesaṃ sāttikānamiti
anya-e0812n:2701_6: ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca, manasi bhavāti ca, sedo ādi yesaṃ kheḷādīnamiti ca, nissaṭā
anya-e0812n:2701_7: niggatā ca te sedādayo ceti ca, te eva anubhāvāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2706_0: 352. Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vuttattā rase niddisanto āha “sāmajjikāna”miccādi.
anya-e0812n:2706_1: Bandhassa attho, tadanussaranti manobhāvanāvasenāti bandhatthānusārino, tesaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2706_2: sabbhānaṃ manasi yo ānando, ayaṃ lokamadhurādiraso viya bandhe siṅgārādi raso nāma
anya-e0812n:2706_3: īrito taññūhi rasaññūhi. Kathamityāha “rasīyatī”ti, assādīyatīti attho. Kiñca? Yathā
anya-e0812n:2706_4: nānābyañjanasaṅkhatamannaṃ bhuñjamānā rase assādiyanti sumānasā purisā santosañcādhigacchanti,
anya-e0812n:2706_5: tathā nānābhinayabyañjite vācaṅgasatthopete ṭhāyībhāve assādenti sumānasāpekkhakā,
anya-e0812n:2707_0: 352. Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vatvā uddiṭṭhakkamena sampattaṃ rasaṃ dasseti
anya-e0812n:2707_2: sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ citte bhavo yo ānando santoso atthi, ayaṃ loke madhurādiraso
anya-e0812n:2707_3: viya assādanīyo hotīti atthayuttena “rasīyatī”ti iminā vacanatthena raso nāmāti taññūhirasaññūhi
anya-e0812n:2707_4: īrito kathitoti. Samajjāyaṃ niyuttāti ca, bandhassa atthoti ca, taṃ anussarantīti
anya-e0812n:2707_5: ca, taṃ jānantīti ca vākyaṃ. Yathā nānābyañjanehi abhisaṅkhatamāhāraṃ paribhuñjantā
anya-e0812n:2707_6: sattā lavaṇambilādayo te te rase assādeyyuṃ, santuṭṭhā ca bhaveyyuṃ, evameva nānappakāraabhinayehi
anya-e0812n:2707_7: pakāsitavaṇṇanāya aṅgabhūtehi anurūpehi satthehi yutte ṭhāyībhāve issādirahitapaññavantā
anya-e0812n:2707_8: assādenti, tasmā ime ṭhāyībhāvā naṭābhinayehi byañjitattā ca sabbhānaṃ santosasaṅkhatarasassa
anya-e0812n:2714: 353. Ṭhāyīnameva rasattāpattimāha “savibhāve”ccādinā. Ṭhāyeva soti so yathāvutto raso ṭhāyībhāvoyeva, nāññoti attho.
anya-e0812n:2715_1: So raso anantaraniddiṭṭho savibhāvānubhāvehi tesaṃ tesaṃ ṭhāyīnaṃ anurūpehi vibhāvasahitehi
anya-e0812n:2715_3: karaṇabhūtehi assādiyattaṃ ānīyamāno kavino sāmatthiyā pāpuṇiyamāno ṭhāyeva ṭhāyībhāvo
anya-e0812n:2715_4: evāti kāriyopacārena raso nāmāti veditabboti. Saha bhāvehi pavattantīti ca, savibhāvā
anya-e0812n:2715_5: ca te anubhāvā ceti ca, sāttikā ca byabhicārino ceti ca, assādiyassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2719: 354. Tesaṃ nāmavasena vibhāgamāha “siṅgāre”ccādinā. Ṭhāyīnanukkamāti “ratihāsā ca soko cā”tiādinā vuttānaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā, paṭipāṭiyāti attho.
anya-e0812n:2720_0: 354. Rasāvatthāsampattaratihāsādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ idāni kamena nāmantaraṃ dasseti
anya-e0812n:2720_1: “siṅgāra”iccādinā. Ṭhāyīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ ratihāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0812n:2720_2: siṅgārahassakaruṇā siṅgāro hasso karuṇā ca ruddavīrabhayānakā ruddo vīro bhayānako
anya-e0812n:2720_3: ca bībhacchabbhutasantā ca bibhaccho abbhuto santo ceti nava rasā nāma hontīti. Siṅgāraraso
anya-e0812n:2720_4: hassarasotiādinā rasasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Siṅgāro ca hasso ca karuṇā ceti ca
anya-e0812n:2720_5: viggaho. Sesesupi liṅgasamāsā imeyeva. Ime siṅgārādīnaṃ ratyādīhi anaññattā upari
anya-e0812n:2726_0: 355. Sokādirūpokaruṇādi kathaṃ raso siyāti āha “dukkhe”ccādi. Vessantarassa puttadāraviyogā
anya-e0812n:2726_1: karuṇā sokarūpo dukkhameva ahosi, sampati pana sotūnaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānandoyevāti etthādhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2727_0: 355. Heṭṭhā vuttaraso santosova, sokakodhādilakkhaṇo karuṇāruddādiko kathaṃ raso
anya-e0812n:2727_2: niddiṭṭho dukkharūpe dukkhalakkhaṇe karuṇādike karuṇāruddādike visaye kathaṃ bhaveyyāti
anya-e0812n:2727_3: ce, nesa doso hi tatheva vessantarassa bodhisattassa soko puttadāravirahato jātasoko
anya-e0812n:2727_4: sotūnaṃ idāni suṇantānaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānando siyā ānandassa kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena
anya-e0812n:2727_5: santoso nāma bhaveyyāti. Vattuno sāmatthiyā karuṇārasādikaṃ pāpetvā pakāsiyamānassa
anya-e0812n:2727_6: sokādikassa dukkharūpena ṭhitattā suṇantānaṃ pīti uppādiyatevāti adhippāyo. Dukkhaṃ
anya-e0812n:2727_7: rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa karuṇādinoti ca, karuṇā ādi yassa ruddādinoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2733_1: dassitā. “Yuvāna”nti iminā ālambaṇavibhāvo. Itthī hi purisassa, puriso itthiyā ālambaṇavibhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2734_0: 356. Idāni siṅgārādināmake teratyādike kamena niddisati “ramma”iccādinā. Rammadesakalākālavesādipaṭisevanā
anya-e0812n:2734_3: imesaṃ diṭṭhasutamutādīsu diṭṭhādimattamakatvā paññāya tena tenākārena punappunānubhavanena
anya-e0812n:2734_5: purisānaṃ pamodo abhiramaṇavasena santoso pīti rati ruccate ruccanato “ratī”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n:2734_6: Imasmiṃ pakkhe rakāro sandhijo. Deso ca kalā ca kālo ca veso ceti ca, te ādayo yesamiti
anya-e0812n:2734_7: ca, rammā ca te desa…pe… vesādayo ceti ca, tesaṃ paṭi punappunaṃ sevanamiti ca, añño
anya-e0812n:2734_8: ca añño ceti ca, tesu rattāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2740_1: ye saṅkāussukkādayo bhāvā taṃbyañjakā tadanurūpā anubhāvā ca ayogādike siṅgāre yathā
anya-e0812n:2740_2: yathā yuñjanti, tādisiyāva yuttiyā nibandhā naṃ ratiṃ samposayanti, soyevamevaṃ posito
anya-e0812n:2740_3: siṅgāro nāma raso sampajjate. Sopi tidhāti sambandho. Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe asaṅgatānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2740_5: sileso vippayogo. Balavakāmāvesavisesānaṃ kāmīnaṃ dassanādisamañjanaṃ sambhogo.
anya-e0812n:2741_0: 357. Idāni ratiyā puṭṭhakāraṇaṃ puṭṭhapayogañca dasseti “yutyā”iccādinā. Te bhāvānubhāvā
anya-e0812n:2741_1: niddiṭṭhabyabhicārībhāvesu ratyānurūpabyabhicārībhāvo tappakāsako anubhāvo ceti ime
anya-e0812n:2741_2: dve yutyā hetubhūtāya ayogavippayogasambhogasaṅkhatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ siṅgārānaṃ anukūlatthena
anya-e0812n:2741_3: ratiyā viruddhattā ālasiyauggajigucchādike parivajjetvā saṅkāussukkādīnaṃ ratyānukūlabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2741_4: vasena yathāyogaṃ nibandhā kavīhi bandhā naṃ ratiṃ posayanti yathā tappakāsanena
anya-e0812n:2741_5: pūrenti sajjenti, evaṃ sajjito ratisiṅgāro nāma raso hoti. Sopi sāmaññena niddiṭṭhasiṅgārarasopi
anya-e0812n:2741_6: ayogavippayogasambhogānaṃ siṅgārānaṃ vasā bhedena tidhā bhavatīti. Tattha ayogo nāma
anya-e0812n:2741_7: pubbe aññamaññasaṅgamarahitānaṃ abhinavānurāgabalena saṅgamaṃ patthentānaṃ thīpumānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2741_8: asaṅgamo. Vippayogo nāma saṅgamātisayena viruḷhapemānaṃ thīpumānaṃ aññamaññavisileso.
anya-e0812n:2741_9: Sambhogo nāma balavakāmataṇhāvisesavasena yuttānaṃ kāminikāmukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanādiassādo.
anya-e0812n:2741_10: Bhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca, ayogo ca vippayogo ca sambhogo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2742_1: tapodhanānaṃ aññarasāvabodhane payojanābhāvepi lokiyesu tesu tesu vohāresu asammohatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:2742_4: tassa tassa lakkhiyassa mukhamattaṃ dassetabbaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhā “rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ
anya-e0812n:2742_6: bhāvābhāsassa, vibhāvābhāsassa, anubhāvābhāsassa ca ñātabbattā siṅgārarasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2747_0: Gītassarena hatthīnaṃ gītikāya piyattā gītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā
anya-e0812n:2747_1: nettarasmibandhaṃ nettasaṅkhātahatthācariyassa rajjunā bandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena
anya-e0812n:2747_2: soṇḍaggahaṇena vivasañca apagataicchācāraṃ paravasaṃ karaṃ iva hatthaṃ iva gītassarena
anya-e0812n:2747_3: attano līlopetagītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ netvā nettarasmibandhaṃ attano
anya-e0812n:2747_4: nayanakantiyā paṭibandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena vivasañca apagatadhitiṃ mūḷhaṃ
anya-e0812n:2747_5: maṃ yā kantā tādisepi dukkare viniyojayi, sā irandatī irandatī nāma nāgamānavikā
anya-e0812n:2747_6: mayā ajja vidhinā bhāgyena adhigatā laddhāti.
anya-e0812n:2748_0: Ettha gītassaranettarasmikaraggahasaṅkhatāhi imāhi padāvalīhi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n:2748_1: Thiyā puriso ca, purisassa thī ca ālambaṇaṃ hotīti “sā irandatī mayā”ti iminā ārammaṇavibhāvo
anya-e0812n:2748_2: dassito. “Upakaḍḍhiya bandhaṃ vivasa”nti imehi kāmena uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhatā
anya-e0812n:2748_3: rati dassitā. “Tādisepi dukkare viniyojayī”ti imehi ussāhādikā ca “vidhinā adhigatā
anya-e0812n:2748_4: mayajjā”ti imehi harisādikā ca byabhicārībhāvā dassitā. Ratiyā viruddhe nibbedaālasiyauggatajigucchādike
anya-e0812n:2748_6: anurūpaṃ payuttā kavippayogā idha anubhāvā nāma honti. Nāṭakādidassanīyasatthe abhinayo
anya-e0812n:2748_7: anubhāvo. Rammadesarammakālarammavesādayo tadabhāve ratiyā anuppajjanato sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n:2748_8: gamyā bhavantīti evaṃ lakkhaṇānugatalakkhiyapariggāho sabbattha kātabbo. Evaṃ satibandhatthāvabodhakānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2748_9: sabbhānaṃ uppajjamānāyapītiyā kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena eso bandho raso nāma hotīti. Uparipi evameva.
anya-e0812n:2757_0: 358. “Vikāre”ccādi. Vikārākati desavayādīnaṃ viparīto kesabandhanādi, so ādi yesaṃ
anya-e0812n:2757_1: aññākatyādinaccanādīnaṃ, tehi vibhāvehi hāso cetovikāso, sopi attano sambandhī vā
anya-e0812n:2757_2: atha parassa sambandhī vā, tattha yo vibhāvasāmatthiyāyevābhibyattiṃ yāti, so attaṭṭho.
anya-e0812n:2757_3: Yo pana vibhāvadassanā uppannāpi purisassa gambhīrattādinā chādito samāno purisantare
anya-e0812n:2757_4: hasatyābhibyatto, so paraṭṭho. So hāso niddādīhi byabhicārīhiyeva, anubhāvapakkhe
anya-e0812n:2757_5: ādisaddena akkhiphandanādayo gahitā. Paripose sati hasso nāma raso siyā. So hasso
anya-e0812n:2757_6: bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ siyāti sambandho. Ettha pabhutisaddena nīcapakatayo saṅgaṇhanti.
anya-e0812n:2758_0: 358. Idāni hassarasassa posanākāraṃ dassetumāha “vikāra”iccādi. Vikārākatiādīhi desavayoliṅgānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2758_1: viparītehi kesabandhagatiṭṭhitiādikehi, naccagītaādikehi ca duvidhehi ākatisaṅkhatehi
anya-e0812n:2758_2: hetubhūtehi attano vā atha parassa vā sambandhī so hāso ceto vikāsalakkhaṇo niddāsamālasyamucchādibyabhicāribhi
anya-e0812n:2758_4: karaṇabhūtehi paripose sati hasso hasso nāma raso siyā, so hasso bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2758_5: nīcapakatīnañca siyāti. Vikārā ca sā ākati ceti ca, so ādi yesanti ca, niddā ca samo
anya-e0812n:2758_6: ca ālasyañca mucchā ceti ca, te ādi yesaṃ akkhiphandanādīnaṃ anubhāvānanti ca, te
anya-e0812n:2758_7: ca byabhicārino ceti ca, itthī pabhuti yesaṃ nīcapakatīnanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_0: 359-360. Hasse bhedamāha “sita”miccādinā. Iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa taṃ sitaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2770_1: kiñci ālakkhiyā dijā dantā yassa taṃ hasitaṃ. Evaṃ madhuro saro saddo yassa taṃ vihasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_2: Aṃsasirokampena saha vattamānaṃ upahasitaṃ, saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni
anya-e0812n:2770_3: yassa taṃ apahasitaṃ. Vikkhittāni ito tato pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa taṃ atihasitaṃ
anya-e0812n:2770_4: nāma. Esañca sitādīnaṃ majjhe dve dve hassā ādito paṭṭhāya kamaso yathākkamena jeṭṭhe
anya-e0812n:2770_5: majjhe adhamepi ca kathitāti sambandho. Purātanehīti viññāyati.
anya-e0812n:2771_0: 359-360. Idāni hassabhedaṃ dasseti “sita”miccādinā. Iha imasmiṃ hassavisaye vikāsinayanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2771_1: vivaṭanayanaṃ sitaṃ nāma. Kiñci ālakkhiyadijaṃ tu kiñci dissamānadantaṃ, taṃ hasitaṃ
anya-e0812n:2771_2: nāma. Madhurassaraṃ madhuranādaṃ vihasitaṃ nāma. Saṃsasirokampaṃ aṃsasirokampasahitaṃ
anya-e0812n:2771_3: upahasitaṃ nāma. Sajalakkhi assuvilocanasahitaṃ apahasitaṃ nāma. Vikkhittaṅgaṃ aṭṭhāne
anya-e0812n:2771_4: pasāraṇavasena vikkhittahatthapādādiavayavavantaṃ atihasitaṃ nāma bhavati. Esaṃ channaṃ
anya-e0812n:2771_5: kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitāti.
anya-e0812n:2771_6: Vikāsīni nayanāni asseti ca, kiñci īsakaṃ ālakkhiyā dijā yasseti ca, madhuro saro
anya-e0812n:2771_7: asseti ca, aṃso ca siro ceti ca, aṃsasiraso kampoti ca, tena saha vattatīti ca, saha
anya-e0812n:2771_8: jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yasseti ca, anusvarāgamo. Vikkhittāni aṅgāni yasseti ca
anya-e0812n:2771_9: vākyaṃ. Sitahasitadvayaṃ uttame, vihasitaupahasitadvayaṃ majjhime, apahasitaatihasitadvayaṃ
anya-e0812n:2771_10: adhame vattate. Evaṃ sitādayo anurūpavibhāvādinā payuttā ime rasā’vatthaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2777_0: Yo purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhammakathane pasanno kaṇṭhamaṇinā api attano anagghakaṇṭhamaṇināpi
anya-e0812n:2777_1: taṃ pūjesi, so nāgarājā sabhāvaṃ attano adhippāyaṃ gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā
anya-e0812n:2777_2: vacanena asamadhuraṃ tulyarahitaṃ vidhuraṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ hantuṃ vināsanatthaṃ pharuse
anya-e0812n:2777_3: caṇḍe mayi bhattiṃ akāsīti. Iha ekasmiṃyeva vatthuni nāgarājassa pasādavadhavidhānādiviparītappavatti
anya-e0812n:2777_4: ālambaṇavibhāvo, paṭhamaṃ anagghapiyavatthūhi pūjitabhāvo ca bodhisattassa atulyabhāvo
anya-e0812n:2777_5: ca itthivacanassa sampaṭicchanabhāvo ca tassādhippāyassa aññātabhāvo ca puṇṇakassa
anya-e0812n:2777_6: caṇḍabhāvo ceti imehi sabbavacanehi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito. Imehi uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhato
anya-e0812n:2777_8: byabhicārībhāvā sāttikābhāvā ca evaṃ sāmatthiyena dīpitā. Tadanurūpavibhāvādipakāsakā
anya-e0812n:2777_9: yathāvuttakavippayogā anubhāvā nāma honti. Hassabhedena majjhime purise vattabbāpi
anya-e0812n:2786_0: 361. “Soke”ccādi. Aniṭṭhassa puttaviyogādino desanikkaḍḍhanādino patti ca iṭṭhassa
anya-e0812n:2786_1: dhammassa, dhanādino vā nāso ca tato vibhāvabhūtehi sampanno sokarūpo sokasabhāvo
anya-e0812n:2786_2: tu karuṇo raso nāma. Tattha uttamānaṃ soko puttaviyogādianiṭṭhuppattito, dhammādiiṭṭhanāsato
anya-e0812n:2786_3: ca jāyate. Nīcānaṃ tu desanikkaḍḍhanādianiṭṭhuppattito, dhanādiiṭṭhanāsato ca, paresaṃ
anya-e0812n:2786_4: dhanādināsato tu uttamasseva mahākāruṇikattā, sesaṃ subodhaṃ. Anubhāvo panettha yathocityaṃ nirūpayitabbo.
anya-e0812n:2787_1: puttaviyogādino, desacāgādino vā aniṭṭhassa uppatti ca sīlādino, dhanādino vā iṭṭhassa
anya-e0812n:2787_2: kantivatthuno vināso cāti imehi ālambaṇavibhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi uppanno sokarūpo
anya-e0812n:2787_3: tu sokasabhāvo pana karuṇo karuṇāraso nāma hoti. Tattha karuṇārase ruditapalayatthambhakādayo
anya-e0812n:2787_4: rudito palayo thambhotiādayo anubhāvā nāma bhavantīti. Thambhādīnaṃ sarūpo heṭṭhā
anya-e0812n:2787_5: vuttova. Visādaālasyamaraṇacintādayo byabhicārino tasmiṃyeva byabhicārino bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:2787_6: Iha puttaviyogādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca sīladhammādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca uttamānaṃ soko uppajjati,
anya-e0812n:2787_7: desacāgādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca dhanādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca nīcānaṃ. Aññesaṃ dhanādivināsanena
anya-e0812n:2787_8: pana mahākaruṇikattā uttamasseva uppajjati. Tasmiṃ visaye so soko sesānaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0812n:2787_9: Tasmā yathārahaṃ payogo kātabbo. Sokassa rūpo sabhāvoti ca, aniṭṭhassa pattīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2787_10: iṭṭhassa nāsoti ca, aniṭṭhappatti ca iṭṭhanāso ceti ca, ruditañca palayo ca thambhako
anya-e0812n:2787_11: ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, visādo ca ālasyañca maraṇañca cintā ceti ca, tā ādi
anya-e0812n:2787_12: yesamiti ca vākyaṃ. Imassa karuṇārasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n:2792_0: Yo ekasatarājapurakkhato rājūnaṃ ekasatena parivārito jino iva buddho iva dhammena
anya-e0812n:2792_1: madhuradhammakathanena āsanaṃ dhammāsanaṃ alaṃkurute sajjeti, lokatilako lokassa
anya-e0812n:2792_2: piyatāya tilakālaṅkārabhūto so vidhurapaṇḍito yakkhena puṇṇakena ākaḍḍhito hutvā
anya-e0812n:2792_3: nīto assavālaṃ avalambiya idāni eko kiṃ kuruteti. Ihānītoti dassitapiyavatthuviyogo
anya-e0812n:2792_4: sokassa ālambaṇavibhāvo hoti. “Ākaḍḍhitekasatarāje”ccādinā sakalena vākyena uddīpanavibhāvo
anya-e0812n:2792_5: dassito, uddīpitasokasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo ca visādālasyacintādiko byabhicārībhāvo ca
anya-e0812n:2792_6: ruditapalayathambhakādikā vibhāvādibodhakaanubhāvā ca vākyasāmatthiyena dīpitā honti.
anya-e0812n:2797_0: 362. “Kodho”iccādi, subodhaṃ. Ettha paṭhamena ādisaddena avikkhepaupahāsādayo vibhāvā
anya-e0812n:2797_1: gahitā, dutiyena uggasambhamādayo byabhicārino, tatiyena bhūkuṭipuraṇaoṭṭhanippīḷanādayo anubhāvā.
anya-e0812n:2798_0: 362. Idāni ruddarasassa posanakkamaṃ dasseti “kodho”iccādinā. Kodho macchariyādīhi
anya-e0812n:2798_1: macchariyaavikkhepaupahāsādīhi ālambaṇādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetubhūtehi tāsamadādīhi
anya-e0812n:2798_3: anubhāvehi ca karaṇabhūtehi pose sati ruddo nāma raso bhaveti. Macchariyaṃ ādi yesanti
anya-e0812n:2798_4: ca, tāso ca mado ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, nayanāni ca tāni aruṇāni cāti ca, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n:2798_5: bhāvoti ca, sā ādi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2804_0: Bho manussabhakkhena yakkhena adhigatosi gahito asi, assassa vālamavalamba vāladhiṃ
anya-e0812n:2804_1: gahetvā idāneva puraṃ avekkha tuyhaṃ nagaraṃ olokehi, tatheva hi verambhavātamukhacuṇṇitasabbagatto
anya-e0812n:2804_2: verambhavātassa abhimukhicuṇṇitasakalasarīro macco manusso jīvalokaṃ sattalokaṃ punapi
anya-e0812n:2804_3: kathaṃ passatīti. Iha macchariyādivibhāvā ca kodhādisaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo ca vākyasāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n:2804_4: dīpitā honti, aparaddhena tāsamadauggatādibyabhicārībhāvā vibhāvitā honti. Samudāyena
anya-e0812n:2810_0: 363. “Patāpi”ccādi. Patāpo sattusantāpakārī tejo, vikkamo paramaṇḍalakkamantaṃ, te
anya-e0812n:2810_1: ādayo yesaṃ balāvikkhepādīnaṃ paṭipuggalagatānaṃ vibhāvānaṃ, tehi jāto ussāho rasattamāpanno
anya-e0812n:2810_2: vīro rasoti saññito, ayaṃ vīro raṇadānadayāyogā tividho bhave yuddhavīro dānavīro
anya-e0812n:2810_3: dayāvīroti, te yuddhakaraṇādayo eva tattha anubhāvā bhavanti. Dhitimatiuggatādayo
anya-e0812n:2811_2: phalabhedo cetiādīhi uppanno ussāho vīroti vīrarasoti saññito kavīhi ñāto, ayaṃ vīraraso
anya-e0812n:2811_3: raṇadānadayāyogā yuddhacāgakaruṇāyogena hetubhūtena tividho bhave. Te eva raṇadānadayā
anya-e0812n:2811_4: eva imā anubhāvā nāma honti. Dhitimatyādayo dhitimatiuggatagabbādayo byabhicārino
anya-e0812n:2811_5: bhāvā hontīti. Yuddhavīradānavīradayāvīravasena vīraraso tividho hoti. Patāpo ca
anya-e0812n:2811_6: vikkamo ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, raṇo ca dānañca dayā ceti ca, tāhi yogoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2811_7: tayo vidhā pakārā assāti ca, dhiti ca mati ceti ca, tā ādi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2821_0: Kuveraṃ vessavaṇamahārājaṃ viññāpetvā bodhetvā sumahatimapi kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ atimahantiṃ
anya-e0812n:2821_1: kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ ekova uttāsetvā bhayaṃ janetvā maṇiratanavaraṃ gahetvā jūte akkhakīḷāyaṃ
anya-e0812n:2821_2: lakkhaṃ ādhāya ṭhapetvā korabyarājaṃ jetvā raññaṃ satamhā rājasambandhinā satena
anya-e0812n:2821_3: sacivaratanaṃ amaccaratanaṃ uddhacca uddharitvā etthānetvā suyuvatiratanaṃ sobhanaitthiratanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2821_4: ādiyissaṃ gaṇhissāmi, ettha yathāvuttesu mama ko bhāro atthīti. Ettha “ko mametthatthi
anya-e0812n:2821_5: bhāro”ti iminā ussāhasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo pakāsito. Etassa uppattiuddīpanesu kāraṇabhūtassa
anya-e0812n:2821_8: eko”ti ca, “raññaṃ satamhā sacivaratanamuddhaccā”ti ca imehi dhitiuggatagabbādayo
anya-e0812n:2821_9: ca, “viññāpetvā kuvera”nti ca, “uttāsetvā korabyarāja”nti ca, “etthānetvā iccādayo”ti
anya-e0812n:2821_10: ca imehi matyādayo ca byabhicārino bhāvā vibhāvitā honti. Imehi vibhāvānubhāvabyabhicārībhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2821_11: yuddhavīraraso positoti daṭṭhabbo. Imināyeva nayena dānavīrādayo viññātabbā.
anya-e0812n:2828_0: 364. “Vikāri”ccādi. Vikāri asabhāvappavatto viruddho sano saddo satto ca, te ādayo
anya-e0812n:2828_1: yesaṃ suññāraññādīnaṃ itthinīcappakatisambhavantānaṃ, vibhāvānaṃ, guruādīnaṃ vā uttamānaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2828_2: tehi jātassa bhayassa, kittimassa vā ukkaṃso bhayānako nāma raso. Ettha sedakampanapādacalanādayo
anya-e0812n:2829_1: pakativirahena vikāravantehi viruddhehi asanisaddādisaddehi, rakkhasādisattehi vā
anya-e0812n:2829_2: vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi sañjāto sābhāviko, kittimo vā bhayapaṭibandho ukkaṃso bhayānakaraso
anya-e0812n:2829_3: nāma hoti. Ettha bhayānakarasavisaye sedādayo dāhasarīrakampanādayo anubhāvā kāyikavācasikappayogasaṅkhatā
anya-e0812n:2829_4: anubhāvā honti. Tāsādī byabhicārino tāsasaṅkādayo iha byabhicārībhāvā hontīti. Sano
anya-e0812n:2829_5: ca satto ceti ca, vikāro etesaṃ atthīti ca, vikārino ca te sanasattā ceti ca, te
anya-e0812n:2829_6: ādayo yesaṃ suññāraññādīnamiti ca, tehi jātaṃ bhayamiti ca, majjhe padalopo, tassa
anya-e0812n:2829_7: ukkaṃsoti ca, sedo ādi yesaṃ kampanādīnamiti ca, tāso ādi yesaṃ saṅkādīnamiti ca
anya-e0812n:2829_8: vākyaṃ. Itthinīcappakatikānaṃ bhayahetu vikārisanasattādi, uttamānaṃ guruādi.
anya-e0812n:2835_0: Diṭṭhisatthapatanena diṭṭhisallasampātanena paripphurantī kampamānā samantā parisamantato
anya-e0812n:2835_1: ācakkavāḷanagaṃ cakkavāḷapabbatāvadhi gamitā palāpitā kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū kumbhaṇḍarakkhasānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2835_2: senā yaṃ assagataṃ assapiṭṭhe nisinnakaṃ bhoto bhavataṃ tumhākaṃ purī iva puriyā
anya-e0812n:2835_3: dassanamiva muhuṃ muhuṃ apassi khaṇe khaṇe apassittha, so ahaṃ puṇṇako nāma yakkhoti.
anya-e0812n:2835_4: Ettha “diṭṭhisatthapatanenā”ti diṭṭhisatthāropanena ca “sa puṇṇako aha”nti iminā
anya-e0812n:2835_5: ca bhayajananassa hetubhūtaviruddhasattasaṅkhātā vibhāvā niddiṭṭhā, “muhuṃ muhu’mapassī”ti
anya-e0812n:2835_7: gamitā samantā ācakkavāḷanaga”nti tāsasaṅkādikā byabhicārino bhāvā jotitā. “Paripphurantī”ti
anya-e0812n:2844_0: 365. “Jigucchā”iccādi. Rudhirantādīhi pūtikimiādīhi virāgato ca jātā jigucchā garahā
anya-e0812n:2844_1: kamena khobhano ubbegī karuṇāyuto ca bībhaccho bhavati, nāsāvikunanamukhacchadanādīhi
anya-e0812n:2844_2: anubhāvehi, saṅkāvegādīhi byabhicārīhi ca assa posanaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:2845_1: rattantaguṇādīhi ca, pūtyādīhi pūtikimiādīhi ca, virāgato virattabhāvena cāti imehi
anya-e0812n:2845_2: tīhi vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamānā jigucchā kamena rudhirādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vibhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2845_3: paṭipāṭiyā khobhano anavaṭṭhāno asamāhito ubbegī ubbegavā karuṇāyuto sokarūpena sahito
anya-e0812n:2845_4: cāti evaṃ bībhaccho raso nāma hoti. Nāsāvikunanādīhi nāsasaṅkocanamukhapidahanādīhi
anya-e0812n:2845_5: anubhāvehi ca saṅkādīhi ca saṅkāāvegādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi ca karaṇabhūtehi assa
anya-e0812n:2845_6: bībhaccharasassa posanaṃ hotīti. Rudhirādīsu tīsu padesu, khobhanādīsu tīsu ca gamyamānattā
anya-e0812n:2845_7: avuttopi casaddo yojetabbo, tasmā khobhanādīhi tīhi yuttova bībhaccharaso nāmāti
anya-e0812n:2845_8: daṭṭhabbo. Rudhiraṃ ādi yesaṃ antādīnamiti ca, pūtiādi yesaṃ kimiādīnamiti ca, ubbego
anya-e0812n:2845_9: assa bībhacchassa atthīti ca, karuṇena āyutoti ca, nāsāya vikunanaṃ saṅkocanamiti
anya-e0812n:2845_10: ca, taṃ ādi yesaṃ mukhacchādanādīnamiti ca, saṅkā ādi yesaṃ āvegādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2851_3: littā sīsakapālapātihi sīsakapālasaṅkhātehi sarāvehi vasāmajjaṃ vasāsaṅkhātasuraṃ
anya-e0812n:2851_4: pure abhimukhe pivantā ye yakkhā siyuṃ, ete yakkhā vidhurena paṇḍitena dhuttā viya
anya-e0812n:2851_5: nagare surādhuttā viya upekkhitā hontīti. Iha “littā lohitakuṅkumehī”ti ca “uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā”ti
anya-e0812n:2851_6: ca “hārīkatantoragā”ti ca imehi cittakkhobhakāraṇabhūto rudhirādivibhāvo ca, “maccakaraṅkakaṅkanaro”ti
anya-e0812n:2851_7: ca “sīsakapālapātihi vasāmajjaṃ pivantā”ti ca imehi ubbegavantasabhāvassa hetubhūto
anya-e0812n:2851_8: pūtyādivibhāvo ca pakāsito. Karuṇāyutasabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtavirajjanavibhāvo ca nāsāvikunanādianubhāvo
anya-e0812n:2851_9: ca saṅkāvegādibyabhicārībhāvo ca bībhacchasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo cāti ime sabbe vākyasāmatthiyena gammāti veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:2860_0: 366. “Ati”ccādi. Atilokehi lokātivuttīhi māyādibbagehārāmādīhi padatthehi jāto ayaṃ
anya-e0812n:2860_1: vimhayo cittavikārasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso nāma. Sedaassusādhuvādaromañcādayo
anya-e0812n:2860_2: tassa anubhāvā siyuṃ, tāsādayo byabhicārino hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2861_0: 366. Idāni vimhayarasassa posanakkamaṃ dasseti “ati”iccādinā. Atilokapadatthehi lokaṭṭhitimatikkamma
anya-e0812n:2861_1: pavattehi māyādibbabhavanaārāmavimānādipadatthehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamāno ayaṃ vimhayo
anya-e0812n:2861_2: cittabyāpanasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso abbhutaraso nāma bhave, sedassusādhuvādādayo
anya-e0812n:2861_3: tassa abbhutarasassa anubhāvā siyuṃ, tāsāvegadhitippaññā ettha abbhutarasavisaye
anya-e0812n:2861_4: byabhicārino bhāvā hontīti. Atikkantā lokamiti ca, te ca te padatthā ceti ca, sādhuiti
anya-e0812n:2861_5: vādoti ca, sedo ca assu ca sādhuvādo ceti ca, te ādi yesaṃ romañcādīnamiti ca, tāso
anya-e0812n:2861_6: ca āvego ca dhiti ca paññā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2867_0: So vidhurapaṇḍito puṇṇakena yakkhena naṭena iva anekavikāradassanakena nāṭakena viya
anya-e0812n:2867_3: adhosīsaṃ patanto asantasaṃ evaṃ appatiṭṭhepi anuttasanto taṃ pabbataṃ diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n:2867_4: mini pamāṇamakāsi, aho acchariyanti. Ettha bhayahetumhi sati bhītiyā ca tattha parijānanābhāvassa
anya-e0812n:2867_5: ca lokasabhāvattā tamatikkamma bhayakaraṇe asantāsassa ca diṭṭhiyā pabbataminanassa
anya-e0812n:2867_6: ca pavattabhāvakathanena lokātikkantapadatthasaṅkhāto vibhāvo “asantasaṃ taṃ mini
anya-e0812n:2867_7: diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā”ti iminā pakāsito. “Aho”ti vacanena, tassa sāmatthiyena ca sādhuvādasedaassuādayo
anya-e0812n:2878: 367. “Ṭhāyi”ccādi. Mettādisambhavo samo upasamasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo bhavati, tadanurūpehi bhāvānubhāvehi tassa ukkaṃso yassa, so santo nāma raso bhavati, so ca santanisevitoti.
anya-e0812n:2881_1: mettākaruṇāpītiādivibhāvehi sambhūto samo kāyacittopasamo ṭhāyībhāvo nāma hoti, bhāvādīhi
anya-e0812n:2881_2: byabhicārībhāvādīhi karaṇabhūtehi, apica tassa samassa anurūpehi byabhicārībhāvānubhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2881_3: tadukkaṃso tassa ṭhāyībhāvassa ukkaṃsayutto santanisevito sādhūhi sevito santo santaraso
anya-e0812n:2881_4: nāma hotīti. Mettā ca dayā ca modo ceti ca, te ādayo yesamiti ca, tehi sambhavo yasseti
anya-e0812n:2881_5: ca, tassa ukkaṃso assa santasseti ca, sataṃ nisevitoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2887_0: Kesarikarīsu sīhahatthīsu entesu api bhiṃsanākārena samīpamāgacchantesupi nāge veṭhayantepi
anya-e0812n:2887_1: nāgesu sarīraṃ veṭhayantesupi. Jātyāpekkhāyekavacanaṃ, veḷugumbaṃ madagaje viya vicālayati
anya-e0812n:2887_2: madagaḷitahatthimhi cālente iva yakkhe puṇṇake nagaṃ kāḷāgiripabbataṃ vicālayatipi
anya-e0812n:2887_3: anekappakāre cālentepi vidhuro paṇḍito santiṃ gatova nibbānaṃ ālambaṇakaraṇavasena
anya-e0812n:2887_4: sampatto viya phalasamāpattisamāpanno iva atha vā diṭṭhadhammanibbānasaṅkhatanirodhasamāpattisamāpanno
anya-e0812n:2887_5: viya īsakampi appakampi madhurā bhāvā api madhurasabhāvatopi no cali, nisinnaṭṭhānato
anya-e0812n:2887_6: pagevāti adhippāyo. Ettha dhāvanarodanakampanādīnaṃ karaṇabhūtaṃ sīhādīnamāgamanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2887_7: nāgaveṭhanaṃ pabbatakampanantiādīsu vattamānesupi nibbikārattena santiṃ gatoti iminā
anya-e0812n:2887_8: santarasassa pakatibhūte uddese dassito navamo ṭhāyībhāvo dassito hoti, etassa uppattiuddīpanānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2887_9: kāraṇabhūtā mettādayāmodādivibhāvā sāmatthiyā dassitā hontīti. Dhitimatisatiādayo
anya-e0812n:2887_10: tadanurūpabyabhicārībhāvā ca tādisānubhāvā ca “entesu veṭhayante vicālayatī”ti iminā,
